tika-s0101t:12_1: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
tika-s0101t:12_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
tika-s0101t:12_3: pubbakiccabhāvato, paṇḍitehi sammācaritabhāvato, āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato
tika-s0101t:12_4: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā. Atha vā ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ pūjanīyapūjāpuññavisesanibbattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0101t:12_5: taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppādanatthaṃ, antarā ca
tika-s0101t:12_6: tassa asaṅkocanatthaṃ, tadubhayaṃ anantarāyena aṭṭhakathāya parisamāpanatthaṃ. Idameva
tika-s0101t:12_7: ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati – “iti me pasannamatino…pe…
tika-s0101t:13: “Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake”tiādi, tathā –
tika-s0101t:14: “Ye bhikkhave buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:16: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
tika-s0101t:19: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,
tika-s0101t:23_0: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:23_2: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya
tika-s0101t:23_3: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā
tika-s0101t:23_4: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0101t:24_0: Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati, apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti
tika-s0101t:24_1: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati, vibādhatīti attho, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ
tika-s0101t:24_2: kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā.
tika-s0101t:24_3: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā, attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ
tika-s0101t:24_4: rundhati vibandhatīti. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
tika-s0101t:24_5: karuṇāsītalahadayo, taṃ karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānicchanasabhāvatāya,
tika-s0101t:24_8: parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi
tika-s0101t:24_9: viya sītībhāvanimittanti vuttaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi
tika-s0101t:25_0: Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:25_1: viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti
tika-s0101t:25_2: āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītībhāvanibandhanatte
tika-s0101t:25_3: sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāva bhagavato hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:25_5: hi bhagavato paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāya anekānipi asaṅkheyyāni kappānaṃ akilantarūpasseva
tika-s0101t:25_8: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:26_0: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
tika-s0101t:26_1: pakārehi dhammasabhāvāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto, savāsanappahānato visesena
tika-s0101t:26_2: hataṃ samugghāṭitaṃ vihataṃ, paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ. Muyhanti
tika-s0101t:26_3: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā, sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato
tika-s0101t:26_4: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo, paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
tika-s0101t:26_5: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
tika-s0101t:26_6: avijjāndhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi, paccekasambuddhehi
tika-s0101t:26_7: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
tika-s0101t:27_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjāndhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0101t:27_1: tattha ca sabbaññutāya, balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
tika-s0101t:27_2: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
tika-s0101t:27_4: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:28_0: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvābodhanasamatthena
tika-s0101t:28_2: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0101t:28_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sakasantāne
tika-s0101t:28_4: mohatamavidhamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
tika-s0101t:29_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāvigghāto yeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
tika-s0101t:29_1: gayhati, na pana sātisayaniravasesakilesappahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0101t:29_2: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātajotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo niravasesaavijjāppahānena
tika-s0101t:29_3: na pahīyatīti. Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā,
tika-s0101t:29_4: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbigghātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
tika-s0101t:30_0: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
tika-s0101t:30_1: sanarāmaraloko, tassa garuti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0101t:30_2: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahato bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:30_3: Na cettha padhānāpadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
tika-s0101t:30_4: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā – “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0101t:30_5: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārabhājanavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
tika-s0101t:30_6: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassavasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokiyanti
tika-s0101t:30_7: ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
tika-s0101t:31_0: Atha vā samūhattho loka-saddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
tika-s0101t:31_1: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā ceti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
tika-s0101t:31_2: yojetabbaṃ. Amara-saddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Te hi maraṇābhāvato
tika-s0101t:31_3: paramatthato amarā. Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena, yathā – “satthā
tika-s0101t:31_6: ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ
tika-s0101t:32_0: Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena
tika-s0101t:32_1: tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ, tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjana paṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāyadutavilambita-
tika-s0101t:33_0: Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena
tika-s0101t:33_1: sammā gato avagatoti sugato. Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto
tika-s0101t:33_2: anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato. Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
tika-s0101t:33_3: sammā gato adhigatoti sugato. Lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā
tika-s0101t:33_4: gato paṭipannoti sugato. Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti,
tika-s0101t:33_5: na pacceti, na paccāgacchatīti sugatotiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Atha
tika-s0101t:33_6: vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato. Yasmā vā
tika-s0101t:33_7: bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ vineyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0101t:33_8: tasmā sammā gadatīti sugato, da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Iti sobhanagamanatādīhi sugato, taṃ sugataṃ.
tika-s0101t:34_0: Puññapāpakammehi upapajjanavasena gantabbato gatiyo, upapattibhavavisesā. Tā pana
tika-s0101t:34_1: nirayādivasena pañcavidhā, tāhi sakalassāpi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena
tika-s0101t:34_2: avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti
tika-s0101t:34_3: āha – “gativimutta”nti. Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t:37: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0101t:38_2: suparimutto, taṃ gativimuttaṃ. Vandeti namāmi, thomemīti vā attho.
tika-s0101t:39_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi. Ettha
tika-s0101t:39_1: hi dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā – attahitasampattito, parahitapaṭipattito
tika-s0101t:39_2: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato, savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0101t:39_3: accantappahānato, anupādisesanibbānappattito ca veditabbā. Parahitapaṭipatti lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa
tika-s0101t:39_5: ca. Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti, tividhā ca attahitasampatti
tika-s0101t:39_6: pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ? “Karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena āsayato parahitapaṭipatti, sammā
tika-s0101t:39_8: gativimutta”nti etehi catusaccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugata-saddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti,
tika-s0101t:39_9: avasiṭṭhena, “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena ca sabbāpi attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0101t:40_0: Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā – hetuto, phalato, upakārato ca. Tattha
tika-s0101t:40_1: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā paṭhamapadena nidassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ – ñāṇasampadā, pahānasampadā,
tika-s0101t:40_2: ānubhāvasampadā, rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu ñāṇappahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccappaṭivedhatthena
tika-s0101t:40_3: ca sugata-saddena pakāsitā honti. Ānubhāvasampadā tatiyapadena, rūpakāyasampadā yathāvuttakāyagamanasobhanatthena
tika-s0101t:40_4: sugata-saddena, lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato. Upakāro antaraṃ abāhiraṃ
tika-s0101t:40_5: karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā, so sammā gadanatthena sugata-saddena
tika-s0101t:41_0: Tattha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-s0101t:41_1: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-s0101t:41_2: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti
tika-s0101t:41_3: etena sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca
tika-s0101t:41_4: anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccatīti. Sammā gadanatthena sugata-saddena sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0101t:41_7: pakāsanato sugata-saddassa. Itarehi sammāsambodhiyā padhānāppadhānabhedaṃ payojanaṃ
tika-s0101t:41_8: dasseti. Saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇañcettha padhānaṃ payojanaṃ, tadaññamappadhānaṃ.
tika-s0101t:41_9: Tesu padhānena parahitappaṭipattiṃ dasseti, itarena attahitasampattiṃ, tadubhayena
tika-s0101t:41_10: attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:41_11: Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ, attano ca vandanakiriyāya
tika-s0101t:42_0: Ettha ca karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato
tika-s0101t:42_3: vipañcīyatīti. Karuṇāggahaṇena ca upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:42_4: apagamanaṃ. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t:42_6: hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:42_7: mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ dasseti, paññāggahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, catusaccañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0101t:42_9: gahitattā sesāsādhāraṇañāṇāni, cha abhiññā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa
tika-s0101t:42_10: balāni, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, soḷasa ñāṇacariyā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattārīsa
tika-s0101t:42_11: ñāṇavatthūni, sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāppabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:43_0: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena caraṇasampattiṃ, paññāggahaṇena vijjāsampattiṃ. Karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:43_1: sattādhipatitā, paññāggahaṇena dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāggahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:43_2: attanāthabhāvo. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena pubbakāribhāvo, paññāggahaṇena kataññutā. Tathā
tika-s0101t:43_3: karuṇāggahaṇena aparantapatā, paññāggahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāggahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi,
tika-s0101t:43_4: paññāggahaṇena buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:43_5: sayaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:43_6: sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti. Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi, tannidānabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:43_7: Paññā pariyosānaṃ, tato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato. Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā
tika-s0101t:43_8: dassitā honti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito
tika-s0101t:43_9: hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ, tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti.
tika-s0101t:43_10: Paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānamādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā
tika-s0101t:43_11: pariyosānanti. Evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti,
tika-s0101t:43_12: nayato dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:43_13: Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
tika-s0101t:48: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā, “api ca me bhante dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:49_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ
tika-s0101t:49_1: “buddhopī”tiādimāha. Tattha buddhoti kattuniddeso. Buddhabhāvanti kammaniddeso. Bhāvetvā,
tika-s0101t:49_2: sacchikatvāti ca pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Yanti aniyamato kammaniddeso. Upagatoti
tika-s0101t:49_3: aparakālakiriyāniddeso. Vandeti kiriyāniddeso, tanti niyamanaṃ. Dhammanti vandanakiriyāya
tika-s0101t:50_0: Tattha buddha-saddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-s0101t:50_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato,
tika-s0101t:50_2: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho, jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā
tika-s0101t:50_3: kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato
tika-s0101t:50_4: kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti
tika-s0101t:50_5: buddho, yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti, atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena
tika-s0101t:51: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0101t:52_0: Api-saddo sambhāvane, tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇe
tika-s0101t:52_1: dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā, vaḍḍhetvā
tika-s0101t:52_2: ca. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti attho, etassa “buddhabhāva”nti
tika-s0101t:52_3: etena sambandho. Gatamalanti vigatamalaṃ, niddosanti attho. Vandeti paṇamāmi, thomemi
tika-s0101t:52_4: vā. Anuttaranti uttararahitaṃ, lokuttaranti attho. Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne
tika-s0101t:52_5: apāyato ca, saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhārayatīti dhammo.
tika-s0101t:53_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – evaṃ vividhaguṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0101t:53_1: dhammaṃ bhāvetvā, phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
tika-s0101t:53_2: adhigato, tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-s0101t:53_3: anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti. Pariyattisaddhammassāpi tappakāsanattā idha
tika-s0101t:53_4: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ bhāvetvā adhigacchi, tīṇi piṭakāni
tika-s0101t:53_5: sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassāpi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo
tika-s0101t:53_6: labbhatīti sopi idha vutto yevāti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā, sacchikatvā”ti
tika-s0101t:53_7: ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi
tika-s0101t:53_8: idha dhamma-saddena saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Tāpi hi vigatapaṭipakkhatāya vigatamalā,
tika-s0101t:53_9: anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti. Tathā hi sattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya
tika-s0101t:53_11: dānadamasaññamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ satasahassādhikāni kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkheyyāni
tika-s0101t:53_12: sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi kammādīsu adhigatavasībhāvo,
tika-s0101t:53_14: paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti.
tika-s0101t:54_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi, ‘sacchikatvā’ti etena
tika-s0101t:54_1: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
tika-s0101t:54_2: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayañāṇabhāvena,
tika-s0101t:54_3: dutiyena anuppādañāṇabhāvena. Purimena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirūpamatāya.
tika-s0101t:54_4: Purimena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
tika-s0101t:54_5: dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena
tika-s0101t:54_6: vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena
tika-s0101t:54_7: amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti
tika-s0101t:54_8: etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
tika-s0101t:54_9: purimena akālikatāya, pacchimena ehipassikatāya. Purimena vā opaneyyikatāya, pacchimena
tika-s0101t:55_1: etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena vipulaparipuṇṇataṃ. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadaṃ
tika-s0101t:55_2: dhammassa dasseti, dutiyena pabhāvasampadaṃ. Bhāvetabbatāya vā dhammassa gatamalabhāvo
tika-s0101t:55_3: yojetabbo. Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ samugghātako hotīti. Sacchikātabbabhāvena
tika-s0101t:55_4: anuttarabhāvo yojetabbo. Sacchikiriyānibbattito hi taduttarikaraṇīyābhāvato anaññasādhāraṇatāya
tika-s0101t:55_5: anuttaroti. Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā
tika-s0101t:55_6: dassitā honti, “sacchikatvā”ti etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0101t:56_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā, idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ
tika-s0101t:56_2: etena sambandho. Orasānanti puttavisesanaṃ. Mārasenamathanānanti orasaputtabhāve
tika-s0101t:56_3: kāraṇaniddeso, tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāvakāraṇaṃ anujānātīti
tika-s0101t:56_4: dasseti. Aṭṭhannanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso, tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena
tika-s0101t:56_5: anekasatasahassasaṅkhyabhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti, maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0101t:56_7: asatipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena
tika-s0101t:56_8: saṃhatabhāvato. Tattha urasi bhavā jātā, saṃvaddhā ca orasā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā
tika-s0101t:56_9: attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti, evametepi ariyapuggalā
tika-s0101t:56_10: sammāsambuddhassa savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa,
tika-s0101t:56_11: ariyadhammaratanassa ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena
tika-s0101t:56_12: ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā, okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urovāyāmajanitābhijātatāya
tika-s0101t:56_13: nippariyāyena “orasaputtā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā
tika-s0101t:56_14: bhagavato “dhammadesanā” icceva vuccati, taṃmūlakattā, lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca.
tika-s0101t:57_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:57_1: devaputtamāro, māravāhinī vā na ekantena apasādeti, tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe
tika-s0101t:57_2: vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha – “mārasenamathanāna”nti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-s0101t:57_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassāpi guṇamāraṇe
tika-s0101t:57_5: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha – “kāmā te paṭhamā
tika-s0101t:57_6: senā”tiādi. Sā ca tehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā, anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi
tika-s0101t:57_7: odhiso vimathitā, vihatā, viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā, ariyasāvakā. Etena tesaṃ
tika-s0101t:58_0: Ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato ariyā, niruttinayena. Atha
tika-s0101t:58_1: vā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato, upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito
tika-s0101t:58_2: ariyā, ariyānaṃ saṅghoti ariyasaṅgho, ariyo ca so, saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho, taṃ
tika-s0101t:58_3: ariyasaṅghaṃ. Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti
tika-s0101t:58_4: assa ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:59_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t:59_3: etena pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti, sabbasaṅghānaṃ aggabhāvadīpanato. Atha vā “sugatassa
tika-s0101t:59_8: hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā. “Mārasenamathanāna”nti etena abhinīhārasampadāsiddhaṃ
tika-s0101t:59_9: pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Katābhinīhārā hi sammā paṭipannā māraṃ, māraparisaṃ
tika-s0101t:59_10: vā abhivijinanti. “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena viddhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme
tika-s0101t:59_12: dasseti. Saraṇagamanañca sāvakānaṃ sabbaguṇānamādi, sapubbabhāgappaṭipadā sekkhā
tika-s0101t:59_13: sīlakkhandhādayo majjhe, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā
tika-s0101t:60_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṅkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā,
tika-s0101t:60_1: idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0101t:60_2: ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, buddhadhammasaṅghā. Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe
tika-s0101t:60_3: āvajjantassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t:61_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0101t:61_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0101t:61_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Ujugatacitto
tika-s0101t:61_3: kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati
tika-s0101t:65_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti. Vandanāva vandanāmayaṃ,
tika-s0101t:65_1: yathā “dānamayaṃ, sīlamaya”nti. Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0101t:65_2: thomanā vā. Pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato puññaṃ, attano santānaṃ puṇātīti vā. Suvihatantarāyoti
tika-s0101t:65_3: suṭṭhu vihatantarāyo, etena attano pasādasampattiyā, rattanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā
tika-s0101t:65_4: taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthanti dasseti.
tika-s0101t:65_5: Hutvāti pubbakālakiriyā, tassa “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti etena sambandho. Tassāti
tika-s0101t:65_6: yaṃ ratanattayavandanāmayaṃ puññaṃ, tassa. Ānubhāvenāti balena.
tika-s0101t:66_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā, idāni yassā dhammadesanāya
tika-s0101t:66_1: atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo, tassā tāva guṇābhitthavanavasena upaññāpanatthaṃ “dīghassā”tiādi
tika-s0101t:66_3: ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti. Nanu ca suttāniyeva āgamo, kassa
tika-s0101t:66_4: pana suttehi aṅkananti? Saccametaṃ paramatthato, suttāni pana upādāyapaññatto āgamo.
tika-s0101t:66_5: Yathā hi atthabyañjanasamudāye “sutta”nti vohāro, evaṃ suttasamudāye “āgamo”ti vohāro.
tika-s0101t:66_6: Paṭiccasamuppādādinipuṇatthasabbhāvato nipuṇassa. Āgamissanti ettha, etena, etasmā
tika-s0101t:66_7: vā attatthaparatthādayoti āgamo, āgamo ca so varo cāti āgamavaro, āgamasammatehi
tika-s0101t:66_8: vā varoti āgamavaro, tassa. Buddhānaṃ anubuddhā buddhānubuddhā, buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ
tika-s0101t:66_9: anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā. Tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena, guṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena
tika-s0101t:66_10: ca saṃvaṇṇitassa. Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ. Sammāsambuddheneva
tika-s0101t:66_11: hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito, yā “pakiṇṇakadesanā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0101t:67_0: Saddhāvahaguṇassāti buddhādīsu pasādāvahasampattikassa. Ayañhi āgamo brahmajālādīsu
tika-s0101t:67_2: pāthikasuttādīsu titthiye nimadditvā appaṭivattiyasīhanāda nadanādivasena, anuttariyasuttādīsu
tika-s0101t:67_3: ca visesato buddhaguṇavibhāvanena ratanattaye sātisayappasādaṃ āvahati. Saṃvaṇṇanāsu
tika-s0101t:67_4: cāyaṃ ācariyassa pakati, yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa
tika-s0101t:67_7: vicittappaṭibhānajananassa tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassa
tika-s0101t:68_0: Attho kathīyati etāyāti atthakathā, sā eva aṭṭhakathā, ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā,
tika-s0101t:68_1: yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti. Ādito tiādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ. Chaḷabhiññatāya
tika-s0101t:68_2: paramena cittavasībhāvena samannāgatattā, jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsabbhāvato ca
tika-s0101t:68_3: vasino, therā mahākassapādayo. Tesaṃ satehi pañcahi. Yāti yā aṭṭhakathā. Saṅgītāti
tika-s0101t:68_4: atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho, ayaṃ etassa attho”ti saṅgahetvā
tika-s0101t:68_5: vuttā. Anusaṅgītā ca yasattherādīhi pacchāpi dutiyatatiyasaṅgītīsu, iminā attano
tika-s0101t:69_0: Sīhassa lānato gahaṇato sīhaḷo, sīhakumāro. Taṃvaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:69_1: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo. Ābhatāti jambudīpato
tika-s0101t:69_2: ānītā. Athāti pacchā. Aparabhāge hi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0101t:69_3: Tenassa mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti
tika-s0101t:69_5: Dīpavāsīnanti vā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0101t:70_0: Apanetvānāti kañcukasadisaṃ sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā. Tatoti aṭṭhakathāto. Ahanti attānaṃ
tika-s0101t:70_1: niddisati. Manoramaṃ bhāsanti māgadhabhāsaṃ. Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-s0101t:70_2: manaṃ ramayatīti. Tenevāha – “tantinayānucchavika”nti, pāḷigatiyā anulomikaṃ pāḷibhāsāyānuvidhāyininti
tika-s0101t:71_0: Samayaṃ avilomentoti siddhantaṃ avirodhento, etena atthadosābhāvamāha. Aviruddhattā
tika-s0101t:71_1: eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsiyissanti. Theravaṃsapadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-s0101t:71_2: samannāgatattā therā, mahākassapādayo. Tehi āgatā ācariyaparamparā theravaṃso, tappariyāpannā
tika-s0101t:71_3: hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsapadīpā,
tika-s0101t:71_4: mahāvihāravāsino therā, tesaṃ. Vividhehi ākārehi nicchīyatīti vinicchayo, gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu
tika-s0101t:71_5: khīlamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedakathā. Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti
tika-s0101t:71_6: sunipuṇavinicchayā. Atha vā vinicchinotīti vinicchayo, yathāvuttavisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Suṭṭhu
tika-s0101t:71_7: nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā, etena mahākassapāditheraparamparābhato,
tika-s0101t:71_8: tatoyeva ca aviparīto saṇhasukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:72_0: Sujanassa cāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena na kevalaṃ jambudīpavāsīnameva atthāya,
tika-s0101t:72_1: atha kho sādhujanatosanatthañcāti dasseti, tena ca tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyāti
tika-s0101t:72_2: ayamattho siddho hoti, uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahupakārattā. Ciraṭṭhitatthanti
tika-s0101t:72_3: ciraṭṭhitiatthaṃ, cirakālaṭṭhitiyāti attho. Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītabyañjanasunikkhepassa
tika-s0101t:72_4: atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0101t:73: “Dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame dve? Sunikkhattañca padabyañjanaṃ, attho ca sunīto”ti.
tika-s0101t:74_0: Yaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, tassā mahattaṃ pariharituṃ “sīlakathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:74_1: Tenevāha – “na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti. Atha vā yaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo, tadekadesabhāvena
tika-s0101t:74_2: visuddhimaggo ca gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena
tika-s0101t:74_3: dasseti “sīlakathā” tiādinā. Tattha sīlakathāti cārittavārittādivasena sīlavitthārakathā.
tika-s0101t:74_4: Dhutadhammāti piṇḍapātikaṅgādayo terasa kilesadhunanakadhammā. Kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānīti
tika-s0101t:74_5: pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni aṭṭhatiṃsa, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya
tika-s0101t:74_7: Jhānāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, samāpattiyo catasso arūpasamāpattiyo. Aṭṭhapi
tika-s0101t:74_8: vā paṭiladdhamattāni jhānāni, samāpajjanavasībhāvappattiyā samāpattiyo. Jhānāni vā
tika-s0101t:75: Lokiyalokuttarabhedā cha abhiññāyo sabbā abhiññāyo. Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṅkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0101t:76_1: tassa desanā paccayākāradesanā, paṭiccasamuppādakathāti attho. Sā pana ghanavinibbhogassa
tika-s0101t:76_3: tattha vicāritāti āha – “suparisuddhanipuṇanayā”ti. Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-s0101t:77: Iti pana sabbanti iti-saddo parisamāpane, pana-saddo vacanālaṅkāre, etaṃ sabbanti attho. Idhāti imissā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Na vicārayissāmi, punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:78_0: Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t:78_1: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhebhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā
tika-s0101t:78_2: visuddhimaggo, na sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya asādhāraṇaṭṭhakathāti dasseti. “Visesato”ti
tika-s0101t:78_3: idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti yevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:79_0: Iccevāti iti eva. Tampīti visuddhimaggampi. Etāyāti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā. Ettha ca
tika-s0101t:79_2: sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ, ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etena payojanaṃ, avasiṭṭhena
tika-s0101t:79_3: karaṇappakāraṃ. Sīlakathādīnaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0101t:82_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva vaggasuttavasena
tika-s0101t:82_1: vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dīghāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti “dīghassa āgamavarassa
tika-s0101t:82_2: atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ vacane. Yassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti
tika-s0101t:82_3: paṭiññātaṃ, so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena evaṃ vibhāgoti attho. Atha vā tatthāti
tika-s0101t:82_4: “dīghāgamanissitamattha”nti etasmiṃ vacane. Yo dīghāgamo vutto, so vaggādivasena
tika-s0101t:82_5: edisoti attho. Attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:82_6: “tassa vaggesu…pe… vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti āha. Kasmā pana catūsu āgamesu dīghāgamo
tika-s0101t:82_7: paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto, tattha ca sīlakkhandhavaggo ādito nikkhitto, tasmiñca brahmajālanti?
tika-s0101t:82_8: Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi na pavattati, api ca saddhāvahaguṇato dīghanikāyo paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0101t:82_9: saṅgīto. Saddhā hi kusaladhammānaṃ bījaṃ. Yathāha – “saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhī”ti,
tika-s0101t:82_10: saddhāvahaguṇatā cassa dassitāyeva. Kiñca katipayasuttasaṅgahato, appaparimāṇato
tika-s0101t:82_12: ca. Sīlakathābāhullato pana sīlakkhandhavaggo paṭhamaṃ nikkhitto. Sīlañhi sāsanassa
tika-s0101t:82_13: ādi, sīlapatiṭṭhānattā sabbaguṇānaṃ. Tenevāha – “tasmā tiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, ādimeva
tika-s0101t:82_14: visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddha”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t:82_15: Etena cassa vaggassa anvatthasaññatā vuttā hoti. Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathābhāvato pana
tika-s0101t:82_16: suttantapiṭakassa niravasesadiṭṭhivibhajanaṃ brahmajālaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:82_17: Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane brahmajālasadisaṃ diṭṭhigatāni niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā
tika-s0101t:84_0: Yassā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, taṃ, tassā
tika-s0101t:84_1: ca tantiāruḷhāya idha vacane kāraṇaṃ dassento “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti…pe… veditabbā”ti
tika-s0101t:84_2: āha. Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā, paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ
tika-s0101t:84_3: saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti, etena taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānaṃ suttānañca ādipariyosānesu,
tika-s0101t:84_4: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Mahāvisayattā,
tika-s0101t:84_5: pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti, paṭhamā mahāsaṅgīti paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti,
tika-s0101t:84_6: tassā pavattikālo paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikālo, tasmiṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle. Nidānanti
tika-s0101t:84_7: ca desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ. Sattānaṃ
tika-s0101t:84_9: “buddho bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomato veneyyānaṃ maggaphalappattīnaṃ hetubhūtā
tika-s0101t:84_10: kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha – “dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0101t:84_11: Tattha saddhindriyādidhammoyeva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ. Atha vā cakkanti
tika-s0101t:84_12: āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
tika-s0101t:85: “Dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t:86_0: “Katabuddhakicce”ti etena buddhakattabbassa kassacipi asesitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Nanu
tika-s0101t:86_1: ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā honti, yato sāvakabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0101t:86_2: “buddhavacana”nti vuccati, sāvakavineyyā ca na tāva vinītāti? Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanupāyassa
tika-s0101t:87_0: “Na tāvāhaṃ, pāpima, parinibbāyissāmi, yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā
tika-s0101t:87_1: vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā…pe… uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ
tika-s0101t:88_1: gāhassa micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ, loke jātasaṃvaddhabhāvadassanatthañca. Tathā hi
tika-s0101t:88_3: karontīti. Upādīyate kammakilesehīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. So pana
tika-s0101t:88_4: upādi kilesābhisaṅkhāramāranimmathanena nibbānappattiyaṃ anossaṭṭho, idha khandhamaccumāranimmathanena
tika-s0101t:88_5: ossaṭṭho nissesitoti ayaṃ anupādisesā, nibbānadhātu. Nibbānadhātūti cettha nibbutimattaṃ
tika-s0101t:88_7: na “sannipatitāna”nti etassa visesanaṃ, ussāhajananassa pana visesanaṃ, “dhātubhājanadivase
tika-s0101t:88_8: bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesī”ti. Dhātubhājanadivasato hi purimapurimataradivasesu bhikkhū
tika-s0101t:88_9: samāgatāti. Atha vā dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitānaṃ kāyasāmaggīvasena sahitānanti
tika-s0101t:88_10: attho. Saṅghassa thero saṅghatthero, so pana saṅgho kiṃ parimāṇānanti āha – “sattannaṃ
tika-s0101t:88_11: bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti. Niccasāpekkhatāya hi edisesu samāso hotiyeva, yathā – “devadattassa garukula”nti.
tika-s0101t:89_0: Āyasmā mahākassapo puna dullabhabhāvaṃ maññamāno bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho.
tika-s0101t:89_2: imināpi padena sambandhanīyaṃ. Subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena vuttavacanamanussarantoti
tika-s0101t:89_3: sambandho. Tattha anussaranto dhammasaṃvegavasenāti adhippāyo. “Saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ
tika-s0101t:89_4: saṅgāyeyyaṃ…pe… ciraṭṭhitikaṃ tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissatī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ
tika-s0101t:89_5: “iti cintayanto”ti etena sambandho. Tathā “yañcāha”nti etassa “anuggahito pasaṃsito”ti
tika-s0101t:89_6: etena sambandho. Yaṃ pāpabhikkhūti ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena
tika-s0101t:89_7: kāraṇena antaradhāpeyyuṃ, tadetaṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjatīti attho, addhaniyanti addhānamaggagāmi,
tika-s0101t:90_0: Yañcāhanti ettha yanti yasmā, yena kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ,
tika-s0101t:90_1: tena “anuggahito pasaṃsito”ti ettha anuggaṇhanaṃ pasaṃsanañca parāmasati. “Cīvare
tika-s0101t:90_2: sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti ettha “attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idha attanā-saddaṃ ānetvā
tika-s0101t:90_3: cīvare attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti yojetabbaṃ. Yassa yena hi sambandho dūraṭṭhampi
tika-s0101t:90_4: ca tassa tanti atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti
tika-s0101t:90_5: yojanīyaṃ, etassāpi hi karaṇaniddesassa sahayogakattutthajotakattasambhavato. Yāvadeti
tika-s0101t:90_6: yāvadeva, yattakaṃ kālaṃ, yattake vā samāpattivihāre, abhiññāvihāre vā ākaṅkhanto
tika-s0101t:90_7: viharāmi ceva voharāmi ca, tathā kassapopīti attho. Idañca navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññabhāvasāmaññena
tika-s0101t:90_8: thutimattaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ
tika-s0101t:90_11: kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati, aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti adhippāyo. “Nanu maṃ
tika-s0101t:91_0: Tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato parato. Pure adhammo dippatīti apināma
tika-s0101t:91_1: dibbati, yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho hoti, tato puretaramevāti attho.
tika-s0101t:91_2: Āsanne anicchite hi ayaṃ pure-saddo. Dippatīti ca dippissati. Puresaddasanniyogena
tika-s0101t:91_3: hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānappayogo, yathā – “purā vassati devo”ti.
tika-s0101t:92_2: saha paṭisambhidāhi pana tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiyā ukkaṃsagatattā
tika-s0101t:92_3: saṅgītiyā bahupakārataṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake, apaccakkhaṃ nāma
tika-s0101t:92_4: natthi paguṇappavattibhāvato, samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana “asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma
tika-s0101t:92_5: natthī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ “dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttampi bhagavato santike paṭiggahitamevāti
tika-s0101t:92_6: katvā vuttaṃ. Caturāsītisahassānīti dhammakkhandhe sandhāyāha. Pavattinoti paguṇāni.
tika-s0101t:92_7: Ānandattherassa navappāyāya parisāya vibbhamanena mahākassapatthero evamāha – “na
tika-s0101t:92_8: vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti. Tattha mattanti pamāṇaṃ. Chandā āgamanaṃ viyāti padavibhāgo.
tika-s0101t:92_9: “Kiñcāpi sekkho”ti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ, asekkhānameva
tika-s0101t:92_10: pana uccinitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggeneva hi cattāri agatigamanāni pahīyantīti.
tika-s0101t:92_11: “Abhabbo chandā…pe… agatiṃ gantu”nti ca dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa yogyabhāvadassanena
tika-s0101t:93_0: Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viya gocaro, bhikkhācaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Visabhāgapuggalo
tika-s0101t:93_1: subhaddasadiso. Sattipañjaranti sattikhaggādihatthehi purisehi mallarājūnaṃ bhagavato
tika-s0101t:93_2: dhātuārakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāyāha. Taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ karotūti saṅgāhakena
tika-s0101t:93_3: chinditabbaṃ chinditvā ekantakaraṇīyaṃ karotūti attho. Mahājananti bahujanaṃ. Gandhakuṭiṃ
tika-s0101t:93_4: vanditvā paribhogacetiyabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Yathā tanti yathā aññopi yathāvuttasabhāvo,
tika-s0101t:93_5: evanti attho. Saṃvejesīti “nanu bhagavatā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ – ‘sabbeheva piyehi
tika-s0101t:93_6: manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo”’tiādinā saṃvegaṃ janesi. Ussannadhātukanti upacitadosaṃ.
tika-s0101t:93_7: Bhesajjamattāti appakaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Appattho hi ayaṃ mattā-saddo, “mattāsukhapariccāgo”tiādīsu
tika-s0101t:93_8: viya. Dutiyadivaseti devatāya saṃvejitadivasato, jetavanavihāraṃ paviṭṭhadivasato
tika-s0101t:94_0: Etadagganti eso aggo. Liṅgavipallāsena hi ayaṃ niddeso. Yadidanti ca yo ayaṃ, yadidaṃ
tika-s0101t:94_1: khandhapañcakanti vā yojetabbaṃ. “Paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti
tika-s0101t:94_2: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti? No na yutto,
tika-s0101t:94_3: bhagavatā paññattānukkamena pātimokkhuddesānukkamena ca paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā.
tika-s0101t:94_4: Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni, visesato
tika-s0101t:94_6: dassitena saha tadavasiṭṭhampi saṅgahetvā dassanavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamapārājiketi
tika-s0101t:94_7: paṭhamapārājikapāḷiyaṃ, tenevāha – “na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-s0101t:95_0: Jātakādike khuddakanikāyapariyāpanne, yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭake
tika-s0101t:95_1: saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ, na pana dīghanikāyādippakāre suttantapiṭake, nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte
tika-s0101t:95_2: vinayapiṭaketi dīghabhāṇakā “jātakādīnaṃ abhidhammapiṭake saṅgaho”ti vadanti. Cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsānañcettha
tika-s0101t:95_3: aggahaṇaṃ, jātakagatikattā. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:95_4: yathānulomadesanābhāvato tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto, na pana sabhāvadhammaniddesabhūte
tika-s0101t:96_3: vā, aggaphalanipphādanato, vimuttikiccaṃ vā, kilesānaṃ accantaṃ vimuttisampādanato.
tika-s0101t:97_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0101t:97_1: paṭipajjamāne apāyapatanādito dhāraṇena dhammo, idhādhippete pana dhammavinaye niddhāretuṃ
tika-s0101t:97_2: “tattha vinayapiṭaka”ntiādimāha. Avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammo, khandhādivasena sabhāvadhammadesanābāhullato.
tika-s0101t:97_3: Atha vā yadipi dhammoyeva vinayopi, pariyattiyādibhāvato, vinayasaddasannidhāne pana
tika-s0101t:97_4: bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhamma-saddo vinayatantividhuraṃ tantiṃ dīpeti yathā
tika-s0101t:98_0: “Anekajātisaṃsāra”nti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ
tika-s0101t:98_1: paccavekkhantena ekūnavīsatimassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa anantaraṃ bhāsitā. Tenāha
tika-s0101t:98_2: “idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti. Idaṃ kira sabbabuddhehi avijahitaṃ udānaṃ. Ayamassa
tika-s0101t:98_3: saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena
tika-s0101t:98_4: ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā, tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro
tika-s0101t:98_5: ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ
tika-s0101t:98_6: taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ. Yasmā jarāvyādhimaraṇamissatāya
tika-s0101t:98_7: jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā
tika-s0101t:98_8: taṃ gavesanto sandhāvissanti attho. Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena
tika-s0101t:98_9: diṭṭho asi. Puna gehanti puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ. Na kāhasi na karissasi.
tika-s0101t:98_10: Tava sabbā avasesākilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā. Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa
tika-s0101t:98_11: kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ. Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0101t:98_12: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ idāni mama cittaṃ, ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0101t:98_13: arahattamaggaṃ ajjhagā adhigato pattosmīti. Ayaṃ manasā pavattitadhammānamādi. “Yadā
tika-s0101t:98_14: have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānaṃ ādīti vadanti. Antojappanavasena
tika-s0101t:98_16: na etena sambandhitabbaṃ, “paccavekkhantassa uppannā”ti etena pana sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:98_17: Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
tika-s0101t:99_1: taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato. Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva ca
tika-s0101t:99_2: tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ dassento sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:99_3: aviparītaṃ nibbānagāminippaṭipadaṃ pakāsetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni tattha sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:99_4: niyojeti “appamādena sampādethā”ti. Atha vā “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena
tika-s0101t:99_5: saṃvejetvā “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:99_6: Appamādapadañhi sikkhāttayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-s0101t:100_1: paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ asaṅgīta”nti vadanti, taṃ pana na yujjati. Paṭhamasaṅgītito puretarameva
tika-s0101t:100_2: hi āyasmatā ānandena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa bhāsitanti.
tika-s0101t:101: Daḷhikammasithilīkaraṇappayojanā yathākkamaṃ pakatisāvajjapaṇṇattisāvajjesu sikkhāpadesu. Tenāti vividhanayattādinā. Etanti vividhavisesanayattāti gāthāvacanaṃ. Etassāti vinayassa.
tika-s0101t:102_0: Attatthaparatthādibhedeti yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati, suṇāti, vāceti, cinteti, deseti
tika-s0101t:102_1: ca, suttena saṅgahito sīlādiattho tassāpi hoti, tena parassa sādhetabbato parassāpi
tika-s0101t:102_2: hotīti, tadubhayaṃ taṃ suttaṃ sūceti dīpeti. Tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttarañcāti
tika-s0101t:102_3: evamādibhede atthe ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhāti. Attha-saddo cāyaṃ hitapariyāyavacanaṃ,
tika-s0101t:102_4: na bhāsitatthavacanaṃ, yadi siyā, suttaṃ attanopi bhāsitatthaṃ sūceti, parassāpīti
tika-s0101t:102_5: ayamattho vutto siyā. Suttena ca yo attho pakāsito so tasseva hotīti, na tena parattho
tika-s0101t:102_6: sūcito hoti, tena sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā atthagahaṇañca
tika-s0101t:102_7: na kattabbaṃ. Attatthaparatthavinimmuttassa bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na
tika-s0101t:102_8: kattabbaṃ. Tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa atthassa sutte asambhavato suttadhārassa
tika-s0101t:103_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā vuttā “na haññadatthatthipasaṃsalābhā”ti
tika-s0101t:103_1: etassa padassa niddese “attattho, parattho, ubhayattho, diṭṭhadhammiko attho, samparāyiko
tika-s0101t:103_2: attho, uttāno attho, gambhīro attho, gūḷho attho, paṭicchanno attho, neyyo attho,
tika-s0101t:103_3: nīto attho, anavajjo attho, nikkileso attho, vodāno attho, paramattho”ti te suttaṃ
tika-s0101t:103_4: sūcetīti attho. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe attha-saddo bhāsitatthapariyāyopi hoti. Ettha
tika-s0101t:103_5: hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā, tato pare cha bhāsitatthabhedā, pacchimakā
tika-s0101t:103_6: pana ubhayasabhāvā. Tattha duradhigamatāya vibhāvane aladdhagādho gambhīro. Na vivaṭo
tika-s0101t:103_7: gūḷho. Mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno. Niddhāretvā
tika-s0101t:103_8: ñāpetabbo neyyo. Yathārutavasena veditabbo nīto. Anavajjanikkilesavodānā pariyāyavasena
tika-s0101t:103_9: vuttā, kusalavipākakiriyādhammavasena vā. Paramattho nibbānaṃ, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo
tika-s0101t:103_10: eva vā. Atha vā “attanā ca appiccho hotī”ti attatthaṃ, “appicchākathañca paresaṃ
tika-s0101t:103_11: kattā hotī”ti paratthaṃ sūceti. Evaṃ “attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādi
tika-s0101t:103_12: suttāni yojetabbāni. Vinayābhidhammehi ca visesetvā sutta-saddassa attho vattabbo.
tika-s0101t:103_13: Tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya desanāya attahitaparahitatādīni sātisayaṃ pakāsitāni
tika-s0101t:103_14: hoti tapparabhāvato, na āṇādhammasabhāvavasappavattāyāti idameva ca “atthānaṃ sūcanato sutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:104_0: Sutte ca āṇādhammasabhāvā ca veneyyajjhāsayaṃ anuvattanti, na vinayābhidhammesu viya
tika-s0101t:104_2: suttantadesanā hotīti “suvuttā cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pasavatīti phalati. “Suttāṇā”ti
tika-s0101t:104_3: etassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “suṭṭhu ca ne tāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Attatthādividhānesu ca suttassa
tika-s0101t:104_5: suttassa. Vinayābhidhammehi visesanañca yojetabbaṃ. Etanti “atthānaṃ sūcanato”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0101t:105_0: Abhikkamantīti ettha abhi-saddo kamanakiriyāya vuddhibhāvaṃ atirekataṃ dīpeti, abhiññātā
tika-s0101t:105_1: abhilakkhitāti ettha ñāṇalakkhaṇakiriyānaṃ supākaṭatāvisesaṃ, abhikkantenāti ettha
tika-s0101t:105_2: kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhatanti yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā upasaggassa. Abhirājā abhivinayeti
tika-s0101t:105_3: pana pūjitaparicchinnesu rājavinayesu abhi-saddo pavattatīti kathametaṃ yujjeyyāti?
tika-s0101t:105_4: Pūjanaparicchedanakiriyādīpanato, tāhi ca kiriyāhi rājavinayānaṃ yuttattā. Ettha
tika-s0101t:105_5: hi atimālādīsu ati-saddo viya, abhi-saddo yathā saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinaya-saddā
tika-s0101t:105_6: siddhā, evaṃ abhidhammasadde abhi-saddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ dīpetīti
tika-s0101t:106_0: Bhāvanāpharaṇavuḍḍhīhi vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā. Ārammaṇādīhīti ārammaṇasampayuttakammadvārapaṭipadādīhi.
tika-s0101t:106_1: Avisiṭṭhanti aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu vinayasuttābhidhammesu avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ. Taṃ piṭakasaddanti
tika-s0101t:107_0: Kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-s0101t:107_2: Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathā.
tika-s0101t:107_3: Kathīyati vā etthāti kathā. Saṃvarāsaṃvarassa kathā saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā. Esa nayo
tika-s0101t:107_4: itaresupi. Bheda-saddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo “desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedañca
tika-s0101t:107_5: yathārahaṃ paridīpaye”ti. Bhedanti ca nānattanti attho. Sikkhā ca pahānāni ca gambhīrabhāvo
tika-s0101t:107_6: ca sikkhāppahānagambhīrabhāvaṃ, tañca paridīpaye. Ettha yathāti upārambhanissaraṇadhammakosarakkhaṇahetupariyāpuṇanaṃ
tika-s0101t:107_7: suppaṭipatti duppaṭipattīti etehi pakārehi. Āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahatīti āṇāraho sammāsambuddhattā.
tika-s0101t:107_8: Vohāraparamatthānampi sabbhāvato āha āṇābāhullatoti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Pacurāparādhā
tika-s0101t:107_9: seyyasakādayo. Ajjhāsayo āsayova atthato diṭṭhi, ñāṇañca. Vuttañcetaṃ –
tika-s0101t:110_1: atītā paccuppannā ca tatheva vuccanti. Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthīti.
tika-s0101t:110_2: Cariyāti cha mūlacariyā, antarabhedena anekavidhā, saṃsaggavasena tesaṭṭhi honti.
tika-s0101t:110_3: Te pana amhehi asammohantaradhānasuttaṭīkāyaṃ vibhāgato dassitā, atthikehi tato gahetabbā.
tika-s0101t:110_4: Atha vā cariyāti caritaṃ, taṃ sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ. Adhimutti nāma sattānaṃ
tika-s0101t:110_5: pubbaparicayavasena abhiruci, sā duvidhā hīnapaṇītabhedena. Ghanavinibbhogābhāvato
tika-s0101t:110_6: diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena “ahaṃ mamā”ti saññino. Mahanto saṃvaro asaṃvaro. Buddhiattho
tika-s0101t:111_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanā paṭivedhāti ettha tantiattho tantidesanā tantiatthapaṭivedho
tika-s0101t:111_1: ca tantivisayā hontīti vinayapiṭakādīnaṃ atthadesanāpaṭivedhādhārabhāvo yutto, piṭakāni
tika-s0101t:111_2: pana tanti yevāti tesaṃ dhammādhārabhāvo kathaṃ yujjeyyāti? Tantisamudāyassa avayavatantiyā
tika-s0101t:111_3: ādhārabhāvato. Avayavassa hi samudāyo ādhārabhāvena vuccati, yathā – “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
tika-s0101t:111_4: Dhammādīnañca dukkhogāhabhāvato tehi vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnañca catubbidho
tika-s0101t:111_5: gambhīrabhāvo vutto. Tasmā dhammādayo eva dukkhogāhattā gambhīrā, na vinayādayoti
tika-s0101t:111_6: na codetabbametaṃ samukhena, visayavisayīmukhena ca vinayādīnaṃyeva gambhīrabhāvassa
tika-s0101t:111_7: vuttattā. Dhammo hi vinayādayo, tesaṃ visayo attho, dhammatthavisayā ca desanāpaṭivedhoti.
tika-s0101t:111_8: Tattha paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ, desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya
tika-s0101t:111_9: ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo, paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā, tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā
tika-s0101t:112_0: “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti?
tika-s0101t:112_2: ñāṇa”nti vuttattā. “Dhamme paṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “dhamme”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena
tika-s0101t:112_3: “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ, “paṭisambhidā”ti etassa ca atthaṃ dassentena “ñāṇa”nti. Tasmā
tika-s0101t:112_4: hetudhamma-saddā ekatthā, ñāṇapaṭisambhidā-saddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito
tika-s0101t:112_5: dhammassa hetubhāvo, atthassa hetuphalabhāvo ca evameva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t:113_0: Yathādhammanti cettha dhamma-saddo hetuṃ hetuphalañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabhāvavācako
tika-s0101t:113_1: hesa, na pariyattihetubhāvavācako, tasmā yathādhammanti yo yo avijjāsaṅkhārādidhammo,
tika-s0101t:113_2: tasmiṃ tasminti attho. Dhammānurūpaṃ vā yathādhammaṃ. Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya
tika-s0101t:113_5: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti ettha vuttaṃ sabhāvadhammaniruttiṃ dasseti, saddasabhāvattā
tika-s0101t:113_6: desanāya. Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:113_7: vutto. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā saddārammaṇatā
tika-s0101t:113_8: dassitā. “Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācako”ti vacanavacanīye vavatthapetvā taṃtaṃvacanīya
tika-s0101t:113_9: vibhāvanavasena pavattito hi saddo desanāti. “Anulomādivasena vā kathana”nti etena
tika-s0101t:113_10: tassā dhammaniruttiyā abhilāpaṃ kathanaṃ tassa vacanassa pavattanaṃ dasseti. “Adhippāyo”ti
tika-s0101t:113_11: etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na
tika-s0101t:114_0: Nanu ca “dhammo tantī”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassa saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ
tika-s0101t:114_1: viseso na siyāti? Na, tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto, uggahaṇādivasena
tika-s0101t:114_2: ca pubbe vavatthāpito saddappabandho dhammo, pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito
tika-s0101t:114_3: tadatthappakāsako saddo desanāti. Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo
tika-s0101t:114_4: desanā, musāvādādayo viya. “Vacanassa pavattana”nti ca yathāvuttacittuppādavasena
tika-s0101t:114_5: yujjati. So hi vacanaṃ pavatteti, tañca tena pavattīyati desīyati. “So ca lokiyalokuttaro”ti
tika-s0101t:114_6: evaṃ vuttaṃ abhisamayaṃ yena pakārena abhisameti, yaṃ abhisameti, yo ca tassa sabhāvo,
tika-s0101t:114_7: tehi pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “visayato asammohato ca atthānurūpaṃ dhammesū”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0101t:114_9: lokiyo abhisamayo, asammohato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nibbānārammaṇo
tika-s0101t:114_11: Abhisamayato aññampi paṭivedhatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesaṃ tesaṃ vā”tiādimāha. ‘Paṭivedhanaṃ
tika-s0101t:114_12: paṭivedho’ti iminā hi vacanatthena abhisamayo, ‘paṭivijjhīyatīti paṭivedho’ti iminā
tika-s0101t:115_0: Yathāvuttehi dhammādīhi piṭakānaṃ gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t:115_1: Yo cetthāti etesu taṃtaṃpiṭakagatesu dhammādīsu yo paṭivedho, etesu ca piṭakesu tesaṃ
tika-s0101t:115_2: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yo aviparītasabhāvoti yojetabbaṃ. Dukkhogāhatā ca avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:115_3: dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya, tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato taṃdesanāya, paṭivedhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0101t:116_0: Yanti yaṃ pariyattiduggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atthanti bhāsitatthaṃ, payojanatthañca.
tika-s0101t:116_1: Na upaparikkhantīti na vicārenti. Na nijjhānaṃ khamantīti nijjhānapaññaṃ nakkhamanti,
tika-s0101t:116_2: nijjhāyitvā paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo. Itīti evaṃ etāya
tika-s0101t:116_3: pariyattiyā. Vādappamokkhānisaṃsā attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa pamokkhappayojanā
tika-s0101t:116_4: hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, vādappamokkhā vā nindāpamokkhā. Yassa catthāyāti yassa
tika-s0101t:116_5: ca sīlādipūraṇassa anupādāvimokkhassa vā atthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti ñāyena pariyāpuṇantīti
tika-s0101t:116_6: adhippāyo. Assāti assa dhammassa. Nānubhontīti na vindanti. Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitattā
tika-s0101t:116_8: Bhaṇḍāgāre niyutto bhaṇḍāgāriko, bhaṇḍāgāriko viya bhaṇḍāgāriko, dhammaratanānupālako.
tika-s0101t:116_9: Aññatthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.
tika-s0101t:117_1: pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Verañjakaṇḍe hi tisso vijjāva vibhattā. Dutiye
tika-s0101t:117_2: pana “tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ, na tisso vijjā.
tika-s0101t:117_3: Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu antogadhāti sutte vibhattā yevāti.
tika-s0101t:118_0: Duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti, “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ
tika-s0101t:118_1: viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”ntiādinā. Dhammacintanti dhammasabhāvavicāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0101t:118_2: “cittuppādamatteneva dānaṃ hoti, sayameva cittaṃ attano ārammaṇaṃ hoti, sabbaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0101t:118_3: asabhāvadhammārammaṇa”nti ca evamādi. Tesanti tesaṃ piṭakānaṃ.
tika-s0101t:119_0: Etanti etaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Atthānulomato anulomiko. Anulomikataṃyeva vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā
tika-s0101t:119_1: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekanikāyampīti ekasamūhampi. Poṇikā cikkhallikā ca khattiyā, tesaṃ
tika-s0101t:120_0: Navappabhedanti ettha kathaṃ navappabhedaṃ? Sagāthakañhi suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakañca
tika-s0101t:120_1: suttaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ, tadubhayavinimuttañca suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṃ natthi,
tika-s0101t:120_2: yaṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā, maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā, gāthābhāvato, dhammapadādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:120_3: viya, geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā, sagāthakattā, sagāthavaggassa viya, tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu
tika-s0101t:123_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi. Tenevāha āyasmā mahākaccāno
tika-s0101t:123_2: sakavāde pañcasuttasatānī”ti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:124_0: Visesavidhayo pare sanimittā tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena
tika-s0101t:124_1: patiṭṭhitā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ
tika-s0101t:124_2: sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ ‘geyya’nti vadanti. Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā
tika-s0101t:124_4: vuccati, byākaraṇameva veyyākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena
tika-s0101t:124_5: pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, geyyādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato,
tika-s0101t:124_6: ‘gāthāvirahe satī’ti visesitattā ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu,
tika-s0101t:124_9: patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu
tika-s0101t:124_10: jātakasaññā, satipi pañhāvissajjanabhāve, sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa
tika-s0101t:124_11: labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu
tika-s0101t:124_12: tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo.
tika-s0101t:124_13: Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ, taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya
tika-s0101t:124_14: pavattanatoti. Nanu ca sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti
tika-s0101t:124_15: suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā vāti? Na tadavatthā, sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi
tika-s0101t:124_16: pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
tika-s0101t:125_0: Yañca vuttaṃ – “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-s0101t:125_1: niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo
tika-s0101t:125_2: viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, atha kho suttabhāvena. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suttanāmaka”nti
tika-s0101t:125_3: nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yañca pana vuttaṃ – “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tadapi
tika-s0101t:125_4: natthi, yasmā sahatāññena. Saha gāthāhīti hi sagāthakaṃ. Sahabhāvo nāma atthato aññena
tika-s0101t:125_5: hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu kathāvinimutto koci suttapadeso atthi, yo ‘saha gāthāhī’ti
tika-s0101t:125_6: vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi, yadapi vuttaṃ – “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ
tika-s0101t:125_7: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti tadapi na, aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0101t:125_8: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti. Evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:126_0: “Ayaṃ dhammo…pe… ayaṃ vinayo, imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ
tika-s0101t:132: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā, idāni taṃ nigamanavasena dassetuṃ “imissā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t:133_0: 1. Ettāvatā ca brahmajālassa sādhāraṇato bāhiranidānaṃ dassetvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ
tika-s0101t:133_1: saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “tattha eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā chahi ākārehi saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā sambandhato
tika-s0101t:133_2: padato padavibhāgato padatthato anuyogato parihārato cāti. Tattha sambandho nāma
tika-s0101t:133_3: desanāsambandho. Yaṃ lokiyā “ummugghāto”ti vadanti. So pana pāḷiyā nidānapāḷivasena,
tika-s0101t:133_4: nidānapāḷiyā pana saṅgītivasena veditabboti paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassentena nidānapāḷiyā
tika-s0101t:133_5: sambandhassa dassitattā padādivasena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karonto “evanti nipātapada”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0101t:133_6: “Metiādīnī”ti ettha antarā-sadda-ca-saddānaṃ nipātapadabhāvo, vattabbo, na vā vattabbo
tika-s0101t:133_7: tesaṃ nayaggahaṇena gahitattā, tadavasiṭṭhānaṃ āpaṭi-saddānaṃ ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhanato.
tika-s0101t:133_8: “Padavibhāgo”ti padānaṃ viseso, na pana padaviggaho. Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo
tika-s0101t:133_9: ca padavibhāgo, padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahāpi
tika-s0101t:133_10: padavibhāga saddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha padaviggaho “bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho”tiādibhedesu padesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t:134_0: Atthatoti padatthato. Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃ-saddassa
tika-s0101t:134_1: dassento “evaṃsaddo tāvā”tiādimāha. Avadhāraṇādīti ettha ādi-saddena idamatthapucchāparimāṇādiatthānaṃ
tika-s0101t:134_2: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evaṃgatāni, evaṃvidho, evamākāro”tiādīsu idaṃ-saddassa
tika-s0101t:134_3: atthe evaṃ-saddo. Gata-saddo hi pakārapariyāyo, tathā vidhākāra-saddā ca. Tathā hi
tika-s0101t:134_4: vidhayuttagata-sadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho,
tika-s0101t:134_5: kathaṃ nu kho”ti, “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassu, āmuttamālābharaṇā
tika-s0101t:134_6: odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti, seyyathāpi
tika-s0101t:134_7: tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti? No hidaṃ bho gotamā”ti ca ādīsu pucchāyaṃ. “Evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ,
tika-s0101t:134_8: evaṃ āyupariyanto”ti ca ādīsu parimāṇe. Nanu ca “evaṃ nu kho, evaṃ su te, evaṃ āyupariyanto”ti
tika-s0101t:134_9: ettha evaṃ-saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ-saddo
tika-s0101t:134_10: ti? Na, visesasabbhāvato. Ākāramattavācako hettha ākāratthoti adhippeto, yathā “evaṃ
tika-s0101t:134_11: byākhotiādīsu pana na ākāravisesavācako evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni
tika-s0101t:134_12: upamādīsu udāharaṇāni upapannāni honti. Tathā hi “yathāpi…pe… bahu”nti? Ettha puppharāsiṭṭhāniyato
tika-s0101t:134_15: maccena sattena kattabbāti joditattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva upamā, tesaṃ upamākāro
tika-s0101t:134_16: yathā-saddena aniyamato vuttoti evaṃ-saddo upamākāranigamanatthoti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:134_17: So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0101t:135_0: Tathā evaṃ iminā ākārena “abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya
tika-s0101t:135_1: ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro, so atthato upadesoyevāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ te…pe…
tika-s0101t:135_2: upadese”ti. Tathā evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatāti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:135_3: aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:135_4: sampahaṃsanaṃ, yo tattha sampahaṃsanākāroti yojetabbaṃ. Evamevaṃ panāyanti ettha
tika-s0101t:135_5: garahaṇākāroti yojetabbaṃ. So ca garahaṇākāro “vasalī”tiādi khuṃsanasaddasannidhānato
tika-s0101t:135_6: idha evaṃ-saddena pakāsitoti viññāyati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena
tika-s0101t:135_7: vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca vadehīti “yathāhaṃ
tika-s0101t:135_8: vadāmi, evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehī”ti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃ-saddena nidassīyatīti
tika-s0101t:135_9: nidassanattho vutto. Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve
tika-s0101t:135_10: sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti, no vā, kathaṃ vā ettha
tika-s0101t:135_11: hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-saddena
tika-s0101t:135_12: vibhāvitanti viññāyati, so pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno
tika-s0101t:135_13: avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha “evaṃ no ettha hotīti ādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti. Evaṃ bhanteti
tika-s0101t:135_14: pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa
tika-s0101t:135_15: paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-saddo vacanasampaṭicchanattho vutto, tena evaṃ
tika-s0101t:135_16: bhante, sādhu bhante, suṭṭhu bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t:136_1: vā ādhārādibhedavasena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā, nayā vā pāḷigatiyo, tā ca paññattianupaññattiādivasena
tika-s0101t:136_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā, tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhasukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ. Āsayova
tika-s0101t:136_5: ajjhāsayo, te ca sassatādibhedena, tattha ca apparajakkhatādivasena anekā, attajjhāsayādayo
tika-s0101t:136_6: eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthabyañjanasampannanti
tika-s0101t:137_1: pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti. Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi, ye haritabbā.
tika-s0101t:137_2: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ
tika-s0101t:137_3: pavattati, tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0101t:137_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato
tika-s0101t:137_5: “pāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā
tika-s0101t:137_6: titthiyā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena, diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena
tika-s0101t:137_7: ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti
tika-s0101t:137_8: etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0101t:137_9: tasmā samāhite citte, vigatūpakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0101t:137_10: paṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:137_11: paṭihāriyaṃ. Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena, katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:137_12: puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni
tika-s0101t:137_13: hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti. Paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye
tika-s0101t:137_14: bhavaṃ ekekaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0101t:137_15: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena
tika-s0101t:137_16: visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāya labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0101t:138_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho, na pana bhagavato
tika-s0101t:138_1: desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato desanā. Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena
tika-s0101t:138_2: ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Dhāraṇabaladassanañca na virujjhati
tika-s0101t:138_3: sutākārāvirajjhanassa adhippetattā. Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ
tika-s0101t:138_4: ekavisayattā, itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamattho cāti āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0101t:139_0: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyaṃ vattanato
tika-s0101t:139_1: tividhopi me-saddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena
tika-s0101t:139_2: pana vijjamānabhedaṃ sandhāyāha “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti.
tika-s0101t:140_0: Kiñcāpi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti, jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ suta-saddo eva
tika-s0101t:140_1: taṃ tamatthaṃ anuvadatīti anupasaggassa suta-saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:140_2: na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti āha. Assāti suta-saddassa.
tika-s0101t:140_3: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha suta-sadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti
tika-s0101t:140_4: vā attho”ti. Mayāti atthe satīti yadā mesaddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso, tadāti
tika-s0101t:140_5: attho. Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0101t:141_0: Sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃsaddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0101t:141_2: tadabhinihaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ
tika-s0101t:141_3: evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutaṃ evāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti,
tika-s0101t:141_4: etena avadhāraṇena nirākataṃ dasseti. Yathā ca sutaṃ sutaṃ evāti niyametabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0101t:141_5: sammā sutaṃ hotīti āha “anūnādhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti. Atha vā “saddantaratthāpohanavasena
tika-s0101t:141_6: saddo atthaṃ vadatī”ti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti,
tika-s0101t:141_7: iminā diṭṭhādivinivattanaṃ karoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Na idaṃ mayā diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0101t:141_8: sacchikataṃ, atha kho sutaṃ, tañca kho sammadevāti. Tenevāha “anūnādhikāviparītaggahaṇanidassana”nti.
tika-s0101t:141_9: Avadhāraṇatthe vā evaṃ-sadde ayaṃ atthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa suta-saddassa
tika-s0101t:142_1: dassetvā idāni pakārantarehipi taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti
tika-s0101t:142_2: yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0101t:142_3: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “sotadvārānusārenā”ti.
tika-s0101t:142_5: imissā yojanāya ākārattho evaṃ-saddo gahitoti dīpeti. Pavattibhāvappakāsananti pavattiyā
tika-s0101t:142_6: atthibhāvappakāsanaṃ. “Sutanti dhammappakāsana”nti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi
tika-s0101t:142_7: nānappakārena pavattā, tassa dhammattā vuttaṃ, na sutasaddassa dhammatthattā. Vuttassevatthassa
tika-s0101t:142_8: pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ “ayañhetthā”tiādi. Tattha viññāṇavīthiyāti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Mayāti katthuatthe.
tika-s0101t:143_0: “Evanti niddisitabbappakāsana”nti nidassanatthaṃ evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nidassetabbassa
tika-s0101t:143_1: niddisitabbattābhāvābhāvato, tena evaṃ-saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti.
tika-s0101t:143_3: tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti. Na hi puggalavohārarahite
tika-s0101t:144_0: “Yassa cittasantānassā”tiādipi ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā
tika-s0101t:144_1: atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva, dhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:144_2: pavattiākārupādānavasena tathā vuttā. “Sutanti visayaniddeso”ti sotabbabhūto dhammo
tika-s0101t:144_3: savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ. Cittasantānavinimuttassa
tika-s0101t:144_4: paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0101t:144_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti.
tika-s0101t:144_7: paramatthato kattubhāvato, savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato
tika-s0101t:144_8: taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye”ti. Sutākārassa
tika-s0101t:144_9: ca therassa sammānicchitabhāvato āha “gahaṇasanniṭṭhāna”nti, etena vā avadhāraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:144_10: evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:145_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa
tika-s0101t:145_1: nidassanassa avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo evaṃ-saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa
tika-s0101t:145_3: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti
tika-s0101t:145_4: āha “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti. Meti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā,
tika-s0101t:145_7: atthāti te tathārūpapaññattiupādānabyāpārabhāvena dassento āha “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso.
tika-s0101t:145_10: kattukaraṇa byāpārakattuniddesavasena ca dutiyādayo catasso atthayojanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:146_0: Sabbassāpi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā, sabbapaññattīnañca
tika-s0101t:146_1: vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:146_2: sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha “evanti ca meti cā”tiādi. Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassa
tika-s0101t:146_3: atthassa ākārādino, dhammānañca asallakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti āha
tika-s0101t:146_5: bhūtatthauttamatthavasena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotiyo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho, anussavādīhi
tika-s0101t:146_6: gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti, so rūpasaddādisabhāvo ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo
tika-s0101t:146_7: vā attho “saccikaṭṭho, paramattha cā”ti vuccati, na tathā evaṃ meti padānamatthoti,
tika-s0101t:146_8: etamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiñhettha ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sutanti pana saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0101t:146_9: sandhāyāha “vijjamānapaññattī”ti. Teneva hi “yañhi tamettha sotena upaladdha”nti
tika-s0101t:146_10: vuttaṃ, “sotadvārānusārena upaladdha”nti pana vutte atthabyañjanādisabbaṃ labbhati.
tika-s0101t:146_11: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathaṃ āgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino
tika-s0101t:146_13: attho. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko
tika-s0101t:146_14: viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya
tika-s0101t:146_15: vattabbato”ti. Asutaṃ na hotīti hi “suta”nti pakāsito yamatthoti.
tika-s0101t:147_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ
tika-s0101t:147_1: dīpetī”ti. “Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hotī”ti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ
tika-s0101t:147_2: duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti. “Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetī”ti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā
tika-s0101t:147_3: vuttaṃ. Asammohenāti sammohābhāvena, paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarakālapaññāsiddhi,
tika-s0101t:147_4: evaṃ asammosenāti etthāpi vattabbaṃ. Byañjanānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro,
tika-s0101t:147_5: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti
tika-s0101t:147_6: vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā. Pubbaṅgamatā cettha padhānabhāvo
tika-s0101t:147_7: “manopubbaṅgamā”tiādīsu viya, pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya
tika-s0101t:147_8: appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati, evaṃ “satipubbaṅgamāyā”ti
tika-s0101t:148_2: bhāsita”ntiādi pucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena
tika-s0101t:148_3: na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. “Vikkhittacittassā”tiādi tassevatthassa samatthanavasena
tika-s0101t:148_5: viya ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthehi yonisomanasikārassa, saddhammassavanena viya ca
tika-s0101t:148_7: siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato, evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ
tika-s0101t:148_8: siddhi dassetabbā siyā assutavato, sappurisūpanissayarahitassa ca tadabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:149_0: “Na hi vikkhittacitto”tiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0101t:149_1: ca phalabhūtassa saddhammassavanassa siddhi dassitā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto
tika-s0101t:149_2: siyāsaddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0101t:149_3: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti. Evampi
tika-s0101t:149_4: avikkhepena sappurisūpanissayasiddhijotanā na samatthitāva, no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ
tika-s0101t:149_5: sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā. Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa
tika-s0101t:149_6: siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa, dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa
tika-s0101t:149_7: siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantena vassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0101t:150_1: niravasesaparahitapāripūrikāraṇanti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhaddako ākāro”ti. Yasmā na hotīti
tika-s0101t:150_3: guṇadvayaṃ. Aparāparaṃ vuttiyā cettha cakkabhāvo, caranti etehi sattā sampattibhavesūti
tika-s0101t:150_4: vā. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
tika-s0101t:150_5: catucakkaṃ vattatī”tiādi. Purimapacchimabhāvo cettha desanākkamavasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t:150_7: ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha “āsayasuddhi
tika-s0101t:150_8: siddhā hotī”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti,
tika-s0101t:150_9: “katapuññosi tvaṃ ānanda, padhānaṃ anuyuñja khippaṃ hohisi anāsavoti ca. Tenevāha
tika-s0101t:150_12: vā kāyavacīpayogassa niddosabhāvena. Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato
tika-s0101t:151_2: etena ayaṃ suta-saddo evaṃ-saddasannidhānato, vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-s0101t:151_4: manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ-saddena yojetvā,
tika-s0101t:151_6: avikkhepadīpakena suta-saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ
tika-s0101t:151_7: janeti. Tattha dhammāti pariyattidhammā. Manasānupekkhitāti “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0101t:151_8: idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anupekkhitā.
tika-s0101t:151_9: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti nijjhānakkhantibhūtāya, ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0101t:151_10: tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā paṭividdhā.
tika-s0101t:152_0: “Sakalena vacanenā”ti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ. Asappurisabhūminti
tika-s0101t:152_2: attano dahatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ. Sā eva anariyavohārāvatthā asaddhammo.
tika-s0101t:152_3: Nanu ca ānandattherassa “mamedaṃ vacana”nti adhimānassa, mahākassapattherādīnañca
tika-s0101t:152_4: tadāsaṅkāya abhāvato asappurisabhūmisamatikkamādivacanaṃ niratthakaṃ ti? Nayidaṃ
tika-s0101t:152_5: evaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato. Keci pana “devatānaṃ
tika-s0101t:152_6: parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira
tika-s0101t:152_7: khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “tathāgato ca parinibbuto,
tika-s0101t:152_8: ayañca āyasmā desanākusalo, idāni dhammaṃ deseti, sakyakulappasuto tathāgatassa bhātā
tika-s0101t:152_9: cūḷapituputto, kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikata dhammaṃ deseti, udāhu bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ
tika-s0101t:152_11: vibhāvitanti. Attano adahantoti “mameta”nti attani aṭṭhapento. Appetīti nidasseti.
tika-s0101t:152_12: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthesu yathārahaṃ satte netīti netti, dhammoyeva netti dhammanetti.
tika-s0101t:153_0: Daḷhataraniviṭṭhā vicikicchā kaṅkhā. Nātisaṃsappanaṃ matibhedamattaṃ vimati. Assaddhiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:153_1: vināseti bhagavato desitattā, sammukhā cassa paṭiggahitattā, khalitaduruttādiggahaṇadosābhāvato
tika-s0101t:153_2: ca. Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-saddaṃ
tika-s0101t:153_3: gahetvā dassitā, tato parā tisso ākāratthameva evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā vibhāvitā. Pacchimā
tika-s0101t:153_4: pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-saddaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0101t:154_0: Eka-saddo aññaseṭṭhāsahāyasaṅkhyadīsu dissati. Tathāhesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0101t:154_1: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati, “cetaso
tika-s0101t:154_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhatthe, “eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye, “ekova kho bhikkhave
tika-s0101t:154_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyayaṃ, idhāpi saṅkhyayanti dassento
tika-s0101t:154_4: āha “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti. Kālañca samayañcāti yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca.
tika-s0101t:154_5: Khaṇoti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayapaṭilābhahetuttā.
tika-s0101t:154_6: Khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo “khaṇo”ti ca “samayo”ti ca vuccati, so eko vāti hi attho.
tika-s0101t:154_7: Mahāsamayoti mahāsamūho. Samayopi khoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetupi. Samayappavādaketi
tika-s0101t:154_8: diṭṭhippavādake. Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti. Atthābhisamayāti
tika-s0101t:154_9: hitapaṭilābhā. Abhisametabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayo atthoti abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷana
tika-s0101t:154_10: ādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni. Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa
tika-s0101t:154_11: visayabhūtabhāvo abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni. Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa
tika-s0101t:154_12: taṃ samaṅgīno hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. Santāpodukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:155_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sannijjha sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati
tika-s0101t:155_1: maggabrahmacariyamettha tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha, etenava
