tika-s0101t:155_2: saṃgacchati satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi, uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya
tika-s0101t:155_3: atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ, karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena
tika-s0101t:155_4: rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-s0101t:155_5: samūho, yathā “samudāyo”ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūhoti. Avasesapaccayānaṃ
tika-s0101t:155_6: samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo, hetu yathā “samudayo”ti.
tika-s0101t:155_7: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato
tika-s0101t:155_8: vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena
tika-s0101t:155_9: hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa
tika-s0101t:155_10: yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena etabbo abhisametabboti
tika-s0101t:155_11: abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti
tika-s0101t:155_12: abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samaya-saddassa
tika-s0101t:155_13: pavatti veditabbā. Samaya-saddassa atthuddhāre abhisamaya-saddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-s0101t:155_14: veditabbaṃ. Assāti samaya-saddassa. Kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato
tika-s0101t:155_15: desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-s0101t:156_0: Kasmā panettha aniyāmitavaseneva kālo niddiṭṭho, na utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyametvāti
tika-s0101t:156_1: āha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi. Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samaya-saddassa
tika-s0101t:156_2: vacane ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha. Sāmaññajotanā hi
tika-s0101t:156_3: visese avatiṭṭhatīti. Tattha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasamayo devasikaṃ jhānasamāpattīhi
tika-s0101t:156_4: vītināmanakālo, visesato sattasattāhāni. Pakāsāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā pakampanaobhāsapātubhāvādīhi
tika-s0101t:156_5: pākaṭā. Yathāvuttappabhedesuyeva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0101t:156_6: “yo cāya”ntiādimāha. Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo.
tika-s0101t:157_0: Karaṇavacanena niddeso kato yathāti sambandho. Tatthāti abhidhammavinayesu. Tathāti
tika-s0101t:157_1: bhummakaraṇehi. Adhikaraṇattha ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:157_2: bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0101t:157_3: avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato
tika-s0101t:157_4: “pubbaṇhe jāto, sāyanhe gacchatī”ti, ca ādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi
tika-s0101t:157_5: kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:157_6: sambhūto”tiādīsu, evaṃ idhāpīti dassento āha “adhikaraṇañhi…pe… dhammāna”nti. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0101t:157_7: kāle, dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva kāle, dhammapuñje
tika-s0101t:157_8: ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho. Yathā ca gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu
tika-s0101t:157_9: āgatoti dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evaṃ idhāpi “yasmiṃ samaye, tasmiṃ
tika-s0101t:157_10: samaye”ti ca vutte satīti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhavatoti
tika-s0101t:157_11: samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā, phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyati.
tika-s0101t:157_12: Yasmiṃ samayeti yasmiṃ navame khaṇe, yonisomanasikārādihetumhi, paccayasamavāye vā
tika-s0101t:157_13: sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe, hetumhi, paccayasamavāye
tika-s0101t:157_14: ca sati phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samaya-sadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti
tika-s0101t:158_0: Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati “annena vasati, ajjhenena vasati, pharasunā chindati,
tika-s0101t:158_1: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya. Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ
tika-s0101t:158_2: puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā, vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-s0101t:158_3: teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0101t:159_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena.
tika-s0101t:159_1: Tadatthajotanatthanti accantasaṃyogatthajotanatthaṃ. Upayogavacananiddeso kato yathā “māsaṃ ajjhetī”ti.
tika-s0101t:160: Porāṇāti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Abhilāpamattabhedoti vacanamattena viseso. Tena suttavinayesu vibhattibyatayo katoti dasseti.
tika-s0101t:161: Seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Tathā uttamanti etthāpi. Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇārahatāya vā gāravayutto.
tika-s0101t:162: Vuttoyeva na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:163_0: Apica bhage vani, vamīti vā bhagavā, bhage sīlādiguṇe vani bhaji sevi, te vā vineyyasantānesu
tika-s0101t:163_1: “kathaṃ nu kho uppajjeyyu”nti vani yāci patthayīti bhagavā, bhagaṃ vā siriṃ, issariyaṃ,
tika-s0101t:163_2: yasañca vami khelapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍayīti bhagavā. Tathā hi bhagavā hatthagataṃ siriṃ,
tika-s0101t:163_4: pariccajīti. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā,
tika-s0101t:163_5: sineruyugandharādigatā bhājanalokasobhā. Te bhagavā vami tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena
tika-s0101t:164_0: “Dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotī”ti “yo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito
tika-s0101t:164_1: paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:165_0: Vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo parehi abhejjasarīrattā. Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci
tika-s0101t:165_1: antarāyo sakkā kātunti. Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalasuttassa “eva”nti
tika-s0101t:165_2: niddisanato. Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā
tika-s0101t:165_3: etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ, tañca kho mayāva sutaṃ, na anussavitaṃ,
tika-s0101t:165_4: na paramparābhatanti imassatthassa dīpanato. Kālasampattiṃ niddisati “bhagavā”ti
tika-s0101t:165_5: padassa sannidhāne payuttassa samaya-saddassa kālassa buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0101t:169_0: Vijjantarikāyāti vijjuniccharaṇakkhaṇe. Antaratoti hadaye. Antarāti ārabbha nipphattīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:169_1: vemajjhe. Antarikāyāti antarāḷe. Ettha ca “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya, etesaṃ antarā kappā,
tika-s0101t:169_2: gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyā, antarantarā kathaṃ opātetī”ti ca ādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu
tika-s0101t:169_3: vattamānā antarā-saddā eva udāharitabbā siyuṃ, na pana cittakhaṇavivaresu vattamānā
tika-s0101t:169_4: antarantarikā-saddā. Antarā-saddassa hi ayaṃ atthuddhāroti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo
tika-s0101t:169_5: siyā – yesu atthesu antarā-saddo vattati, tesu antarasaddopi vattatīti samānatthattā
tika-s0101t:169_6: antarā-saddatthe vattamāno antara-saddo udāhaṭo, antarā-saddo eva vā “yassantarato”ti
tika-s0101t:169_7: ettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Antarā-saddo eva pana ika-saddena
tika-s0101t:169_8: padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “antarikā”ti vuttoti evamettha udāharaṇodāharitabbānaṃ virodhābhāvo
tika-s0101t:169_9: daṭṭhabbo. Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-saddayogena
tika-s0101t:169_10: upayogavacanassa icchitattā. Tenevāha “antarāsaddena yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kata”nti.
tika-s0101t:170_0: “Niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo
tika-s0101t:170_1: sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī” tiādivacanato diṭṭhisīlānaṃ
tika-s0101t:170_2: niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatā, pageva sakadāgāmiādayo.
tika-s0101t:170_3: “Tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati, tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato
tika-s0101t:170_4: viharatī”ti vacanato puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvo labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0101t:171_0: Suppiyopi khoti ettha kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho “assosi kho”tiādīsu viya. Tena addhānamaggapaṭipanno
tika-s0101t:171_1: ahosiyeva, nāssa maggapaṭipattiyā koci antarāyo ahosīti ayamattho dīpito hoti. Tatrāti
tika-s0101t:171_2: vā kālassa paṭiniddeso. Sopi hi “ekaṃ samaya”nti pubbe adhikato. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0101t:171_3: antarā rājagahañca nāḷandañca addhānamaggapaṭipanno, tasmiṃyeva samaye suppiyopi
tika-s0101t:171_4: taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, brahmadatto ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti. Pariyāyati
tika-s0101t:171_5: parivattatīti pariyāyo, vāro. Pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ paṭipādetīti pariyāyo,
tika-s0101t:171_6: desanā. Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā pavattatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇanti evaṃ
tika-s0101t:171_7: pariyāya-saddassa vārādīsu pavatti veditabbā. Kāraṇenāti kāraṇapatirūpakena. Tathā
tika-s0101t:171_8: hi vakkhati “akāraṇameva kāraṇanti vatvā”ti. Kasmā panettha “avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti,
tika-s0101t:171_9: “vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti ca vattamānakālaniddeso kato, nanu saṅgītikālato so avaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ
tika-s0101t:171_10: bhāsitakālo atītoti? Saccametaṃ, “addhānamaggapaṭipanno hotī”ti ettha hoti-saddo
tika-s0101t:171_11: viya atītakālattho bhāsati-saddo ca daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle tehi avaṇṇo vaṇṇo
tika-s0101t:171_12: ca bhāsīyati, taṃ apekkhitvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā “tatrāti kālassa paṭiniddeso”ti
tika-s0101t:172_0: Akāraṇanti ayuttiṃ, anupapattinti attho. Na hi arasarūpatādayo dosā bhagavati saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0101t:172_2: paṭiññāmattanti adhippāyo. Imasmiñca atthe kāraṇanti vatvāti kāraṇaṃ vāti vatvāti
tika-s0101t:172_5: saṃsārassa ādikoṭiyā apaññāyanapaṭiññā, abyākatavatthubyākaraṇanti evamādayo, tathā
tika-s0101t:172_6: asabbaññutādīnaṃ kamāvabodhādayo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā. Tathā tathāti jātivuḍḍhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:173: Avaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānoti avaṇṇaṃbhāsanahetu. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ māna-saddo. Anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇissati ekantamahāsāvajjattā ratanattayopavādassa. Tenevāha –
tika-s0101t:178_0: “Amhākaṃ ācariyo”tiādinā brahmadattassa saṃveguppattiṃ, attano ācariye kāruññappavattiñca
tika-s0101t:178_1: dassetvā kiñcāpi antevāsinā ācariyassa anukūlena bhavitabbaṃ, ayaṃ pana paṇḍitajātikattā
tika-s0101t:178_2: na edisesu taṃ anuvattatīti, idāni tassa kammassakataññāṇappavattiṃ dassento “ācariye
tika-s0101t:178_3: kho panā”tiādimāha. Vaṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ āraddho “apināmāyaṃ ettakenāpi ratanattayāvaṇṇato
tika-s0101t:178_4: orameyyā”ti. Vaṇṇīyatīti vaṇṇo, guṇo. Vaṇṇanaṃ guṇasaṅkittananti vaṇṇo, pasaṃsā.
tika-s0101t:178_5: Saṃññūḷhāti ganthitā, nibandhitāti attho. Atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na
tika-s0101t:178_6: vattabbo aparimāṇaguṇattā buddhādīnaṃ, niravasesānañca tesaṃ idha pakāsanaṃ pāḷisaṃvaṇṇanāyeva
tika-s0101t:178_8: saṅgaṇhāti. Attano thāmena vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, na pana buddhādīnaṃ guṇānurūpanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:184: Iti ha teti ettha itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Ha-kāro nipātamattanti āha “evaṃ te”ti.
tika-s0101t:185_0: Iriyāpathānubandhanena anubandhā honti, na pana sammāpaṭipattianubandhanenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:185_1: Tasmiṃ kāleti yasmiṃ saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe vā bhagavā taṃ addhānamaggaṃ
tika-s0101t:185_2: paṭipanno, tasmiṃ kāle. Teneva hi kiriyāvicchedadassanavasena “rājagahe piṇḍāya caratī”ti
tika-s0101t:185_3: vattamānakālaniddeso kato. Soti evaṃ rājagahe vasamāno bhagavā. Taṃ divasanti yaṃ
tika-s0101t:185_4: divasaṃ addhānamaggapaṭipanno, taṃ divasaṃ. Taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno nāḷandāyaṃ veneyyānaṃ
tika-s0101t:185_5: vividha hitasukhanipphattiṃ ākaṅkhamāno imissā ca aṭṭhuppattiyā tividhasīlālaṅkataṃ
tika-s0101t:185_7: brahmajālasuttantaṃ desessāmīti. Ettāvatā “kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno”ti
tika-s0101t:185_8: codanā visodhitā hoti. “Kasmā ca suppiyo anubandho”ti ayaṃ pana codanā “bhagavato
tika-s0101t:185_9: taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānanto”ti etena visodhitā hoti. Na hi so bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0101t:185_10: daṭṭhumeva icchatīti. Tenevāha “sace pana jāneyya, nānubandheyyā”ti.
tika-s0101t:186_1: tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ pakatiyā pavattiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ. “Tasmiṃ kira samaye”ti ca tasmiṃ
tika-s0101t:186_2: addhānagamanasamaye buddhasiriyā anigūhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi tadā tassā
tika-s0101t:186_3: nigūhane pakkusātiabhigamanādīsu viya kiñcipi kāraṇaṃ atthīti. Ratanāveḷaṃ ratanavaṭaṃsakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:187_0: Byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī ca assa bhagavato lakkhaṇamālāti mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
tika-s0101t:187_1: aññamaññapaṭibaddhattā evamāha. Dvattiṃsāya candamaṇḍalānaṃ mālā kenaci ganthetvā
tika-s0101t:187_3: Siriṃ abhibhavantī ivāti sambandho. Esa nayo sūriyamālāyātiādīsupi. Mahātherāti mahāsāvake
tika-s0101t:187_4: sandhāyāha. Evaṃ gacchantaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhū ca disvā atha attano parisaṃ avalokesīti
tika-s0101t:187_5: sambandho. “Yasmā panesā”tiādinā “kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti codanaṃ
tika-s0101t:187_6: visodheti. Itīti evaṃ, vuttappakārenāti attho. Imehi dvīhīti lābhaparivārahāniṃ nigamanavasena
tika-s0101t:187_7: dasseti. Bhagavato virodhānunayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ ete avaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇañca bhāsantīti
tika-s0101t:187_8: apare. “Mārena anvāviṭṭhā evaṃ karontī”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0101t:188_0: 2. Ambalaṭṭhikāya avidūre bhavattā uyyānaṃ ambalaṭṭhikā yathā “varuṇānagaraṃ, godāgāmo”ti.
tika-s0101t:188_1: Keci pana “ambalaṭṭhikāti yathāvuttanayeneva ekagāmo”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ mate ambalaṭṭhikāyanti
tika-s0101t:188_2: samīpatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Rājāgārakaṃ vessavaṇamahārājadevāyatananti eke. Bahuparissayoti
tika-s0101t:188_3: bahupaddavo. “Saddhiṃ antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavenā”ti vuttaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0101t:188_4: Tañca kho pāḷi āruḷhavaseneva, na pana tadā suppiyassa parisāya abhāvato. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0101t:188_5: brahmadattoyeva pāḷi āruḷho, na suppiyassa parisāti? Payojanābhāvato. Yathā cetaṃ,
tika-s0101t:188_6: evaṃ aññampi edisaṃ payojanābhāvato saṅgītikārehi na saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci
tika-s0101t:188_7: pana “vuttanti pāḷiyaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati pāḷiāruḷhavasena pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:188_8: vuttanti āpajjanato. Tasmā yathāvuttanayenevettha attho gahetabbo. Parivāretvā nisinno hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0101t:189_0: 3. Kathādhammoti kathāsabhāvo, kathādhammo upaparikkhāvidhīti keci. Nīyatīti nayo,
tika-s0101t:189_1: attho. Saddasatthaṃ anugato nayo saddanayo. Tattha hi anabhiṇhavuttike acchariya-saddo
tika-s0101t:189_2: icchito. Tenevāha “andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ viyā”ti. Accharāyogganti acchariyanti
tika-s0101t:189_3: niruttinayo, so pana yasmā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato, tasmā āha “aṭṭhakathānayoti.
tika-s0101t:189_4: Yāvañcidaṃ suppaṭividitāti sambandho, tassa yattakaṃ suṭṭhu paṭividitā, taṃ ettakanti
tika-s0101t:189_5: na sakkā amhehi paṭivijjhituṃ, akkhātuṃ vāti attho. Tenevāha “tena suppaṭividitatāya
tika-s0101t:190_1: vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato supākaṭo ca hoti, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0101t:190_2: saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe… abhisambuddho”ti āha.
tika-s0101t:190_3: Satipi ñāṇadassana-saddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ savisayavisesappavattidassanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:190_5: paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0101t:191_1: Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā, sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:191_2: tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ, appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ, ajjhupekkhanañca.
tika-s0101t:192_0: Tathā ṭhānāṭhānādīni jānatā, yathākammūpage satte passatā, savāsanānaṃ āsavānaṃ khīṇattā
tika-s0101t:192_1: arahatā, abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhiññeyyādito aviparītāvabodhato sammāsambuddhena.
tika-s0101t:192_2: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā, tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ ñāṇānuparivattito
tika-s0101t:192_3: nisammakāritāya passatā, davādīnampi abhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya arahatā, chandādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:193_0: Yadipi hīnakalyāṇabhedena duvidhāva adhimutti pāḷiyaṃ vuttā, pavattiākāravasena pana
tika-s0101t:193_1: anekabhedabhinnāti āha “nānādhimuttikatā”ti. Sā pana adhimutti ajjhāsayadhātu, tadapi
tika-s0101t:193_2: tathā tathā dassanaṃ khamanaṃ rocanañcāti āha “nānājjhāsayatā…pe… rucitā”ti. Nānādhimuttikatañāṇenāti
tika-s0101t:193_3: cettha sabbaññutañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, na dasabalañāṇanti āha “sabbaññutañāṇenā”ti. Iti
tika-s0101t:193_4: ha meti ettha evaṃ-saddattho iti-saddo, ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ saralopo ca katoti dassetuṃ
tika-s0101t:194_0: 4. Arahattamaggena samugghātaṃ kataṃ, yato “natthi abyāvaṭamano”ti buddhadhammesu
tika-s0101t:194_2: “Kadāci ekako”tiādi tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānukūlaṃ bhagavato upasaṅkamadassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:194_3: Pādanikkhepasamaye bhūmiyā samabhāvāpatti suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya nissandaphalaṃ, na
tika-s0101t:195_1: guṇā dullabhāti attho. Cātumahārājikabhavananti cātumahārājikadevaloke suññavimānāni
tika-s0101t:195_2: gacchantīti attho. Esa nayo tāvatiṃsabhavanādīsupi. Kālayuttanti imissā velāya imassa
tika-s0101t:195_3: evaṃ vattabbanti taṃtaṃkālānurūpaṃ. Samayayuttanti tasseva vevacanaṃ, aṭṭhuppattianurūpaṃ
tika-s0101t:195_4: vā. Atha vā samayayuttanti hetūdāharaṇasahitaṃ. Kālena sāpadesañhi bhagavā dhammaṃ
tika-s0101t:195_5: deseti. Utuṃ gaṇhapeti, na pana malaṃ pakkhāletīti adhippāyo. Na hi bhagavato kāye
tika-s0101t:196_0: Kilāsubhāvo kilamatho. Sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:196_1: “Buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketī”ti idaṃ pacchimayāme bhagavato bahulaāciṇṇavasena
tika-s0101t:196_2: vuttaṃ. Appekadā avasiṭṭhabalañāṇehi sabbaññutañāṇena ca bhagavā tamatthaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0101t:196_3: “Ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”tiādidesanā sīhanādo. Tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā” tiādinā paccayākāraṃ
tika-s0101t:196_4: samodhānetvā. “Sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya nabhaṃ paharanto viya cā”ti idaṃ brahmajāladesanāya
tika-s0101t:196_5: anaññasādhāraṇattā sudukkaratādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Etanti “yena, tenā”ti etaṃ padadvayaṃ.
tika-s0101t:196_6: Yenāti vā hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, yena kāraṇena so maṇḍalamāḷo upasaṅkamitabbo, tena
tika-s0101t:196_7: kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti attho, kāraṇaṃ pana “ime bhikkhū”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃeva.
tika-s0101t:197_0: Purimoti “katamāya nu bhavathā”ti evaṃ vutto attho. Kā ca pana voti ettha ca-saddo
tika-s0101t:197_1: byatireke. Tena yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvaṃ joteti. Pana-saddo
tika-s0101t:197_2: vacanālaṅkāro. Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā, sā eva antarākathābhūtā vippakatā
tika-s0101t:197_3: visesena puna pucchīyatīti. Aññāti antarāsaddassa atthamāha. Aññatthe hi ayaṃ antarā-saddo
tika-s0101t:197_4: “bhūmantaraṃ samayantara”ntiādīsu viya. Antarāti vā vemajjheti attho. Nanu ca tehi
tika-s0101t:197_5: bhikkhūhi sā kathā yathādhippāyaṃ “iti ha me”tiādinā niṭṭhapitā yevāti? Na niṭṭhāpitā
tika-s0101t:197_6: bhagavato upasaṅkamanena upacchinnattā. Yadi hi bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe na upasaṅkameyya
tika-s0101t:197_7: bhiyyopi tappaṭibaddhāyeva kathā pavatteyyuṃ, bhagavato upasaṅkamanena pana na pavattesuṃ.
tika-s0101t:197_8: Tenevāha ayaṃ kho…pe… anuppatto”ti. Kasmā panettha dhammavinayasaṅgahe kariyamāne
tika-s0101t:197_9: nidānavacanaṃ, nanu bhagavato vacanameva saṅgahetabbanti? Vuccatedesanāya ṭhitiasammosasaddheyyabhāvasampādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t:197_11: saddheyyā ca. Desakālakattusotunimittehi upanibandho viya vohāravinicchayo, teneva
tika-s0101t:197_12: cāyasmatā mahākassapena “brahmajālaṃ āvuso ānanda kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu
tika-s0101t:197_13: katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena nidānaṃ bhāsitanti tayidamāha
tika-s0101t:198_0: Apica satthusiddhiyā nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
tika-s0101t:198_1: sammāsambuddhattasiddhi. Sammāsambuddhabhāvena hissa pubbaracanādīnaṃ abhāvo sabbattha
tika-s0101t:198_3: khīṇāsavattasiddhi. Khīṇā savatāya hissa ācariyamuṭṭhiādīnaṃ abhāvo, visuddhā ca
tika-s0101t:198_5: abhāvasūcakehi, ñāṇappahānasampadābhi byañjanakehi ca sambuddhavisuddhabhāvehi purimavesārajjadvayasiddhi,
tika-s0101t:198_6: tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti
tika-s0101t:198_7: bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo, attahitaparahitappaṭipatti ca pakāsitā hoti nidānavacanena
tika-s0101t:198_9: “jānatā passatā”tiādi vacanato ca. Tena vuttaṃ “satthusiddhiyā nidānavacana”nti.
tika-s0101t:199_0: Tathā satthusiddhiyā nidānavacanaṃ. Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato
tika-s0101t:199_1: natthi niratthikā pavatti, attahitatthā vā, tasmā paresaṃyeva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa
tika-s0101t:199_2: sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ satthubhūtaṃ, na kabyaracanādisāsanabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0101t:199_3: Tena vuttaṃ “satthusiddhiyā nidānavacana”nti. Apica satthuno pamāṇabhūtatāvibhāvanena
tika-s0101t:199_4: sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvasiddhiyā nidānavacanaṃ. “Bhagavatā”ti hi iminā tathāgatassa
tika-s0101t:199_6: ca ayamattho sādhito hoti. Idamettha nidānavacanapayojanassa mukhamattadassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:199_7: Ko hi samattho buddhānubuddhena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitassa nidānassa payojanāni
tika-s0101t:201_0: 5. Nikkhittassāti desitassa. Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu
tika-s0101t:201_1: nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati. Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni
tika-s0101t:201_3: catubbidhabhāvanti āha “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti. Kāmañcettha attajjhāsayassa, aṭṭhuppattiyā
tika-s0101t:201_4: ca parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisabbhāvato,
tika-s0101t:201_5: attajjhāsayaaṭṭhuppattīnaṃ pana aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggo natthīti nayidha niravaseso vitthāranayo
tika-s0101t:201_6: sambhavati, tasmā “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā
tika-s0101t:201_7: ajjhāsayena siyā saṃsaggabhedo, tadantogadhattā pana sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena
tika-s0101t:201_8: cattārova dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. So panāyaṃ suttanikkhepo sāmaññabhāvato paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0101t:201_9: vicāretabbo, tasmiṃ vicārite yassā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassā vibhāgavasena
tika-s0101t:201_11: ca pavattānaṃ suttānaṃ suttapadesānaṃ vaṇṇanā vuccamānā taṃtaṃanusandhidassanasukhatāya
tika-s0101t:201_12: suviññeyyā hotīti āha “suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hotī”ti.
tika-s0101t:202_0: “Suttanikkhepā”tiādīsu nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttassa kathanaṃ
tika-s0101t:202_1: suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho. Nikkhipīyatīti vā nikkhepo, suttaṃyeva nikkhepo
tika-s0101t:202_2: suttanikkhepo. Attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, so assa atthi suttadesanākāraṇabhūtoti
tika-s0101t:202_3: attajjhāsayo. Attano ajjhāsayo etassāti vā attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayoti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0101t:202_4: nayo. Pucchāya vaso pucchāvaso, so etassa atthīti pucchavasiko. Araṇīyato attho,
tika-s0101t:202_5: suttadesanāya vatthu. Atthassa uppatti atthuppatti, atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppatti,
tika-s0101t:202_6: sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko. Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,
tika-s0101t:202_7: attajjhāsayādi eva. Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, paresaṃ
tika-s0101t:202_8: ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo, pucchīyatīti pucchā, pucchitabbo attho. Sotabbavasappavattaṃ
tika-s0101t:202_9: dhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikā, tadeva nikkhepasaddāpekkhāya pulliṅgavasena
tika-s0101t:202_10: vuttaṃ “pucchāvasiko”ti. Tathā aṭṭhuppattiyeva “aṭṭhuppattiko”ti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:203_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhatā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ nikkhepabhāvo
tika-s0101t:203_1: yutto. Tenevāha “kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathetī”ti. Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ
tika-s0101t:203_2: pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanānimittabhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ
tika-s0101t:203_4: pavattitadesanattā kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi
tika-s0101t:203_6: gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi dhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:203_7: āmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ “aṭṭhuppattī”ti vuccati. Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayameva
tika-s0101t:203_8: nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasena desito pucchāvasikoti pākaṭo yamatthoti.
tika-s0101t:203_9: Attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi dhammatantiṭhapanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammappadhānasuttantahārakoti
tika-s0101t:203_10: anupubbena niddiṭṭhānaṃ saṃyuttake sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttānaṃ āvaḷi, tathā
tika-s0101t:203_11: iddhipādahārakādi. Vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā saddhindriyādayo. Abhinīhāranti paṇidhānaṃ.
tika-s0101t:204_0: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇeti ettha “acchariyaṃ āvuso”tiādinā bhikkhusaṅghena vutto vaṇṇopi saṅgahito,
tika-s0101t:204_1: taṃ pana aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “atthi bhikkhave aññe ca dhammā”tiādinā upari desanaṃ
tika-s0101t:204_2: ārabhissatīti. “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti imissā desanāya brahmadattena
tika-s0101t:204_3: vuttavaṇṇo aṭṭhuppattīti katvā vuttaṃ “antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ. Iti imaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ
tika-s0101t:204_5: atthesu dissati. Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati, sadisabhāveti
tika-s0101t:204_6: attho. “Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantī”tiādīsu samuccaye, “ke vā ime, kassa vā”tiādīsu
tika-s0101t:204_7: saṃsaye, “ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vavassagge,
tika-s0101t:204_8: “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”tiādīsu padapūraṇe, “ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā
tika-s0101t:204_9: vā brāhmaṇā vā”tiādīsu vikappe, idhāyaṃ vikappeyevāti dassento āha “vā-saddo vikappanattho”ti.
tika-s0101t:204_10: Para-saddo attheva aññatthe “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyu”ntiādīsu
tika-s0101t:204_12: Atthi paccanīkabhāve “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0101t:205_0: Īdisesupīti ettha pi-saddo sambhāvane, tena ratanattayanimittampi akusalacittappavatti
tika-s0101t:205_1: na kātabbā, pageva vaṭṭāmisalokāmisanimittanti dasseti. Sabhāvadhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:205_2: āhanatīti kattuatthe āghātasaddaṃ dasseti, tattha āhanatīti hiṃsati vibādhati, upatāpeti
tika-s0101t:205_3: cāti attho. Āhanati etena, āhananamattaṃ vā āghātoti karaṇabhāvatthāpi sambhavantiyeva.
tika-s0101t:205_4: Evaṃ avayavabhedanena āghāta-saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyenapi atthaṃ
tika-s0101t:205_5: dassento “kopassetaṃ adhivacana”nti āha. Ayañca nayo “appaccayo anabhiraddhī”tiādīsupi
tika-s0101t:205_6: yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbo. Appatītā honti tenāti pākaṭapariyāyena appaccaya-saddassa
tika-s0101t:205_7: atthadassanaṃ, taṃmukhena pana na pacceti tenāti appaccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhirādhayatīti
tika-s0101t:205_8: sādhayati. Dvīhīti āghātaanabhiraddhipadehi. Ekenāti appaccayapadena. Sesānanti saññāviññāṇakkhandhānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:205_10: pavattiyā paccayasamavāyanaṃ idha “karaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana atthato uppādanameva.
tika-s0101t:205_11: Anuppādanañhi sandhāya bhagavatā “na karaṇīyā”ti vuttanti. Paṭikkhittameva ekuppādekavatthukekārammaṇekanirodhabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:206_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ manopadose. Tumhanti “tumhāka”nti iminā samānattho eko saddo “yathā
tika-s0101t:206_1: amhāka”nti iminā samānattho “amha”nti ayaṃ saddo. Yathāha, “tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā
tika-s0101t:206_2: na miyyare”ti. “Antarāyo”ti idaṃ manopadosassa akaraṇīyatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā
tika-s0101t:206_3: tumhākaṃyeva ca bhaveyya tena kopādinā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo, tasmā te kopādipariyāyena
tika-s0101t:206_4: vuttā āghātādayo na karaṇīyāti attho. Tena nāhaṃ “sabbaññū”ti issarabhāvena tumhe
tika-s0101t:206_5: tato nivāremi, atha kho iminā nāma kāraṇenāti dasseti. Taṃ pana kāraṇavacanaṃ yasmā
tika-s0101t:206_6: ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ hoti, tasmā āha “ādīnavaṃ dassento”ti. “Api nu tumhe”tiādinā manopadoso
tika-s0101t:206_7: na kālantarabhāvinoyeva hitasukhassa antarāyakaro, atha kho taṅkhaṇappavattirahassapi
tika-s0101t:206_8: hitasukhassa antarāyakaroti manopadose ādīnavaṃ daḷhataraṃ katvā dasseti. Yesaṃ kesañci
tika-s0101t:207_0: Andhatamanti andhabhāvakaratamaṃ. Yanti yattha. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:207_1: Yasmiṃ kāle kodho sahate naraṃ, andhatamaṃ tadā hotīti sambandho. Yanti vā kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-s0101t:207_2: yasmā kodho uppajjamāno naraṃ abhibhavati, tasmā andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yadā kodhoti
tika-s0101t:207_3: attho yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhibhāvato. Atha vā yanti kiriyāya parāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:207_4: Kodho sahateti yadetaṃ kodhassa sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ, etaṃ andhakāratamabhavananti
tika-s0101t:207_5: attho. Atha vā yaṃ naraṃ kodho sahate abhibhavati, tassa andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, tato
tika-s0101t:207_6: ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passatīti. Antaratoti abbhantarato, cittato vā.
tika-s0101t:208_0: “Idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti iminā sabbaññū eva amhākaṃ satthā aviparītadhammadesanattā,
tika-s0101t:208_1: svākkhāto dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā, suppaṭipanno saṅgho saṃkilesarahitattāti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:208_2: dasseti. “Idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti etena ca “na sabbaññū”tiādivacanaṃ abhūtaṃ atacchanti
tika-s0101t:208_3: nibbeṭhitaṃ hoti. Dutiyaṃ padanti “ataccha”nti padaṃ. Paṭhamassāti “abhūta”nti padassa.
tika-s0101t:208_4: Catutthañcāti “na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti padaṃ. Tatiyassāti “natthi cetaṃ
tika-s0101t:208_5: amhesū”ti padassa. Avaṇṇeyevāti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā dosapatiṭṭhāpanavasena nindane
tika-s0101t:208_6: eva. Na sabbatthāti kevalaṃ akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādīsu na ekantena nibbeṭhanaṃ
tika-s0101t:208_7: kātabbanti attho. Vuttamevatthaṃ “yadi hī”tiādinā pākaṭaṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0101t:209_0: 6. Ānandanti pamodanti etena dhammena taṃsamaṅgino sattāti ānanda-saddassa karaṇatthataṃ
tika-s0101t:209_1: dasseti. Sobhanaṃ mano assāti sumano, sobhanaṃ vā mano sumano, tassa bhāvo somanassanti
tika-s0101t:209_2: tadaññadhammānampi sampayuttānaṃ somanassabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati ruḷhīsaddattā
tika-s0101t:209_4: ubbilaṃ, bhindati purimāvatthāya visesaṃ āpajjatīti attho. Ubbilameva ubbilāvitaṃ,
tika-s0101t:209_5: tassa bhāvo ubbilāvitattaṃ. Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ
tika-s0101t:209_6: hoti, tassā gehassitāya odaggiyapītiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenevāha “uddhaccāvahāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:209_7: Idhāpi “kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ubbilāvitameva natthi, atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ
tika-s0101t:209_8: edisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapetī”ti, “dvīhi padehi
tika-s0101t:209_9: saṅkhārakkhandho, ekena vedanākkhandho vutto”ti ettha “tesaṃ vasena sesānampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:209_10: karaṇaṃ paṭikkhittamevā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, “pi-saddo sambhāvane”tiādinā idha ca
tika-s0101t:209_11: vuttanayena attho yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo. “Tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyo”ti etthāpi
tika-s0101t:209_12: “antarāyoti ida”ntiādinā heṭṭhā avaṇṇapakkhe vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:210_0: Kasmā panetanti ca vakkhamānaṃyeva atthaṃ manasi katvā codeti. Ācariyo “saccaṃ vaṇṇita”nti
tika-s0101t:210_1: tamatthaṃ paṭijānitvā “taṃ pana nekkhammanissita”ntiādinā pariharati. Tattha etanti
tika-s0101t:210_2: ānandādīnaṃ akaraṇīyatāvacanaṃ. Nanu bhagavatā vaṇṇitanti sambandho. Kasiṇenāti kasiṇatāya
tika-s0101t:210_3: sakalabhāvena. Keci pana “jambudīpassāti karaṇe sāmivacana”nti vadanti, tesaṃ matena
tika-s0101t:210_4: kasiṇajambudīpa-saddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Tasmāti yasmā gehassitapītisomanassaṃ
tika-s0101t:210_5: jhānādīnaṃ antarāyakaraṃ, tasmā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “somanassaṃ pāhaṃ devānaṃ
tika-s0101t:210_6: inda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampī”ti. “Ayañhī”tiādi yena sampayuttā
tika-s0101t:210_7: pīti antarāyakarī, taṃ dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha “idañhi lobhasahagataṃ pītisomanassa”nti
tika-s0101t:210_8: vattabbaṃ siyā, pītiggahaṇena pana somanassampi gahitameva hoti somanassarahitāya
tika-s0101t:210_9: pītiyā abhāvatoti pītiyeva gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā sevitabbāsevitabbavibhāgavacanato
tika-s0101t:210_10: somanassassa pākaṭo antarāyakarabhāvo, na tathā pītiyāti pītiyeva lobhasahagatattena
tika-s0101t:210_11: visesetvā vuttā. “Luddho attha”ntiādigāthānaṃ “kuddho attha”ntiādi gāthāsu viya attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t:211_0: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, saṅghassa
tika-s0101t:211_1: vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra ce tumhe assatha ānandino sumanā ubbilāvitā, api nu tumhe
tika-s0101t:211_2: paresaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthāti. No hetaṃ bhante”ti ayaṃ tatiyavāro, so
tika-s0101t:211_3: desanākāle nīharitvā desetabbapuggalābhāvato desanāya anāgatopi tadatthasambhavato
tika-s0101t:211_4: atthato āgatoyevāti daṭṭhabbo yathā taṃ kathāvatthupakaraṇaṃ vitthāravasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:211_5: “Atthato āgato yevā”ti etena saṃvaṇṇanākāle tathā bujjhanakasattānaṃ vasena so vāro
tika-s0101t:211_6: ānetvā vattabboti dasseti. “Yatheva hī”tiādinā tamevatthasambhavaṃ vibhāveti. Vuttanayenāti
tika-s0101t:211_7: “tatra tumhehīti tasmiṃ vaṇṇe tumhehī”tiādinā, “dutiyaṃ padaṃ paṭhamassa padassa,
tika-s0101t:213_0: 7. Nivatto amūlakattā vissajjetabbatābhāvato. Anuvattatiyeva vissajjetabbatāya adhikatabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:213_1: Anusandhiṃ dassessati “atthi bhikkhave”tiādinā. Oranti vā aparabhāgo “orato bhogaṃ,
tika-s0101t:213_2: oraṃ pāra”ntiādīsu viya. Atha vā heṭṭhāattho ora-saddo “oraṃ āgamanāya ye paccayā,
tika-s0101t:213_3: te orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanānī”tiādīsu viya. Sīlañhi samādhipaññāyo apekkhitvā aparabhāgo,
tika-s0101t:213_4: heṭṭhābhūtañca hotīti. Sīlamattakanti ettha matta-saddo appakattho vā “bhesajjamattā”tiādīsu
tika-s0101t:213_5: viya. Visesanivattiattho vā “avitakkavicāramattā dhammā, manomattā dhātu manodhātū”ti
tika-s0101t:213_6: ca ādīsu viya. “Appamattakaṃ, oramattaka”nti padadvayena sāmaññato vuttoyeva hi attho
tika-s0101t:213_7: sīlamattakanti visesavasena vutto. Atha vā sīlenapi tadekadesasseva saṅgahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:213_8: appakatthavācako, visesanivattiattho eva vā “sīlamattaka”nti ettha matta-saddo vutto.
tika-s0101t:213_9: Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayasannissitasīlāni idha desanaṃ anāruḷhāni. Na hi tāni
tika-s0101t:214_0: Alaṅkaraṇaṃ vibhūsanaṃ alaṅkāro, kuṇḍalādipasādhanaṃ vā. Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ maṇḍanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:214_1: Maṇḍaneti maṇḍanahetu. Atha vā maṇḍatīti maṇḍano, maṇḍanajātiko puriso. Bahuvacanatthe
tika-s0101t:214_2: ca idaṃ ekavacanaṃ, maṇḍanasīlesūti attho. Paripūrakārīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho,
tika-s0101t:214_3: pakārattho vā, tena sakalampi sīlathomana suttaṃ dasseti. Candananti candanasahacaraṇato
tika-s0101t:214_4: candanagandho, tathā tagarādīsupi. Satañca gandhoti ettha gandho viyāti gandhoti
tika-s0101t:214_5: vutto sīlanibandhano thutighoso. Sīlañhi kittiyā nimittaṃ. Yathāha “sīlavato sīlasampannassa
tika-s0101t:214_6: kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti. Pavāyatīti pakāsati. Gandhāva gandhajātā.
tika-s0101t:215_0: “Appakaṃ bahuka”nti idaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya aññamaññaṃ upanidhāya vuccatīti āha “upariguṇe
tika-s0101t:215_1: upanidhāyā”ti. Sīlañhīti ettha hi-saddo hetuattho, tena idaṃ dasseti “yasmā sīlaṃ
tika-s0101t:215_2: kiñcāpi patiṭṭhābhāvena samādhissa bahukāraṃ, pabhāvādiguṇavisese panassa upanidhāya
tika-s0101t:215_3: kalampi na upeti, tathā samādhi ca paññāyā”ti. Tenevāha “tasmā”tiādi. Idāni “katha”nti
tika-s0101t:215_4: pucchitvā samādhissa ānubhāvaṃ vitthārato vibhāveti. “Abhi…pe… mūle”ti idaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyassa
tika-s0101t:215_6: vuttaṃ. Yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāya hi bhagavato citte uppanne tadanucchavikaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:215_7: icchitabbanti ratanamaṇḍapādi sakkassa devarañño āṇāya vissakammunā nimmitanti vadanti,
tika-s0101t:215_8: bhagavatāva nimmitanti apare. “Yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho atthi
tika-s0101t:215_9: ce, āgacchatū”ti codanāsadisattā vuttaṃ “attādānaparidīpana”nti. Tattha attādānaṃ
tika-s0101t:215_10: anuyogo, titthiyānaṃ tathā kātuṃ asamatthattā, “karissāmā”ti pubbe uṭṭhitattā titthiyaparimaddanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:218_0: “Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Puratthimakāyato
tika-s0101t:218_1: aggi, pacchimakāyato udakaṃ. Pacchimakāyato aggi, puratthimakāyato udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇaakkhito
tika-s0101t:218_2: aggi, vāmaakkhito udakaṃ. Vāmaakkhito aggi, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato
tika-s0101t:218_3: aggi, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakaṃ. Vāmakaṇṇasotato aggi, dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato
tika-s0101t:218_4: aggi, vāmanāsikāsotato udakaṃ. Vāmanāsikāsotato aggi, dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato udakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:218_5: Dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato aggi, vāmaaṃsakūṭato udakaṃ. Vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggi, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato
tika-s0101t:218_6: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇahatthato aggi, vāmahatthato udakaṃ. Vāmahatthato aggi, dakkhiṇahatthato
tika-s0101t:218_7: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇapassato aggi, vāmapassato udakaṃ. Vāmapassato aggi, dakkhiṇapassato
tika-s0101t:218_8: udakaṃ. Dakkhiṇapādato aggi, vāmapādato udakaṃ. Vāmapādato aggi, dakkhiṇapādato udakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:218_9: Aṅgulaṅgulehi aggi, aṅgulantarikāhi udakaṃ. Aṅgulantarikāhi aggi, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:218_10: Ekekalomato aggi, ekekalomato udakaṃ. Lomakūpato lomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati,
tika-s0101t:220_0: “Channaṃ vaṇṇānanti ādinayappavatta”nti etthāpi nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ
tika-s0101t:220_1: mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānanti ayaṃ pāḷiseso. “Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo”ti idaṃ tāsaṃ yebhuyyatāya
tika-s0101t:220_2: vuttaṃ. Vitthāretabbanti etthāpi “satthā tiṭṭhati, nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati
tika-s0101t:220_3: vā seyyaṃ vā kappetī”tiādinā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekamūlakā satthuvasena cattāro,
tika-s0101t:220_4: nimmitavasena cattāroti sabbeva aṭṭha vāre vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:221_0: Madhupāyāsanti madhusittaṃ pāyāsaṃ. Attā mitto majjhatto verīti catūsu sīmasambhedavasena
tika-s0101t:221_2: etenāpi yojetabbaṃ. Tattha “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”tiādipāḷi vasena caturaṅgasamannāgatatā
tika-s0101t:221_3: veditabbā. “Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā jarāmaraṇamukhena paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:221_4: otāretvā. Ānāpānacatutthajjhānanti etthāpi “sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti padaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ
tika-s0101t:221_5: katvā yojetabbaṃ. Tampi hi sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇamevāti vadanti. Chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0101t:221_7: kuṇḍaṃ kolambo. Daribhāgo kandaro. Cakkavāḷapādesu mahāsamuddo cakkavāḷamahāsamuddo.
tika-s0101t:222_0: “Duve puthujjanā”tiādi puthujjane labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanādīsu
tika-s0101t:222_1: viya puthujjanavisesaniddhāraṇatthaṃ. Sabbopi hi puthujjano bhagavato upari guṇe
tika-s0101t:222_2: vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti, tiṭṭhatu puthujjano, sāvakapaccekabuddhānampi avisayā buddhaguṇā.
tika-s0101t:222_3: Tathā hi vakkhati “sotāpannā”tiādi. Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Atthaparipucchanaṃ paripucchā.
tika-s0101t:222_4: Aṭṭhakathāvasena atthassa savanaṃ savanaṃ. Byañjanatthānaṃ sunikkhepasudassanena
tika-s0101t:222_5: dhammassa pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sutadhātaparicitānaṃ manasānupekkhanaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:222_6: Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā ca avihatattā tā janenti, tāhi vā
tika-s0101t:222_7: janitāti puthujjanā. Avighātameva vā jana-saddo vadati. Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti
tika-s0101t:222_8: ettha puthū janā satthupaṭiññā etesanti puthujjanāti vacanattho. Puthu…pe… avuṭṭhitāti
tika-s0101t:222_9: ettha janetabbā, jāyanti vā etthāti janā, gatiyo. Puthū janā etesanti puthujjanā.
tika-s0101t:222_10: Ito pare jāyanti etehīti janā, abhisaṅkhārādayo. Te etesaṃ puthū vijjantīti puthujjanā.
tika-s0101t:222_11: Abhisaṅkharaṇādi attho eva vā jana-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Kāmarāgabhavarāgadiṭṭhiavijjā
tika-s0101t:222_12: oghā. Rāgaggiādayo santāpā. Teyeva, sabbepi vā kilesā pariḷāhā. Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
tika-s0101t:222_13: rattāti ettha jāyatīti jano, rāgo gedhoti evaṃ ādiko. Puthu jano etesanti puthujjanā,
tika-s0101t:222_14: puthūsu vā janā jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho eva vā jana-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Palibuddhāti
tika-s0101t:222_15: sambuddhā, upaddutā vā. “Puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītāna”ntiādinā puthū janā puthujjanāti dasseti.
tika-s0101t:223_0: Yehi guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati tathāgata-saddo pavatto, taṃdassanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:223_1: “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādimāha. Guṇanemittakāneva hi bhagavato sabbāni nāmāni. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t:226_0: Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo. Sāmaññajotanāya
tika-s0101t:226_2: āgato”tiādīsu viya, nāpi kāyagamanādiattho “āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, māgadhānaṃ giribbaja”ntiādīsu
tika-s0101t:226_3: viya. Tattha yadākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo, taṃ karuṇāpadhānattā
tika-s0101t:226_4: mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento
tika-s0101t:226_5: yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhabhāvato “yathā sabbaloka…pe… āgatā”ti āha. Taṃ pana
tika-s0101t:226_6: paṭipadaṃ mahāpadānasuttādīsu sambahulaniddesena supākaṭānaṃ āsannānañca vipassīādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:226_7: channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ vasena nidassento “yathā vipassī bhagavā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0101t:226_10: kāyappaṇidhānaṃ imināva abhinīhārena samijjhatīti. Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena “tathāgato”ti
tika-s0101t:226_11: padassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasena dassetuṃ “yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe…
tika-s0101t:227_0: Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā
tika-s0101t:227_1: – kā panetā pāramiyo? Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyo? Katividhā cetā? Ko tāsaṃ kamo? Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni?
tika-s0101t:227_2: Ko paccayo? Ko saṃkileso? Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Ko paṭipakkho? Kā paṭipatti? Ko vibhāgo? Ko
tika-s0101t:227_3: saṅgaho? Ko sampādanūpāyo? Kittakena kālena sampādanaṃ? Ko ānisaṃso? Kiṃ cetāsaṃ phalanti?
tika-s0101t:228: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyoti. Taṇhāmānādīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
tika-s0101t:229_0: Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyoti dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā
tika-s0101t:229_1: bodhisattā, tesaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyā. Atha vā paratīti paramo,
tika-s0101t:229_2: dānādiguṇānaṃ pūrako pālako ca bodhisatto. Paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ
tika-s0101t:229_3: vā pāramī, dānādikiriyāva. Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
tika-s0101t:229_4: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0101t:229_5: visesena mayati gacchati, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya
tika-s0101t:229_6: munāti paricchindati, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
tika-s0101t:229_7: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ, paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:229_8: mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto. “Paramassa aya”ntiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:229_9: Pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti, tattha vā satte mavati bandhati
tika-s0101t:229_10: yojeti, taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca, munāti vā taṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte
tika-s0101t:229_11: minoti pakkhipati, kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso.
tika-s0101t:229_12: Tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramitā, dānādikiriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīnaṃ saddattho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:230: Katividhāti saṅkhepato dasavidhā, tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t:233_0: “Kati nu kho bhante buddhakārakā dhammā? Dasa kho sāriputta buddhakārakā dhammā.
tika-s0101t:233_1: Katame dasa? Dānaṃ kho sāriputta buddhakārako dhammo, sīlaṃ nekkhammaṃ paññā vīriyaṃ
tika-s0101t:233_2: khanti saccamadhiṭṭhānaṃ mettā upekkhā buddhakārako dhammo, ime kho sāriputta dasa
tika-s0101t:233_3: buddhakārakā dhammāti. Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
tika-s0101t:235: Khanti saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, mettupekkhāti te dasā’ti”.
tika-s0101t:236: Keci pana “chabbidhā”ti vadanti, taṃ etāsaṃ saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. So pana saṅgaho parato āvibhavissati.
tika-s0101t:237_0: Ko tāsaṃ kamoti ettha kamo nāma desanākkamo, so ca paṭhamasamādānahetuko, samādānaṃ
tika-s0101t:237_1: pavicayahetukaṃ, iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca, tathā desitā. Tattha ca
tika-s0101t:237_2: dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ
tika-s0101t:237_3: hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ, nekkhammaṃ
tika-s0101t:237_4: paññāpariggahitaṃ, paññā vīriyapariggahitā, vīriyaṃ khantipariggahitaṃ, khanti saccapariggahitā,
tika-s0101t:237_5: saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ, mettā upekkhāpariggahitā
tika-s0101t:237_6: mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā. Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā,
tika-s0101t:237_7: karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu
tika-s0101t:237_8: upekkhakā hontīti? Upekkhitabbayuttesu kañci kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha,
tika-s0101t:237_9: sabbadā cāti keci. Apare pana na sattesu upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontīti.
tika-s0101t:238_0: Aparo nayo – pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā, appaphalattā, sukarattā
tika-s0101t:238_1: ca ādimhi dānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlenadāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito, parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato,
tika-s0101t:238_2: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
tika-s0101t:238_3: ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito, kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
tika-s0101t:238_4: vatvā manosucaritavacanato, visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato, kammāparādhappahānena
tika-s0101t:238_6: cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
tika-s0101t:238_8: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato,
tika-s0101t:238_9: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā
tika-s0101t:238_11: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato, upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato,
tika-s0101t:238_12: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca. Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti
tika-s0101t:239_0: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito. Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
tika-s0101t:239_1: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato. Vīriyavato hi titikkhā
tika-s0101t:239_2: sobhati. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato, accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato.
tika-s0101t:239_3: Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā hi uddhaccadoso pahīyati. Vīriyavato sātaccakaraṇavacanato.
tika-s0101t:239_4: Khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato.
tika-s0101t:239_5: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanabhāvavacanato
tika-s0101t:239_6: ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato, apakārino
tika-s0101t:239_7: apakārakhantiṃ vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato, khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena
tika-s0101t:239_9: ca khantiyā anantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0101t:239_10: hi virati sijjhati. Avisaṃvāditaṃ vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato. Saccasandho hi
tika-s0101t:239_11: dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova pavattati. Ñāṇasaccaṃ vatvā sambhāresu pavattiniṭṭhāpanavacanato.
tika-s0101t:239_12: Yathābhūtañāṇavā hi bodhisambhāresu adhitiṭṭhati, te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvatoti
tika-s0101t:239_13: saccassa anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito,
tika-s0101t:239_14: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato. Bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī
tika-s0101t:239_15: hoti. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanato, samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ
tika-s0101t:239_16: mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya mettāvisuddhito, sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu
tika-s0101t:239_18: upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇabhāvavacanato ca mettāya anantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:240_0: Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti? Ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo
tika-s0101t:240_1: parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0101t:241_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā.
tika-s0101t:242_0: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇaṃ dānaṃ, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:242_2: sīlaṃ, samādhānalakkhaṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
tika-s0101t:242_3: anavajjarasaṃ vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, hirottappapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Kāmato bhavato ca
tika-s0101t:242_4: nikkhamanalakkhaṇaṃ nekkhammaṃ, tadādīnavavibhāvanarasaṃ, tato eva vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:242_6: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā
tika-s0101t:242_7: araññagatasudesako viya, samādhipadaṭṭhānā, catusaccapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:242_9: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Khamanalakkhaṇā khanti, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasahanarasā, adhivāsanapaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0101t:242_14: mettā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayanarasā vā, sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, sattānaṃ
tika-s0101t:243_0: Ko paccayoti abhinīhāro paccayo. Yo hi ayaṃ “manussattaṃ liṅgasampattī”tiādi aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito
tika-s0101t:243_1: “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ, mutto moceyyaṃ, buddho bodheyyaṃ, suddho sodheyyaṃ, danto dameyyaṃ,
tika-s0101t:243_2: santo sameyyaṃ, assattho assāseyyaṃ, parinibbuto parinibbāpeyya”ntiādinā pavatto
tika-s0101t:243_3: abhinīhāro, so avisesena sabbapāramīnaṃ paccayo. Tappavattiyā hi uddhaṃ pāramīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:244_0: Yathā ca abhinīhāro, evaṃ mahākaruṇā, upāyakosallañca. Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma
tika-s0101t:244_1: dānādīnaṃ bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā, yāhi karuṇūpāyakosallatāhi mahāpurisānaṃ
tika-s0101t:244_4: ca sampajjati. Tathā hi paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakammasiddhi. Paññāya
tika-s0101t:244_5: sayaṃ tarati, karuṇāya pare tāreti. Paññāya paradukkhaṃ parijānāti, karuṇāya paradukkhapaṭikāraṃ
tika-s0101t:244_6: ārabhati. Paññāya ca dukkhe nibbindati, karuṇāya dukkhaṃ sampaṭicchati. Tathā paññāya
tika-s0101t:244_7: parinibbānābhimukho hoti, karuṇāya taṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tathā karuṇāya saṃsārābhimukho
tika-s0101t:244_8: hoti, paññāya tatra nābhiramati. Paññāya ca sabbattha virajjati, karuṇānugatattā
tika-s0101t:244_9: na ca na sabbesaṃ anuggahāya pavatto, karuṇāya sabbepi anukampati, paññānugatattā
tika-s0101t:244_10: na ca na sabbattha virattacitto. Paññāya ca ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvo, karuṇāya ālasiyadīnatābhāvo.
tika-s0101t:244_11: Tathā paññākaruṇāhi yathākkamaṃ attaparanāthatā, dhīravīrabhāvo, anattantapaaparantapatā,
tika-s0101t:244_14: visesena upāyabhāvato paññākaruṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Idañca dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya
tika-s0101t:245: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbā, yā buddhabhāvassa uppattiṭṭhānatāya “buddhabhūmiyo”ti pavuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t:246_0: “Kati pana bhante buddhabhūmiyo? Catasso kho sāriputta buddhabhūmiyo. Katamā catasso?
tika-s0101t:246_1: Ussāho ca hoti vīriyaṃ, umaṅgo ca hoti paññābhāvanā, avatthānañca hoti adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:246_2: mettābhāvanā ca hoti hitacariyā. Imā kho sāriputta catasso buddhabhūmiyo”ti.
tika-s0101t:248_0: “Nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāme dosadassāvino, paviveka…pe… saṅgaṇikāya, alobha…pe…
tika-s0101t:248_1: lobhe, adosa…pe… dose, amoha…pe… mohe, nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvino”ti.
tika-s0101t:249_0: Tasmā ete bodhisattānaṃ cha ajjhāsayā dānādīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā. Na hi lobhādīsu
tika-s0101t:249_1: ādīnavadassanena, alobhādiadhikabhāvena ca vinā dānādipāramiyo sambhavanti. Alobhādīnañhi
tika-s0101t:249_2: adhikabhāvena pariccāgādininnacittatā alobhajjhāsayāditāti. Yathā cete, evaṃ dānajjhāsayatādayopi. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t:250_0: “Kati pana bhante bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā? Dasa kho sāriputta
tika-s0101t:250_1: bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā. Katame dasa? Dānajjhāsayā sāriputta bodhisattā
tika-s0101t:250_2: macchere dosadassāvino, sīla…pe… upekkhajjhāsayā sāriputta bodhisattā sukhadukkhesu dosadassāvino”ti.
tika-s0101t:251_2: dānādipāramīnaṃ nibbattiyā kāraṇanti. Tathā apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0101t:252_4: apāyūpapattisambhavatoti evaṃ vividhavipulānatthāvahā ete atthā nāma, tesaṃ pariccāgoyeveko
tika-s0101t:253_0: Apica “yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca “pahāya
tika-s0101t:253_1: gamanīyaṃ attano santakaṃ gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhīti mayhaṃ upadesako”ti ca “āditte
tika-s0101t:253_2: viya agāre maraṇagginā āditte loke tato mayhaṃ santakassa apavāhakasahāyo”ti ca “apavāhitassa
tika-s0101t:253_4: sabbasampattīnaṃ aggabhūtāya paramadullabhāya buddhabhūmiyā sampattihetubhāvato ca
tika-s0101t:254_0: Tathā “uḷāre kammani anenāhaṃ sambhāvito, tasmā sā sambhāvanā avitathā kātabbā”ti
tika-s0101t:254_1: ca “ekantabheditāya jīvitassa ayācitenapi mayā dātabbaṃ, pageva yācitenā”ti ca “uḷārajjhāsayehi
tika-s0101t:254_2: gavesitvāpi dātabbo, sayamevāgato mama puññenā”ti ca “yācakassa dānāpadesena mayhamevāyamanuggaho”ti
tika-s0101t:254_3: ca “ahaṃ viya ayaṃ sabbopi loko mayā anuggahetabbo”ti ca “asati yācake kathaṃ mayhaṃ
tika-s0101t:254_4: dānapāramī pūreyyā”ti ca “yācakānamevatthāya mayā sabbo pariggahetabbo”ti ca “ayācitvā
tika-s0101t:254_5: mama santakaṃ yācakā sayameva kadā gaṇheyyu”nti ca “kathamahaṃ yācakānaṃ piyo cassaṃ
tika-s0101t:254_6: manāpo”ti ca “kathaṃ vā te mayhaṃ piyā cassu manāpā”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ dadamāno,
tika-s0101t:254_7: datvāpi ca attamano assaṃ pamudito pītisomanassajāto”ti ca “kathaṃ vā me yācakā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t:254_8: uḷāro ca dānajjhāsayo”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhamayācitoyeva yācakānaṃ hadayamaññāya dadeyya”nti
tika-s0101t:254_9: ca “sati dhane yācake ca apariccāgo mahatī mayhaṃ vañcanā”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ attano
tika-s0101t:254_10: aṅgāni jīvitaṃ vāpi yācakānaṃ pariccajeyya”nti ca paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:255_0: Apica “attho nāmāyaṃ nirapekkhaṃ dāyakaṃ anugacchati yathā taṃ nirapekkhaṃ khepakaṃ
tika-s0101t:255_1: kiṭako”ti atthe nirapekkhatāya cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Yācamāno pana yadi piyapuggalo
tika-s0101t:255_2: hoti, “piyo maṃ yācatī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Atha udāsīnapuggalo hoti, “ayaṃ
tika-s0101t:255_3: maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena mitto hotī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Dadantopi
tika-s0101t:255_4: hi yācakānaṃ piyo hotīti. Atha pana verīpuggalo yācati, “paccatthiko maṃ yācati,
tika-s0101t:255_5: ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verīpi piyo mitto hotī”ti visesato somanassaṃ
tika-s0101t:255_6: uppādetabbaṃ. Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaverīpuggalesupi mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ karuṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:256_0: Sace panassa cirakālaparibhāvitattā lobhassa deyyadhammavisayā lobhadhammā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t:256_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sappurisa sambodhāya
tika-s0101t:256_2: abhinīhāraṃ karontena sabbasattānaṃ upakāratthāya ayaṃ kāyo nissaṭṭho, tappariccāgamayañca
tika-s0101t:256_3: puññaṃ, tattha nāma te bāhirepi vatthusmiṃ atisaṅgappavatti hatthisinānasadisī hoti,
tika-s0101t:256_4: tasmā tayā na katthaci saṅgo uppādetabbo. Seyyathāpi nāma mahato bhesajjarukkhassa
tika-s0101t:256_5: tiṭṭhato mūlaṃ mūlatthikā haranti, papaṭikaṃ, tacaṃ, khandhaṃ, viṭapaṃ, sāraṃ, sākhaṃ,
tika-s0101t:256_6: palāsaṃ, pupphaṃ, phalaṃ phalatthikā haranti, na tassa rukkhassa ‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ
tika-s0101t:256_7: ete harantī”ti vitakkasamudācāro hoti, evameva sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpajjantena
tika-s0101t:256_8: mayā mahādukkhe akataññuke niccāsucimhi kāye paresaṃ upakārāya viniyujjamāne aṇumattopi
tika-s0101t:256_9: micchāvitakko na uppādetabbo, ko vā ettha viseso ajjhattikabāhiresu mahābhūtesu ekantabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammesu,
tika-s0101t:256_10: kevalaṃ pana sammohavijambhitametaṃ, yadidaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti
tika-s0101t:256_11: abhiniveso. Tasmā bāhiresu viya ajjhattikesupi karacaraṇanayanādīsu, maṃsādīsu ca
tika-s0101t:256_12: anapekkhena hutvā ‘taṃtadatthikā harantū’ti nissaṭṭhacittena bhavitabba”nti. Evaṃ
tika-s0101t:256_13: paṭisañcikkhato cassa bodhāya pahitattassa kāyajīvitesu nirapekkhassa appakasireneva
tika-s0101t:256_14: kāyavacīmanokammāni suvisuddhāni honti. So visuddhakāyavacīmanokammanto visuddhājīvo
tika-s0101t:256_15: ñāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito, āyāpāyupāyakosallasamannāgamena bhiyyoso mattāya deyyadhammapariccāgena,
tika-s0101t:256_16: abhayadānasaddhammadānehi ca sabbasatte anuggaṇhituṃ samattho hotīti. Ayaṃ tāva dānapāramiyaṃ paccavekkhaṇānayo.
tika-s0101t:257_0: Sīlapāramiyaṃ pana evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ – idañhi sīlaṃ nāma gaṅgodakādīhi visodhetuṃ
tika-s0101t:257_1: asakkuṇeyyassa dosamalassa vikkhālanajalaṃ, haricandanādīhi vinetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarāgādipariḷāhavinayanaṃ,
tika-s0101t:257_2: hāramakuṭakuṇḍalādīhi pacurajanālaṅkārehi asādhāraṇo sādhūnaṃ alaṅkāraviseso, sabbadisāvāyanato
tika-s0101t:257_3: akittimo, sabbakālānurūpo ca surabhigandho, khattiyamahāsālādīhi devatāhi ca vandanīyādibhāvāvahanato
tika-s0101t:257_6: patiṭṭhānabhūmi, yaṃ yaṃ vā panicchitaṃ patthitaṃ, tassa tassa samijjhanūpāyabhāvato
tika-s0101t:257_7: cintāmaṇikapparukkhādike ca atiseti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato
tika-s0101t:257_8: cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti. Aparampi vuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyya ce bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:257_9: piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”tiādi,
tika-s0101t:257_10: tathā “avippaṭisāratthāni kho ānanda kusalāni sīlānī”ti, “pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā
tika-s0101t:257_11: sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti suttānañca vasena sīlassa guṇā paccavekkhitabbā, tathā
tika-s0101t:258_2: atisayanato ca sīlaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Sīlavato hi attano sīlasampadāhetu mahantaṃ
tika-s0101t:258_3: pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati “kataṃ vata mayā kusalaṃ, kataṃ kalyāṇaṃ, kataṃ bhīruttāṇa”nti.
tika-s0101t:258_4: Tathā sīlavato attā na upavadati, na pare viññū, daṇḍaduggatibhayānaṃ sambhavoyeva
tika-s0101t:258_5: natthi, “sīlavā purisapuggalo kalyāṇadhammo”ti viññūnaṃ pāsaṃso hoti. Tathā sīlavato
tika-s0101t:258_6: yvāyaṃ “kataṃ vata mayā pāpaṃ, kataṃ luddaṃ, kataṃ kibbisa”nti dussīlassa vippaṭisāro
tika-s0101t:258_7: uppajjati, so na hoti. Sīlañca nāmetaṃ appamādādhiṭṭhānato, bhogabyasanādiparihāramukhena
tika-s0101t:258_8: mahato atthassa sādhanato, maṅgalabhāvato ca paramaṃ sotthiṭṭhānaṃ, nihīnajaccopi
tika-s0101t:258_9: sīlavā khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ pūjanīyo hotīti kulasampattiṃ atiseti sīlasampadā, “taṃ
tika-s0101t:258_10: kiṃ maññasi mahārāja, idha te assa puriso dāso kammakaro”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0101t:258_12: ca bāhiradhanaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ, paramassa cittissariyassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato khattiyādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:258_13: issariyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ. Sīlanimittañhi taṃtaṃsattanikāyesu sattānaṃ issariyaṃ vassasatadīghappamāṇato
tika-s0101t:258_14: jīvitato ekāhampi sīlavato jīvitassa visiṭṭhatāvacanato, sati ca jīvite sikkhānikkhepassa
tika-s0101t:258_15: maraṇatāvacanato sīlaṃ jīvitato visiṭṭhataraṃ. Verīnampi manuññabhāvāvahanato, jarārogavipattīhi
tika-s0101t:258_16: anabhibhavanīyato ca rūpasampattiṃ atiseti sīlaṃ. Pāsādahammiyādiṭṭhānavisese, rājayuvarājasenāpatiādiṭṭhānavisese
tika-s0101t:258_17: ca atiseti sīlaṃ sukhavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Sabhāvasiniddhe santikāvacarepi bandhujane
tika-s0101t:258_18: mittajane ca atiseti ekantahitasampādanato, paralokānugamanato ca. “Na taṃ mātā pitā
tika-s0101t:258_19: kayirā”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Tathā hatthiassarathādibhedehi, mantāgadasotthānappayogehi
tika-s0101t:258_20: ca durārakkhaṃ attānaṃ ārakkhabhāvena sīlameva visiṭṭhataraṃ attādhīnato, aparādhīnato,
tika-s0101t:258_21: mahāvisayato ca. Tenevāha “dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri”ntiādi. Evamanekaguṇasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0101t:258_22: sīlanti paccavekkhantassa aparipuṇṇā ceva sīlasampadā pāripūriṃ gacchati aparisuddhā ca pārisuddhiṃ.
tika-s0101t:259_0: Sace panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena sīlapaṭipakkhā dhammā dosādayo antarantarā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t:259_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sambodhāya paṇidhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:259_2: kataṃ, sīlavikalena ca na sakkā lokiyāpi sampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ, pageva lokuttarā,
tika-s0101t:259_3: sabbasampattīnaṃ pana aggabhūtāya sammāsambodhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhūtena sīlena paramukkaṃsagatena
tika-s0101t:259_4: bhavitabbaṃ. Tasmā ‘kikīva aṇḍa’ntiādinā vuttanayena sammā sīlaṃ parirakkhantena
tika-s0101t:259_5: suṭṭhu tayā pesalena bhavitabbaṃ. Api ca tayā dhammadesanāya yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇaparipācanāni
tika-s0101t:259_6: kātabbāni, sīlavikalassa ca vacanaṃ na paccetabbaṃ hoti asappāyāhāravicārassa viya
tika-s0101t:259_7: vejjassa tikicchanaṃ, tasmā kathāhaṃ saddheyyo hutvā sattānaṃ avatāraṇaparipācanāni
tika-s0101t:259_9: sattānaṃ upakārakaraṇasamatthatā, paññāpāramīādiparipūraṇañca, jhānādayo ca guṇā
tika-s0101t:259_10: sīlapārisuddhiṃ vinā na sambhavantī”ti sammadeva sīlaṃ parisodhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:260_1: “mātāpi puttena vivadatī”tiādinā ca kāmesu “seyyathāpi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante
tika-s0101t:260_4: veditabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepattho, vitthāro pana dukkhakkhandha vīmaṃsasuttādi vasena
tika-s0101t:261_0: Tathā “paññāya vinā dānādayo dhammā na visujjhanti, yathāsakaṃ byāpārasamatthā ca
tika-s0101t:261_1: na hontī”ti paññāguṇā manasi kātabbā. Yatheva hi jīvitena vinā sarīrayantaṃ na sobhati,
tika-s0101t:261_2: na ca attano kiriyāsu paṭipattisamatthaṃ hoti, yathā ca cakkhādīni indriyāni viññāṇena
tika-s0101t:261_3: vinā yathāsakaṃ visayesu kiccaṃ kātuṃ nappahonti, evaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni paññāya
tika-s0101t:261_4: vinā sakiccapaṭipattiyaṃ asamatthānīti pariccāgādipaṭipattiyaṃ paññā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:261_5: Ummīlitapaññācakkhukā hi mahāsattā attano aṅgapaccaṅgānipi datvā anattukkaṃsakā,
tika-s0101t:261_6: aparavambhakā ca honti, bhesajjarukkhā viya vikapparahitā kālattayepi somanassajātā.
tika-s0101t:261_7: Paññāvasena upāyakosallayogato pariccāgo parahitappavattiyā dānapāramibhāvaṃ upeti.
tika-s0101t:262_0: Tathā paññāya abhāvena taṇhādisaṃkilesāviyogato sīlassa visuddhiyeva na sambhavati,
tika-s0101t:262_1: kuto sabbaññuguṇādhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Paññavā eva ca gharāvāse kāmaguṇesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ,
tika-s0101t:262_2: pabbajjāya jhānasamāpattiyaṃ nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhento pabbajitvā
tika-s0101t:262_3: jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā nibbānaninno, pare ca tattha patiṭṭhapetīti.
tika-s0101t:263_0: Vīriyañca paññārahitaṃ yadicchitamatthaṃ na sādheti durārambhabhāvato. Varameva hi
tika-s0101t:263_1: anārambho durārambhato, paññāsahitena pana vīriyena na kiñci duradhigamaṃ upāyapaṭipattito.
tika-s0101t:263_2: Tathā paññavā eva parāpakārādiadhivāsakajātiyo hoti, na duppañño. Paññāvirahitassa
tika-s0101t:263_3: ca parehi upanītā apakārā khantiyā paṭipakkhameva anubrūhenti, paññavato pana te
tika-s0101t:263_4: khantisampattiyā paribrūhanavasena assā thirabhāvāya saṃvattanti. Paññavā eva tīṇi
tika-s0101t:263_5: saccāni tesaṃ kāraṇāni paṭipakkhe ca yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā paresaṃ avisaṃvādako hoti.
tika-s0101t:263_6: Tathā paññābalena attānaṃ upatthambhetvā dhitisampadāya sabbapāramīsu acalasamādānādhiṭṭhāno
tika-s0101t:263_7: hoti, paññavā eva ca piyamajjhattaverīvibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbattha hitūpasaṃhārakusalo
tika-s0101t:263_8: hoti. Tathā paññāvasena lābhādilokadhammasannipāte nibbikāratāya majjhatto hoti.
tika-s0101t:263_9: Evaṃ sabbāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ paññāva pārisuddhihetūti paññāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0101t:264_0: Apica paññāya vinā na dassanasampatti, antarena ca diṭṭhisampadaṃ na sīlasampadā,
tika-s0101t:264_1: sīladiṭṭhisampadārahitassa na samādhisampadā, asamāhitena ca na sakkā attahitamattampi
tika-s0101t:264_2: sādhetuṃ, pageva ukkaṃsagataṃ parahitanti parahitāya paṭipannena “nanu tayā sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0101t:264_3: paññāpārisuddhiyaṃ āyogo karaṇīyo”ti bodhisattena attā ovaditabbo. Paññānubhāvena
tika-s0101t:264_4: hi mahāsatto caturadhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhito catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto satte
tika-s0101t:264_5: niyyānikamagge avatāreti, indriyāni ca nesaṃ paripāceti. Tathā paññābalena khandhāyatanādīsu
tika-s0101t:264_6: pavicayabahulo pavattinivattiyo yāthāvato parijānanto dānādayo guṇe visesanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0101t:264_7: nayanto bodhisattasikkhāya paripūrakārī hotīti evamādinā anekākāravokāre paññāguṇe
tika-s0101t:265_0: Tathā dissamānapārānipi lokiyāni kammāni nihīnavīriyena pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni,
tika-s0101t:265_1: agaṇitakhedena pana āraddhavīriyena duradhigamaṃ nāma natthi. Nihīnavīriyo hi “saṃsāramahoghato
tika-s0101t:265_2: sabbasatte santāressāmī”ti ārabhitumeva na sakkuṇoti. Majjhimo ārabhitvā antarāvosānamāpajjati.
tika-s0101t:265_3: Ukkaṭṭhavīriyo pana attasukhanirapekkho ārambhapāraṃ adhigacchatīti vīriyasampatti
tika-s0101t:265_5: tassāpi vīriyassa sithilabhāvena manorathānaṃ matthakappatti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0101t:265_6: pageva sadevakassa lokassa samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhārenā”ti ca “rāgādīnaṃ dosagaṇānaṃ
tika-s0101t:265_7: mattamahāgajānaṃ viya dunnivārayabhāvato, tannidānānañca kammasamādānānaṃ ukkhittāsikavadhakasadisabhāvato,
tika-s0101t:265_8: tannimittānañca duggatīnaṃ sabbadā vivaṭamukhabhāvato, tattha niyojakānañca pāpamittānaṃ
tika-s0101t:265_9: sadā sannihitabhāvato, tadovādakāritāya ca bālassa puthujjanabhāvassa sati sambhave
tika-s0101t:265_10: yuttaṃ sayameva saṃsāradukkhato nissaritu”nti ca “micchāvitakkā vīriyānubhāvena dūrī
tika-s0101t:265_11: bhavantī”ti ca “yadi pana sambodhi attādhīnena vīriyena sakkā samadhigantuṃ, kimettha
tika-s0101t:265_12: dukkara”nti ca evamādinā nayena vīriyassa guṇāpaccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0101t:266_0: Tathā “khanti nāmāyaṃ niravasesaguṇapaṭipakkhassa kodhassa vidhamanato guṇasampādane
tika-s0101t:266_2: balasampadā, kodhaggivinayanī udakadhārā, kalyāṇassa kittisaddassa sañjātideso, pāpapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0101t:266_3: vacīvisavūpasamakaro mantāgado, saṃvare ṭhitānaṃ paramā dhīrapakati, gambhīrāsayatāya
tika-s0101t:266_4: sāgaro, dosamahāsāgarassa velā, apāyadvārassa pidhānakavāṭaṃ, devabrahmalokānaṃ ārohaṇasopānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:266_5: sabbaguṇānaṃ adhivāsanabhūmi, uttamā kāyavacīmanovisuddhī”ti manasi kātabbaṃ. Api
tika-s0101t:266_6: ca “ete sattā khantisampattiyā abhāvato idha ceva tapanti, paraloke ca tapanīyadhammānuyogato”ti
tika-s0101t:266_7: ca “yadipi parāpakāranimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, tassa pana dukkhassa khettabhūto
tika-s0101t:266_8: attabhāvo, bījabhūtañca kammaṃ mayāva abhisaṅkhata”nti ca “tassa dukkhassa āṇaṇyakāraṇameta”nti
tika-s0101t:266_9: ca “apakārake asati kathaṃ mayhaṃ khantisampadā sambhavatī”ti ca “yadipāyaṃ etarahi
tika-s0101t:266_10: apakārako, ayaṃ nāma pubbe anena mayhaṃ upakāro kato”ti ca “apakāro eva vā khantinimittatāya
tika-s0101t:266_11: upakāro”ti ca “sabbepime sattā mayhaṃ puttasadisā, puttakatāparādhesu ca ko kujjhissatī”ti
tika-s0101t:266_12: ca “yena kodhabhūtāvesena ayaṃ mayhaṃ aparajjhati, so kodhabhūtāveso mayā vinetabbo”ti
tika-s0101t:266_13: ca “yena apakārena idaṃ mayhaṃ dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa ahampi nimitta”nti ca “yehi
tika-s0101t:266_14: dhammehi aparādho kato, yattha ca kato, sabbepi te tasmiṃyeva khaṇe niruddhā, kassidāni
tika-s0101t:266_15: kena kodho kātabbo”ti ca “anattatāya sabbadhammānaṃ ko kassa aparajjhatī”ti ca paccavekkhantena
tika-s0101t:267_0: Yadi panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena parāpakāranimittako kodho cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0101t:267_1: iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “khanti nāmesā parāpakārassa paṭipakkhapaṭipattīnaṃ paccupakārakāraṇa”nti
tika-s0101t:267_2: ca “apakāro ca mayhaṃ dukkhuppādanena dukkhupanisāya saddhāya, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāya
tika-s0101t:267_3: ca paccayo”ti ca “indriyapakatiresā, yadidaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo, tattha aniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo
tika-s0101t:267_4: mayhaṃ na siyāti taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ca “kodhavasiko satto kodhena ummatto vikkhittacitto,
tika-s0101t:267_5: tattha kiṃ paccapakārenā”ti ca “sabbe pime sattā sammāsambuddhena orasaputtā viya
tika-s0101t:267_6: paripālitā, tasmā na tattha mayā cittakopopi kātabbo”ti ca “aparādhake ca sati guṇe
tika-s0101t:267_7: guṇavati mayā na kopo kātabbo”ti ca “asati guṇe visesena karuṇāyitabbo”ti ca “kopena
tika-s0101t:267_8: ca mayhaṃ guṇayasā nihīyantī”ti ca “kujjhanena mayhaṃ dubbaṇṇadukkhaseyyādayo sapattakantā
tika-s0101t:267_9: āgacchantī”ti ca “kodho ca nāmāyaṃ sabbāhitakārako sabbahitavināsako balavā paccatthiko”ti
tika-s0101t:267_10: ca “sati ca khantiyā na koci paccatthiko”ti ca “aparādhakena aparādhanimittaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0101t:267_11: āyatiṃ laddhabbaṃ dukkhaṃ, sati ca khantiyā mayhaṃ tadabhāvo”ti ca “cintanena kujjhantena
tika-s0101t:267_12: ca mayā paccatthikoyeva anuvattito hotī”ti ca “kodhe ca mayā khantiyā abhibhūte tassa
tika-s0101t:267_13: dāsabhūto paccatthiko sammadeva abhibhūto hotī”ti ca “kodhanimittaṃ khantiguṇapariccāgo
tika-s0101t:267_14: mayhaṃ na yutto”ti ca “sati ca kodhe guṇavirodhini (guṇavirodhapaccanīdhamme cariyā.
tika-s0101t:267_15: aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathāyaṃ) kiṃ me sīlādidhammā pāripūriṃ gaccheyyuṃ, asati ca tesu
tika-s0101t:267_16: kathāhaṃ sattānaṃ upakārabahulo paṭiññānurūpaṃ uttamaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ca
tika-s0101t:267_17: “khantiyā ca sati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato samāhitassa sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato dukkhato
tika-s0101t:267_18: sabbe dhammā anattato nibbānañca asaṅkhatāmatasantapaṇītādibhāvato nijjhānaṃ khamanti
tika-s0101t:267_19: ‘buddhadhammā ca acinteyyāparimeyyapabhāvā’ti”, tato ca “anulomiyaṃ khantiyaṃ ṭhito
tika-s0101t:267_20: ‘kevalā ime ca attattaniyabhāvarahitā dhammamattā yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjanti
tika-s0101t:267_21: vayanti, na kutoci āgacchanti, na kuhiñci gacchanti, na ca katthaci patiṭṭhitā, na
tika-s0101t:267_22: cettha koci kassaci byāpāro’ti ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānadhiṭṭhānatā nijjhānaṃ khamati,
tika-s0101t:267_23: yena bodhisatto bodhiyā niyato anāvattidhammo hotī”ti evamādinā khantipāramiyaṃ paccavekkhaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0101t:268_0: Tathā “saccena vinā sīlādīnaṃ asambhavato, paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipattiyā abhāvato ca
tika-s0101t:268_1: saccadhammātikkame ca sabbapāpadhammānaṃ samosaraṇato, asaccasandhassa appaccayikabhāvato,
tika-s0101t:269_0: Tathā “dānādīsu daḷhasamādānaṃ, tampaṭipakkhasannipāte ca nesaṃ acalāvatthānaṃ, tattha
tika-s0101t:269_1: ca thirabhāvaṃ vinā na dānādisambhārā sambodhinimittā sambhavantī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhāne
tika-s0101t:270_0: Tathā “attahitamatte avatiṭṭhantenāpi sattesu hitacittataṃ vinā na sakkā idhalokaparalokasampattiyo
tika-s0101t:270_1: pāpuṇituṃ, pageva sabbasatte nibbānasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmenā”ti ca “pacchā
tika-s0101t:270_2: sabbasattānaṃ lokuttarasampattiṃ ākaṅkhantena idāni lokiyasampattiṃ ākaṅkhā yuttarūpā”ti
tika-s0101t:270_3: ca “idāni āsayamattena paresaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhāraṃ kātuṃ asakkonto kadā payogena
tika-s0101t:270_4: taṃ sādhessāmī”ti ca “idāni mayā hitasukhūpasaṃhārena saṃvaddhitā pacchā dhammasaṃvibhāgasahāyā
tika-s0101t:270_5: mayhaṃ bhavissantī”ti ca “etehi vinā na mayhaṃ bodhisambhārā sambhavanti, tasmā sabbabuddhaguṇavibhūtinipphattikāraṇattā
tika-s0101t:270_6: mayhaṃ ete paramaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalāyatanaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0101t:270_7: ca “savisesaṃ sattesu sabbesu hitajjhāsayatā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā, kiñca karuṇādhiṭṭhānatopi
tika-s0101t:270_8: sabbasattesu mettā anubrūhetabbā. Vimariyādīkatena hi cetasā sattesu hitasukhūpasaṃhāraniratassa
tika-s0101t:270_9: tesaṃ ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā balavatī uppajjati daḷhamūlā, karuṇā ca sabbesaṃ
tika-s0101t:270_10: buddhakārakadhammānamādi caraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā mūlaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti evamādinā mettāya
tika-s0101t:271_0: Tathā “upekkhāya abhāve sattehi katā vippakārā cittassa vikāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ, sati
tika-s0101t:271_1: ca cittavikāre dānādisambhārānaṃ sambhavoyeva natthī”ti ca “mettāsinehena sinehite
tika-s0101t:271_2: citte upekkhāya vinā sambhārānaṃ pārisuddhi na hotī”ti ca “anupekkhako sambhāresu
tika-s0101t:271_3: puññasambhāraṃ tabbipākañca sattahitatthaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca “upekkhāya
tika-s0101t:271_4: abhāve deyyapaṭiggāhakesu vibhāgaṃ akatvā pariccajituṃ na sakkotī”ti ca “upekkhārahitena
tika-s0101t:271_5: jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ jīvitassa ca antarāyaṃ amanasikaritvā saṃvaravisodhanaṃ kātuṃ
tika-s0101t:271_6: na sakkā”ti ca “upekkhāvasena aratiratisahasseva nekkhammabalasiddhito, upapattito
tika-s0101t:271_11: upekkhānubhāvena sampajjantī”ti evaṃ ādinā nayena upekkhāpāramī paccavekkhitabbā.
tika-s0101t:272_0: Tathā saparikkhārā pañcadasa caraṇadhammā pañca ca abhiññāyo. Tattha caraṇadhammā
tika-s0101t:272_1: nāma sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo, satta
tika-s0101t:272_2: saddhammā, cattāri jhānāni ca. Tesu sīlādīnaṃ catunnaṃ terasapi dhutadhammā, appicchatādayo
tika-s0101t:272_12: vekkhaṇatadadhimuttatā, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlādicatukkaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu
tika-s0101t:272_13: pubbabhāgabhāvanā, āvajjanādivasībhāvakaraṇañca parikkhāro. Tattha sīlādīhi payogasuddhiyā
tika-s0101t:272_14: sattānaṃ abhayadāne, āsayasuddhiyā āmisadāne, ubhayasuddhiyā ca dhammadāne samattho
tika-s0101t:272_15: hotītiādinā caraṇādīnaṃ dānādisambhārānaṃ paccayabhāvo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbo,
tika-s0101t:272_16: ativitthārabhayena na niddhārayimha. Evaṃ sampatticakkādayopi dānādīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbā.
tika-s0101t:273_0: Ko saṃkilesoti avisesena taṇhādīhi parāmaṭṭhabhāvo pāramīnaṃ saṃkileso, visesena
tika-s0101t:273_1: deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappā dānapāramiyā saṃkileso, sattakālavikappā sīlapāramiyā, kāmabhavatadupasamesu
tika-s0101t:273_3: līnuddhaccavikappā vīriyapāramiyā, attaparavikappā khantipāramiyā, adiṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhādivikappā
tika-s0101t:274_0: Kiṃ vodānanti taṇhādīhi anupaghāto, yathāvuttavikappaviraho ca etāsaṃ vodānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:274_2: madapamādādīhi kilesehi deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo parisuddhā
tika-s0101t:275_0: Ko paṭipakkhoti avisesena sabbepi kilesā sabbepi akusalā dhammā etāsaṃ paṭipakkho,
tika-s0101t:275_1: visesena pana pubbe vuttā maccherādayoti veditabbā. Apica deyyapaṭiggāhakadānaphalesu
tika-s0101t:275_4: nekkhammaṃ, lobhādīnaṃ andhīkaraṇato, ñāṇassa ca anandhīkaraṇato lobhādipaṭipakkhā
tika-s0101t:275_6: khamanato lobhādipaṭipakkhā khanti, satipi paresaṃ upakāre apakāre ca yathābhūtappavattiyā
tika-s0101t:275_7: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ saccaṃ, lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato
tika-s0101t:275_8: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, nīvaraṇavivekato lobhādipaṭipakkhā mettā, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
tika-s0101t:275_9: anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanato, samappavattito ca lobhādipaṭipakkhā upekkhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:276_1: ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ dāne paṭipatti. Tatthāyaṃ vitthāranayo – “imināhaṃ
tika-s0101t:276_3: nipphādeyya”nti annadānaṃ deti, tathā sattānaṃ kammakilesapipāsavūpasamāya pānaṃ
tika-s0101t:276_4: deti, tathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya, hirottappālaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni deti,
tika-s0101t:276_5: tathā iddhividhassa ceva nibbānasukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānaṃ deti, tathā sīlagandhanipphattiyā
tika-s0101t:276_8: padīpeyyaṃ deti. Byāmappabhānipphattiyā rūpadānaṃ, brahmassaranipphattiyā saddadānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:276_9: sabbalokassa piyabhāvāya rasadānaṃ, buddhasukhumālabhāvāya phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ, ajarāmaraṇabhāvāya
tika-s0101t:276_11: anavajjakhiḍḍāratihetudānaṃ, sabbepi satte ariyāya jātiyā attano puttabhāvūpanayanāya
tika-s0101t:276_12: puttadānaṃ, sakalassa lokassa patibhāvūpagamanāya dāradānaṃ, subhalakkhaṇasampattiyā
tika-s0101t:276_15: cakkaṅkitehi pādehi bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamanāya caraṇadānaṃ, caturoghanittharaṇāya sattānaṃ
tika-s0101t:276_18: sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhāvaho, sabbalokena ca upajīvitabbo me kāyo bhaveyyā”ti maṃsalohitādidānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:277_0: Evaṃ dadanto ca na anesanāya deti, na paropaghātena, na bhayena, na lajjāya, na dakkhiṇeyyarosanena,
tika-s0101t:277_1: na paṇīte sati lūkhaṃ, na attukkaṃsanena, na paravambhanena, na phalābhikaṅkhāya,
tika-s0101t:277_2: na yācakajigucchāya, na acittīkārena deti, atha kho sakkaccaṃ deti, sahatthena deti,
tika-s0101t:277_3: kālena deti, cittiṃ katvā deti, avibhāgena deti, tīsu kālesu somanassito deti. Tatoyeva
tika-s0101t:277_4: datvā na pacchānutāpī hoti, na paṭiggāhakavasena mānāvamānaṃ karoti, paṭiggāhakānaṃ
tika-s0101t:277_5: piyasamudācāro hoti vadaññū yācayogo saparivāradāyī. Tañca dānasampattiṃ sakalalokahitasukhāya
tika-s0101t:277_6: pariṇāmeti, attano ca akuppāya vimuttiyā, aparikkhayassa chandassa, aparikkhayassa
tika-s0101t:277_7: vīriyassa, aparikkhayassa samādhānassa, aparikkhayassa ñāṇassa, aparikkhayāya sammāsambodhiyā
tika-s0101t:277_8: pariṇāmeti. Imañca dānapāramiṃ paṭipajjantena mahāsattena jīvite, bhogesu ca aniccasaññā
tika-s0101t:277_9: paccupaṭṭhapetabbā, sattesu ca mahākaruṇā. Evañhi bhoge gahetabbasāraṃ gaṇhanto ādittasmā
tika-s0101t:277_10: viya agārasmā sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ, attānañca bahi nīharanto na kiñci seseti, niravasesato
tika-s0101t:278_0: Sīlapāramiyā pana yasmā sabbaññusīlālaṅkārehi satte alaṅkaritukāmena attanoyeva tāva
tika-s0101t:278_1: sīlaṃ visodhetabbaṃ, tasmā sattesu tathā dayāpannacittena bhavitabbaṃ, yathā supinantenapi
tika-s0101t:278_2: na āghāto uppajjeyya. Parūpakāraniratatāya parasantako alagaddo viya na parāmasitabbo.
tika-s0101t:278_3: Abrahmacariyatopi ārācārī, sattavidhamethuna saṃyogavirato, pageva paradāragamanato.
tika-s0101t:278_4: Saccaṃ hitaṃ piyaṃ parimitameva ca kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti, anabhijjhālu
tika-s0101t:278_5: abyāpanno aviparītadassano sammāsambuddhe niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo. Iti caturāpāyavaṭṭadukkhapathehi
tika-s0101t:278_6: akusalakammapathehi, akusaladhammehi ca oramitvā saggamokkhapathesu kusalakammapathesu
tika-s0101t:278_7: patiṭṭhitassa suddhāsayapayogatāya yathābhipatthitā sattānaṃ hitasukhūpasañhitā manorathā
tika-s0101t:279_0: Tattha hiṃsānivattiyā sabbasattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ deti, appakasireneva mettābhāvanaṃ
tika-s0101t:279_1: sampādeti, ekādasa mettānisaṃse adhigacchati, appābādho hoti appātaṅko dīghāyuko
tika-s0101t:279_2: sukhabahulo, lakkhaṇavisese pāpuṇāti, dosavāsanañca samucchindati. Tathā adinnādānanivattiyā
tika-s0101t:279_3: corādiasādhāraṇe uḷāre bhoge adhigacchati, anāsaṅkanīyo piyo manāpo vissasanīyo,
tika-s0101t:279_4: vibhavasampattīsu alaggacitto pariccāgasīlo, lobhavāsanañca samucchindati. Abrahmacariyanivattiyā
tika-s0101t:279_5: alobho hoti santakāyacitto, sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo aparisaṅkanīyo, kalyāṇo cassa
tika-s0101t:279_6: kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, alaggacitto hoti mātugāmesu aluddhāsayo, nekkhammabahulo,
tika-s0101t:280_0: Musāvādanivattiyā sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto hoti paccayiko theto ādeyyavacano devatānaṃ
tika-s0101t:280_1: piyo manāpo surabhigandhamukho ārakkhiyakāyavacīsamācāro, lakkhaṇavisese ca adhigacchati,
tika-s0101t:280_2: kilesavāsanañca samucchindati. Pesuññanivattiyā parūpakkamehi abhejjakāyo hoti abhejjaparivāro,
tika-s0101t:280_3: saddhamme ca abhijjanakasaddho, daḷhamitto bhavantaraparicitānampi sattānaṃ ekantapiyo,
tika-s0101t:280_4: asaṃkilesabahulo. Pharusavācānivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo sukhasīlo madhuravacano
tika-s0101t:280_5: sambhāvanīyo, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato cassa saro nibbattati. Samphappalāpanivattiyā ca
tika-s0101t:280_6: sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garubhāvanīyo ca ādeyyavacano ca parimitālāpo, mahesakkho
tika-s0101t:280_7: ca hoti mahānubhāvo, ṭhānuppattikena paṭibhānena pañhānaṃ byākaraṇakusalo, buddhabhūmiyañca
tika-s0101t:280_8: ekāya eva vācāya anekabhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ anekesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamattho hoti.
tika-s0101t:281_0: Anabhijjhālutāya icchitalābhī hoti, uḷāresu ca bhogesu ruciṃ paṭilabhati, khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:281_1: sammato hoti, paccatthikehi anabhibhavanīyo, indriyavekallaṃ na pāpuṇāti, appaṭipuggalo
tika-s0101t:281_2: ca hoti. Abyāpādena piyadassano hoti sattānaṃ sambhāvanīyo, parahitābhinanditāya
tika-s0101t:281_3: ca satte appakasireneva pasādeti, alūkhasabhāvo ca hoti mettāvihārī, mahesakkho ca
tika-s0101t:281_4: hoti mahānubhāvo. Micchādassanābhāvena kalyāṇe sahāye paṭilabhati, sīsacchedampi
tika-s0101t:281_5: pāpuṇanto pāpakammaṃ na karoti, kammassakatādassanato akotūhalamaṅgaliko ca hoti,
tika-s0101t:281_6: saddhamme cassa saddhā patiṭṭhitā hoti mūlajātā, saddahati ca tathāgatānaṃ bodhiṃ,
tika-s0101t:281_7: samayantaresu nābhiramati ukkāraṭṭhāne viya rājahaṃso, lakkhaṇattayaparijānanakusalo
tika-s0101t:281_8: hoti, ante ca anāvaraṇañāṇalābhī, yāva bodhiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye
tika-s0101t:282_0: “Iti hidaṃ sīlaṃ nāma sabbasampattīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ pabhavabhūmi,
tika-s0101t:282_1: sabbabuddhakaradhammānamādi caraṇaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti bahumānaṃ uppādetvā kāyavacīsaṃyame,
tika-s0101t:282_2: indriyadamane, ājīvasampadāya, paccayaparibhoge ca satisampajaññabalena appamattena
tika-s0101t:282_4: vuttanayena sakkaccaṃ sīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
tika-s0101t:282_5: vuttanayena veditabbo. Tañca panetaṃ sīlaṃ na attano duggatiparikilesavimuttiyā,
