tika-s0101t:1201_3: na koci “sādhū”ti vadati, tathā diṭṭhadhammikādiatthānaṃ asādhanato, sattānaṃ sādhubhāvassa
tika-s0101t:1201_4: ca dūsanato. Na nirundhitabbanti rūpaggahaṇe na nivāretabbaṃ. Dassanīyadassanattho
tika-s0101t:1201_5: hi cakkhupaṭilābhoti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Yadaggena tesaṃ pañcadvāre asaṃvaro sādhu,
tika-s0101t:1201_6: tadaggena tattha saṃvaro na sādhūti āha “puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcadvāre saṃvara”nti.
tika-s0101t:1202_0: Atha vā yaṃ te ekaccaṃ vadanti “sādhū”ti te “eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti vuttā titthiyā
tika-s0101t:1202_1: yaṃ attakilamathānuyogādiṃ “sādhū”ti vadanti, mayaṃ taṃ na “sādhū”ti vadāma. Yaṃ
tika-s0101t:1202_2: te ekaccaṃ vadanti “na sādhū”ti yaṃ pana te anavajjapaccayaparibhogaṃ, sunivatthasupārupanādisammāpaṭipattiñca
tika-s0101t:1202_3: “na sādhū”ti vadanti, taṃ mayaṃ “sādhū”ti vadāmāti evaṃ pettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:1203_0: Evaṃ yaṃ paravādamūlakaṃ catukkaṃ dassitaṃ, tadeva puna sakavādamūlakaṃ katvā dassitanti
tika-s0101t:1203_1: pakāsento “eva”ntiādimāha. Yañhi kiñci kenaci samānaṃ, tenapi taṃ samānameva, tathā
tika-s0101t:1203_2: asamānaṃ pīti. Samānāsamānatanti samānāsamānatāmattaṃ. Anavasesato hi pahātabbānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1203_3: dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ sakavāde dissati, na paravāde. Tathā paripuṇṇameva ca upasampādetabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1203_4: upasampādanaṃ sakavāde, na paravāde. Tena vuttaṃ “tyāha”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t:1205_0: 385. Laddhiṃ pucchantoti “kiṃ samaṇo gotamo saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattati,
tika-s0101t:1205_1: udāhu pare gaṇācariyā. Ettha tāva attano laddhiṃ vadā”ti laddhiṃ pucchanto. Kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:1205_2: pucchantoti “samaṇo gotamo saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattatī”ti vutte “kena
tika-s0101t:1205_3: kāraṇena evamatthaṃ gāhayā”ti kāraṇaṃ pucchanto. Ubhayaṃ pucchantoti “idaṃ nāmettha
tika-s0101t:1205_4: kāraṇa”nti kāraṇaṃ vatvā paṭiññāte atthe sādhiyamāne anvayato, byatirekato ca kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:1205_5: samatthetuṃ sadisāsadisabhedaṃ upamodāharaṇadvayaṃ pucchanto, ubhayaṃ pucchanto kāraṇassa
tika-s0101t:1205_6: ca tilakkhaṇasampattiyā yathāpaṭiññāte atthe sādhite sammadeva anupacchā bhāsanto
tika-s0101t:1205_7: nigamento samanubhāsati nāma. Upasaṃharitvāti upanetvā. “Kiṃ te”tiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1206_0: Tamatthanti taṃ pahātabbadhammānaṃ anavasesaṃ pahāya vattanasaṅkhātañca samādātabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1206_1: anavasesaṃ samādāya vattanasaṅkhātañca atthaṃ. Yojetvāti akusalādipadehi yojetvā.
tika-s0101t:1206_2: Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā ceva tatoyeva akusalāti ca saṅkhaṃ gatāti saṅkhātā
tika-s0101t:1206_3: tattha purimapadena ekantākusale vadati, dutiyapadena taṃsahagate, taṃpakkhiye ca,
tika-s0101t:1206_4: tenāha “koṭṭhāsaṃ vā katvā ṭhapitā”ti, akusalapakkhiyabhāvena vavatthāpitāti attho.
tika-s0101t:1206_5: Avajjaṭṭho dosaṭṭho gārayhapariyāyattāti āha “sāvajjāti sadosā”ti. Ariyā nāma niddosā,
tika-s0101t:1206_6: ime pana katthacipi niddosā na hontīti niddosaṭṭhena ariyā bhavituṃ nālaṃ asamatthā.
tika-s0101t:1207_0: 386-392. Yanti kāraṇe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha “yena viññū”ti. Yaṃ vā panāti “yaṃ
tika-s0101t:1207_1: pana kiñcī”ti asambhāvanavacanametanti āha “yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattaka”nti. Gaṇācariyā
tika-s0101t:1207_2: pūraṇādayo. Satthuppabhavattā saṅghassa saṅghasampattiyāpi satthusampatti vibhāvīyatīti
tika-s0101t:1207_3: āha “saṅghapasaṃsāyapi satthuyeva pasaṃsāsiddhito”ti. Sā pana pasaṃsā pasādahetukāti
tika-s0101t:1207_4: pasādamukhena taṃ dassetuṃ “pasīdamānāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pi-saddena yathā
tika-s0101t:1207_5: anvayato pasaṃsā samuccīyati, evaṃ satthuvippaṭipattiyā sāvakesu, sāvakavippaṭipattiyā
tika-s0101t:1207_6: ca satthari appasādo samuccīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sarīrasampattinti rūpasampattiṃ, rūpakāyapāripūrinti
tika-s0101t:1207_7: attho. Bhavanti vattāro rūpappamāṇā, ghosadhammappamāṇā ca. Puna bhavanti vattāroti
tika-s0101t:1207_8: dhammappamāṇavaseneva yojetabbaṃ. Yā saṅghassa pasaṃsāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0101t:1208_0: Tattha yā buddhānaṃ, buddhasāvakānaṃyeva ca pāsaṃsatā, aññesañca tadabhāvo jotito,
tika-s0101t:1208_3: vā “dukkha”nti vā vividhaṃ dassanamattavasena, na pana nāmarūpavavatthānapaccayapariggaṇhanapubbakaṃ
tika-s0101t:1208_5: “Sesa”nti pañcasīlato añño sabbo sīlasaṃvaro, “khamo hotī”tiādinā vutto suparisuddho
tika-s0101t:1208_6: khantisaṃvaro, “paññāyete pidhiyyare”ti evaṃ vutto kilesānaṃ samucchedako maggañāṇasaṅkhāto
tika-s0101t:1208_7: ñāṇasaṃvaro, manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ pidahanavasena pavatto parisuddho indriyasaṃvaro,
tika-s0101t:1208_8: “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāyā”tiādinā vutto sammappadhānasaṅkhāto
tika-s0101t:1208_9: vīriyasaṃvaroti imaṃ saṃvarapañcakaṃ sandhāyāha. Pañca kho panime pātimokkhuddesātiādi
tika-s0101t:1208_10: sāsane sīlassa bahubhāvaṃ dassetvā tadekadese eva paresaṃ avaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ yathāvuttasīlasaṃvarasseva puna gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1210_0: 393. Sīhanādanti seṭṭhanādaṃ, abhītanādaṃ kenaci appaṭivattiyanādanti attho. “Ayaṃ
tika-s0101t:1210_1: yathāvutto mama vādo aviparīto, tassa aviparītabhāvo imaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā aparappaccayato
tika-s0101t:1210_2: jānitabbo”ti evaṃ aviparītabhāvāvabodhanatthaṃ. “Atthi kassapā”tiādīsu yaṃ maggaṃ
tika-s0101t:1210_3: paṭipanno samaṇo gotamo vadanto yuttapattakāle, tathabhāvato bhūtaṃ, ekaṃsato hitāvihabhāvena
tika-s0101t:1210_4: atthaṃ, dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ, vinayayogato paresaṃ vinayanato ca vinayaṃ vadatīti
tika-s0101t:1210_5: sāmaṃyeva attapaccakkhatova jānissati, so mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedito
tika-s0101t:1210_6: sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇabhūto atthi kassapa maggo, tassa ca adhigamūpāyabhūtā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti
tika-s0101t:1210_7: ayamettha yojanā. Tena “samaṇo gotamo ime dhamme”tiādinayappavatto vādo kenaci asaṃkampiyo
tika-s0101t:1211_0: “Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passatī”tiādīsu viya maggañca paṭipadañca ekato
tika-s0101t:1211_1: katvā dassento. “Ayamevā”ti vacanaṃ maggassa puthubhāvapaṭikkhepanatthaṃ, sabbaariyasādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1211_2: sāsane pākaṭabhāvadassanatthañca. Tenāha “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo”ti, “eseva
tika-s0101t:1216: Sabbesu suttapadesesu abhidhammapadesesu ca ekovāyaṃ maggo pākaṭo paññāto āgato cāti.
tika-s0101t:1218_0: 394. Tapoyeva upakkamitabbato ārabhitabbato tapopakkamoti āha “tapārambhā”ti. Ārambhanañcettha
tika-s0101t:1218_1: karaṇamevāti āha “tapokammānīti attho”ti. Samaṇakammasaṅkhātāti samaṇehi kattabbakammasaññitā.
tika-s0101t:1218_2: Niccoloti nissaṭṭhacelo sabbena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittacelo. Naggiyavatasamādānena naggo.
tika-s0101t:1218_4: tena vissaṭṭhattā. Jivhāya hatthaṃ apalikhati apalihati udakena adhovanato. Dutiyavikappepi
tika-s0101t:1218_5: eseva nayo. “Ehi bhaddante”ti vutte upagamanasaṅkhāto vidhi ehibhaddanto, taṃ caratīti
tika-s0101t:1218_6: ehibhaddantiko, tappaṭikkhepena na ehibhaddantiko. Na karoti samaṇena nāma parassa
tika-s0101t:1218_7: vacanakarena na bhavitabbanti adhippāyena. Puretaranti taṃ ṭhānaṃ attano upagamanato
tika-s0101t:1218_8: puretaraṃ. Taṃ kira so “bhikkhunā nāma yādicchakī eva bhikkhā gahetabbā”ti adhippāyena
tika-s0101t:1218_9: na gaṇhāti. Uddissakataṃ “mama nimittabhāvena bahū khuddakā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpāditā”ti
tika-s0101t:1218_10: na gaṇhāti. Nimantanaṃ na sādiyati “evaṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti. Kumbhīādīsupi
tika-s0101t:1219: Kabaḷantarāyoti kabaḷassa antarāyo hotīti. Gāmasabhāgādivasena saṅgamma kittenti etissāti saṅkitti, tathā saṃhaṭataṇḍulādisañcayo. Manussāti veyyāvaccakaramanussā.
tika-s0101t:1220_0: Surāpānamevāti majjalakkhaṇappattāya surāya pānameva surāggahaṇena cettha merayampi
tika-s0101t:1220_1: saṅgahitaṃ. Ekāgārameva uñchatīti ekāgāriko. Ekālopeneva vattatīti ekālopiko. Dīyati
tika-s0101t:1220_2: etāyāti datti, dvattiālopamattagāhi khuddakaṃ bhikkhādānabhājanaṃ, tenāha “khuddakapātī”ti.
tika-s0101t:1220_3: Abhuñjanavasena eko aho etassa atthīti ekāhiko, āhāro. Taṃ ekāhikaṃ, so pana atthato
tika-s0101t:1220_5: abhuñjitvā ekāhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ ekāhavāro, taṃ ekāhikameva atthato. Dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā
tika-s0101t:1220_6: dvīhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ dvīhavāro. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Ukkaṭṭho pana pariyāyabhattabhojaniko
tika-s0101t:1220_7: dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhameva bhuñjati. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0101t:1222_0: 396. Saṇehi saṇavākehi nibbattavatthāni sāṇāni. Missasāṇāni masāṇāni, na bhaṅgāni.
tika-s0101t:1222_1: Erakatiṇādīnīti ādi-saddena akkamakacikadalīvākādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Erakādīhi katāni hi
tika-s0101t:1223_1: vā samā pakatibhūmi vuccati “patthaṇḍile pāturahosī”tiādīsu viya, tasmā thaṇḍilaseyyanti
tika-s0101t:1223_2: anantarahitāya pakatibhūmiyaṃ seyyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Laddhaṃ āsananti nisīdituṃ yathāladdhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1223_3: āsanaṃ. Akopetvāti aññattha anupagantvā, tenāha “tattheva nisīdanasīlo”ti. So hi
tika-s0101t:1223_4: taṃ achaḍḍento apariccajanto akopento nāma hoti. Vikaṭanti gūthaṃ vuccati āsayavasena
tika-s0101t:1224_0: Ettha ca “acelako hotī”tiādīni vatapadāni yāva “na thusodakaṃ pivatī”ti etāni ekavārāni.
tika-s0101t:1224_1: “Ekāgāriko vā”tiādīni nānāvārāni, nānākālikāni vā. Tathā “sākabhakkho vā”tiādīni,
tika-s0101t:1224_2: “sāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādīni ca. Tathā hettha vā-saddaggahaṇaṃ, pi-saddaggahaṇañca kataṃ.
tika-s0101t:1224_3: Pi-saddopi vikappattho eva daṭṭhabbo. Purimesu pana na kataṃ. Evañca katvā “acelako
tika-s0101t:1224_4: hotī”ti vatvā “sāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādi vacanassa, “rajojalladharo hotī”ti vatvā “udakorohanānuyogaṃ
tika-s0101t:1224_5: anuyutto”ti vacanassa ca avirodho siddho hoti. Atha vā kimettha avirodhacintāya.
tika-s0101t:1224_6: Ummattakapacchisadiso hi titthiyavādo. Atha vā “acelako hotī”ti ārabhitvā tappasaṅgena
tika-s0101t:1224_7: sabbampi attakilamathānuyogaṃ dassentena “sāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1226_0: 397. Sīlasampadādīhi vināti sīlasampadā, samādhisampadā, paññāsampadāti imāhi lokuttarāhi
tika-s0101t:1226_1: sampadāhi vinā na kadāci sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā sambhavati, yasmā ca tadevaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1226_2: tasmā tesaṃ tapopakkamānaṃ niratthakataṃ dassentoti yojanā. “Dosaveravirahita”nti
tika-s0101t:1226_3: idaṃ dosassa mettāya ujupaṭipakkhatāya vuttaṃ. Dosa-ggahaṇena vā sabbepi jhānapaṭipakkhā
tika-s0101t:1226_4: saṃkilesadhammā gahitā, vera-ggahaṇena paccatthikabhūtā sattā. Yadaggena hi dosarahitaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1227_0: 398. Pākaṭabhāvena kāyati gametīti pakati, lokasiddhavādo, tenāha “pakati kho esāti
tika-s0101t:1227_1: pakatikathā esā”ti. Mattāyāti mattā-saddo “mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya appatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:1227_2: antonītaṃ katvā pamāṇavācakoti āha “iminā pamāṇena evaṃ parittakenā”ti. Tena pana
tika-s0101t:1227_3: pamāṇena pahātabbo pakaraṇappatto paṭipattikkamoti āha “paṭipattikkamenā”ti. Sabbatthāti sabbavāresu.
tika-s0101t:1228_0: 399. Aññathā vadathāti yadi acelakabhāvādinā sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā abhavissa,
tika-s0101t:1228_1: suvijānova samaṇo suvijāno brāhmaṇo. Yasmā pana tumhe ito aññathāva sāmaññaṃ brahmaññañca
tika-s0101t:1228_2: vadatha, tasmā dujjānova samaṇo dujjāno brāhmaṇo, tenāha “idaṃ sandhāyāhā”ti. Taṃ
tika-s0101t:1228_3: pakativādaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti pubbe yaṃ pākatikaṃ sāmaññaṃ brahmaññañca hadaye ṭhapetvā
tika-s0101t:1228_4: tena “dukkara”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tameva sandhāya bhagavatāpi “pakati kho esā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1228_5: Idha pana taṃ pakativādaṃ pākatikasamaṇabrāhmaṇavisayaṃ kathaṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṭisaṃharitvā
tika-s0101t:1228_6: sabhāvatova paramatthatova samaṇassa brāhmaṇassa ca dujjānabhāvaṃ āvikaronto pakāsento.
tika-s0101t:1230_0: 400-1. Paṇḍitoti hetusampattisiddhena paṇḍiccena samannāgato, kathaṃ uggahesi paripakkañāṇattā
tika-s0101t:1230_1: ghaṭe padīpena viya abbhantare samujjalantena paññāveyyattiyena tattha tattha bhagavatā
tika-s0101t:1230_2: desitamatthaṃ pariggaṇhanto tampi desanaṃ upadhāresi. Tassa cāti yo acelako hoti
tika-s0101t:1230_3: yāva udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati, tassa ca. Tā sampattiyo pucchāmi, yāhi
tika-s0101t:1230_4: samaṇo ca hotīti adhippāyo. Sīlasampadāyāti iti-saddo ādiattho, tena “cittasampadāya
tika-s0101t:1230_6: tenāha “arahattaphalameva sandhāya vutta”ntiādi. Tattha idanti idaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1232_1: nadanto. Ativiya accantavisuddhatāya paramavisuddhaṃ. Paramanti ukkaṭṭhaṃ, tenāha
tika-s0101t:1232_2: “uttama”nti. Sīlameva lokiyasīlattā. Yathā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato lokuttarasīlaṃ
tika-s0101t:1232_3: savāsanaṃ paṭipakkhaviddhaṃsanato, evaṃ lokiyasīlampi tassa anucchavikabhāvena sambhūtattā,
tika-s0101t:1232_4: samena samanti samasamanti ayamettha atthoti āha “mama sīlasamena sīlena mayā sama”nti.
tika-s0101t:1232_5: “Yadidaṃ adhisīla”nti lokiyaṃ, lokuttarañcāti duvidhampi buddhasīlaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā
tika-s0101t:1232_6: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “sīlepī”ti. Iti imanti evaṃ imaṃ sīlavisayaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ pavattattā paṭhamaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1233_0: Tapatīti santappati, vidhamatīti attho. Jigucchatīti hīḷeti lāmakato ṭhapeti. Niddosattā
tika-s0101t:1233_1: ariyā ārakā kilesehīti. Maggaphalasampayuttā vīriyasaṅkhātā tapojigucchāti ānetvā
tika-s0101t:1233_2: sambandho. Paramā nāma sabbukkaṭṭhabhāvato. Yathā yuvino bhāvo yobbanaṃ, evaṃ jigucchino
tika-s0101t:1233_4: Nissaraṇavimutti nibbānaṃ. Atha vā sammāvācādīnaṃ adhisīlaggahaṇena, sammāvāyāmassa
tika-s0101t:1234_0: 403. Yaṃ kiñci janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ idha “suññāgāra”nti adhippetaṃ. Tattha nadantena
tika-s0101t:1234_1: vinā nādo natthīti āha “ekatova nisīditvā”ti. Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti khattiyaparisā,
tika-s0101t:1235_0: Vesārajjānīti visāradabhāvā ñāṇappahānasampadānimittaṃ kutoci asantassanabhāvā nibbhayabhāvāti
tika-s0101t:1235_1: attho. Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṃ ṭhānaṃ, uttamaṃ ṭhānanti attho. Āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā,
tika-s0101t:1236_0: Apica usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yathā hi nisabhasaṅkhāto
tika-s0101t:1236_1: usabho attano usabhabalena catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0101t:1236_2: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisāpathaviṃ
tika-s0101t:1236_3: uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena akampiyo acalena ṭhānena tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ
tika-s0101t:1236_4: tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti attani āropeti.
tika-s0101t:1237_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti yathā migarājā parissayānaṃ sahanato, vanamahiṃsamattavāraṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0101t:1237_1: hananato ca “sīho”ti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato, parappavādānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1237_2: hananato ca “sīho”ti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Tattha yathā
tika-s0101t:1237_3: sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
tika-s0101t:1237_4: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado
tika-s0101t:1237_5: vigatalomahaṃso “iti rūpa”ntiādinā nayena nānāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0101t:1238_0: Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvāti ñātuṃ icchitamatthaṃ attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ abhiracitvā
tika-s0101t:1238_1: taṅkhaṇaṃyevāti pucchitakkhaṇeyeva ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena vissajjeti. Cittaṃ paritosetiyeva
tika-s0101t:1238_2: ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vissajjanato. Sotabbañcassa maññanti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena
tika-s0101t:1238_3: khaṇena labbhamānattā. “Yaṃ no satthā bhāsati, taṃ no sossāmā”ti ādaragāravajātā
tika-s0101t:1238_4: mahantena ussāhena sotabbaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ maññanti. Suppasannā pasādābhibuddhiyā
tika-s0101t:1238_5: vigatupakkilesatāya kallacittā muducittā honti. Pasannakāranti pasannehi kātabbasakkāraṃ,
tika-s0101t:1238_6: dhammāmisapūjanti attho. Tattha āmisapūjaṃ dassento “paṇītānī”tiādimāha. Dhammapūjā
tika-s0101t:1238_7: pana “tathattāyā”ti iminā dassitā. Tathābhāvāyāti yathattāya yassa vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthāya
tika-s0101t:1238_8: dhammo desito, tathābhāvāya, tenāha “dhammānudhammapaṭipattipūraṇatthāyā”ti. Sā ca
tika-s0101t:1238_9: dhammānudhammapaṭipatti yāya anupubbiyā paṭipajjitabbā, paṭipajjantānañca sati ajjhattikaṅgasamavāye
tika-s0101t:1238_10: ekaṃsikā tassā pāripūrīti taṃ anupubbiṃ dassetuṃ “keci saraṇesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1239_0: Imasmiṃ panokāse ṭhatvāti “paṭipannā ca ārādhentī”ti etasmiṃ sīhanādakiccapāripūridīpane
tika-s0101t:1239_1: pāḷipadese ṭhatvā. Samodhānetabbāti saṅkalitabbā. Eko sīhanādo asādhāraṇo aññehi
tika-s0101t:1239_2: appaṭivattiyo seṭṭhanādo abhītanādoti katvā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Purimānaṃ dasannantiādito
tika-s0101t:1239_3: paṭṭhāya yāva “vimuttiyā mayhaṃ sadiso natthī”ti etesaṃ purimānaṃ dasannaṃ sīhanādānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1239_4: niddhāraṇe cettha sāmivacanaṃ, tenāha “ekekassā”ti. “Parisāsu ca nadatī”ti ādayo
tika-s0101t:1239_5: parivārā “ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmī”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto bhagavā
tika-s0101t:1239_6: parisāyaṃ nadati visārado nadati yāva “paṭipannā ārādhentī”ti atthayojanāya sambhavato.
tika-s0101t:1240_0: “Eva”ntiādi yathāvuttānaṃ tesaṃ saṅkaletvā dassanaṃ. Te dasāti te “parisāsu ca nadatī”ti
tika-s0101t:1240_1: ādayo sīhanādā. Purimānaṃ dasannanti yathāvuttānaṃ purimānaṃ dasannaṃ. Parivāravasenāti
tika-s0101t:1240_2: paccekaṃ parivāravasena yojiyamānā sataṃ sīhanādā. Purimā ca dasāti tathā ayojiyamānā
tika-s0101t:1240_3: purimā ca dasāti evaṃ dasādhikaṃ sīhanādasataṃ hoti. Evaṃ vādīnaṃ vādanti evaṃ pavattavādānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1240_4: titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ. Paṭisedhetvāti tathābhāvābhāvadassanena paṭikkhipitvā. Yaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0101t:1240_6: dassento saparisassa nigrodhassa paribbājakassa purato sīhanādaṃ nadi, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0101t:1242_0: 404. Idanti “rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharantaṃ maṃ…pe… pañhaṃ pucchī”ti idaṃ
tika-s0101t:1242_1: vacanaṃ. Kāmaṃ yadā nigrodho pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavā cassa vissajjesi, na tadā gijjhakūṭe
tika-s0101t:1242_2: pabbate viharati, rājagahasamīpe pana viharatīti katvā “rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate
tika-s0101t:1242_3: viharantaṃ ma”nti vuttaṃ, gijjhakūṭe viharaṇañcassa tadā avicchinnanti, tenāha “yaṃ
tika-s0101t:1242_4: taṃ bhagavā”tiādi. Yogeti naye, dukkhanissaraṇūpāyeti attho.
tika-s0101t:1243_0: 405. Yaṃ parivāsaṃ sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito parivasatīti yojanā. Yasmā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1243_1: ṭhitena parivasitabbaṃ, na gihibhūtena, tasmā aparivasitvāyeva pabbajjaṃ labhati.
tika-s0101t:1243_2: Ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadanti ettha pana pabbajjā-ggahaṇaṃ vacanasiliṭṭhatāvaseneva
tika-s0101t:1243_3: “dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyya”nti ettha dirattaggahaṇaṃ viya. Gāmappavesanādīnīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0101t:1243_5: dakkhānalasāditā, uddesaparipucchādīsu tibbachandatā, yassa titthāyatanato idhāgato,
tika-s0101t:1243_6: tassa avaṇṇe, ratanattayassa ca vaṇṇe anattamanatā, tadubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaṇṇe
tika-s0101t:1243_7: ca avaṇṇe ca attamanatāti imesaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo, tenāha “aṭṭha vattāni pūrentenā”ti.
tika-s0101t:1243_8: Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvāti ajjhāsayassa vīmaṃsanavasena suvaṇṇaṃ viya ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā.
tika-s0101t:1244_0: Gaṇamajjhe nisīditvāti upasampadākammassa gaṇappahonakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe saṅghatthero
tika-s0101t:1244_1: viya tassa anuggahatthaṃ nisīditvā. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vivitto. Tādisassa sīlavisodhane
tika-s0101t:1244_2: appamādo avuttasiddhoti āha “kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahanto”ti. Pesitacittoti nibbānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1244_3: pati pesitacitto taṃninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro. Jātikulaputtāpi ācārasampannā eva
tika-s0101t:1244_4: arahattādhigamāya pabbajjāpekkhā hontīti tepi tehi ekasaṅgahe karonto āha “kulaputtāti
tika-s0101t:1244_6: nayena hi saṃvegapubbikaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pabbajjaṃ sandhāya idha “sammadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1244_7: Hetunāti ñāyena. Pāpuṇitvāti patvā adhigantvā. Sampādetvāti asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññā
tika-s0101t:1245_1: iminā eva hi arahattanikūṭena desanā pariyosāpitā. Taṃ pana nigamento “aññataro kho
tika-s0101t:1245_2: panā…pe… ahosī”ti vuttaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakehi. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0101t:1251_0: 406. Sāvatthiyanti samīpatthe bhummanti āha “sāvatthiṃ upanissāyā”ti. Jetassa kumārassa
tika-s0101t:1251_1: vaneti jetena nāma rājakumārena ropite upavane. Nivāsaphāsutādinā pabbajitā āramanti
tika-s0101t:1251_2: etthāti ārāmo, vihāro. Phoṭo pādesu jātoti poṭṭhapādo. Vatthacchāyāchādanapabbajūpagatattā
tika-s0101t:1251_3: channaparibbājako. Brāhmaṇamahāsāloti mahāvibhavatāya mahāsāratāpatto brāhmaṇo. Samayanti
tika-s0101t:1251_4: sāmaññaniddeso, taṃ taṃ samayanti attho. Pavadantīti pakārato vadanti, attanā attanā
tika-s0101t:1251_5: uggahitaniyāmena yathā tathā samayaṃ vadantīti attho. “Pabhutayo”ti iminā todeyyajāṇusoṇīsoṇadaṇḍādike
tika-s0101t:1251_7: atthīti tindukācīro, ārāmo. Tathā ekā sālā etthāti ekasālako, tasmiṃ tindukācīre ekasālake.
tika-s0101t:1252_0: Anekākārānavasesañeyyatthavibhāvanato, aparāparuppattito ca bhagavato ñāṇaṃ tattha
tika-s0101t:1252_1: patthaṭaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattharitvā”ti, yato tassa ñāṇajālatā
tika-s0101t:1252_2: vuccati, veneyyānaṃ tadantogadhatā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:1252_3: samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, atha saraṇagamanādivasena
tika-s0101t:1252_4: kiccanipphatti vīmaṃsīyatīti āha “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatīti upaparikkhanto”ti. Nirodhanti
tika-s0101t:1252_5: saññānirodhaṃ. Nirodhā vuṭṭhānanti tato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ saññuppattiṃ. Sabbabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1252_6: ñāṇena saṃsanditvāti yathā te nirodhaṃ, nirodhato vuṭṭhānañca byākariṃsu, byākarissanti
tika-s0101t:1252_7: ca, tathā byākaraṇavasena saṃsanditvā. Hatthisāriputtoti hatthisārino putto. “Yugandharapabbataṃ
tika-s0101t:1252_8: parikkhipitvā”ti idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ “tādisaṃ atthi ce, taṃ viyā”ti. Meghavaṇṇanti
tika-s0101t:1252_10: ādito tathāladdhavohārena, anaññaparibhogatāya, tathā vā satthu adhiṭṭhānena so patto
tika-s0101t:1252_11: sabbakālaṃ “paccagghaṃ” tveva vuccati, silādivuttaratanalakkhaṇūpapattiyā vā so patto
tika-s0101t:1253_0: 407. Attano rucivasena saddhammaṭṭhitijjhāsayavasena, na parena ussāhitoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:1253_1: “Atippagabhāvameva disvā”ti idaṃ bhūtakathanaṃ na tāva bhikkhācāravelā sampattāti
tika-s0101t:1253_2: dassanatthaṃ. Bhagavā hi tadā kālasseva vihārato nikkhanto “vāsanābhāgiyāya dhammadesanāya
tika-s0101t:1253_3: poṭṭhapādaṃ anuggaṇhissāmī”ti. Yannūnāhanti aññattha saṃsayaparidīpano, idha pana
tika-s0101t:1253_4: saṃsayaparidīpano viya. Kasmāti āha “buddhāna”ntiādi. Saṃsayo nāma natthi bodhimūle
tika-s0101t:1253_6: eva. Buddhānaṃ labbhatīti “karissāma, na karissāmā”tiādiko esa cittacāro buddhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1253_7: labbhati sambhavati vicāraṇavasena pavattanato, na pana saṃsayavasena. Tenāhāti yena
tika-s0101t:1253_8: buddhānampi labbhati, tenevāha bhagavā “yannūnāha”nti. Parikappane vāyaṃ nipāto.
tika-s0101t:1253_9: “Upasaṅkameyya”nti kiriyāpadena vuccamāno eva hi attho “yannūnā”ti nipātapadena jotīyati.
tika-s0101t:1253_10: Ahaṃ yannūna upasaṅkameyyanti yojanā. Yadi panāti idampi tena samānatthanti āha “yadi panāhanti attho”ti.
tika-s0101t:1254_0: 408. Yathā unnatappāyo saddo unnādo, evaṃ vipulabhāvena uparūpari pavattopi unnādoti
tika-s0101t:1254_1: tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ “unnādiniyā”ti vatvā puna vibhāgena dassetuṃ “uccāsaddamahāsaddāyā”ti
tika-s0101t:1254_2: vuttanti tamatthaṃ vivaranto “uccaṃ nadamānāyā”tiādimāha. Assāti parisāya. Uddhaṃgamanavasenāti
tika-s0101t:1254_3: unnatabahulatāya uggantvā uggantvā pavattanavasena. Disāsu patthaṭavasenāti vipulabhāvena
tika-s0101t:1254_4: bhūtaparamparāya sabbadisāsu pattharaṇavasena. Idāni paribbājakaparisāya uccāsaddamahāsaddatāya
tika-s0101t:1254_5: kāraṇaṃ, tassa ca pavattiākāraṃ dassento “tesañhī”tiādimāha. Kāmassādo nāma kāmaguṇassādo.
tika-s0101t:1255_0: 409. Saṇṭhapesīti saṃyamanavasena sammadeva ṭhapesi, saṇṭhapanañcettha tiracchānakathāya
tika-s0101t:1255_1: aññamaññasmiṃ agāravassa jahāpanavasena ācārassa sikkhāpanaṃ, yathāvuttadosassa nigūhanañca
tika-s0101t:1256_0: 410. No āgate ānandoti bhagavati āgate no amhākaṃ ānando pīti hoti. Piyasamudācārāti
tika-s0101t:1256_1: piyālāpā. “Paccuggamanaṃ akāsī”ti vatvā na kevalamayameva, atha kho aññepi pabbajitā
tika-s0101t:1256_2: yebhuyyena bhagavato apacitiṃ karontevāti dassetuṃ “bhagavantañhī”tiādiṃ vatvā, tattha
tika-s0101t:1256_3: kāraṇamāha “uccākulīnatāyā”ti, tena sāsane appasannāpi kulagāravena bhagavati apacitiṃ
tika-s0101t:1256_4: karonte vāti dasseti. Etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathāti etasmiṃ yathāvuttaparicchedabbhantare
tika-s0101t:1256_5: kathā kā nāma. Vippakatā āraddhā hutvā apariyositā. “Kā kathā vippakatā”ti vadanto
tika-s0101t:1256_6: atthato tassā pariyosāpanaṃ paṭijānāti nāma. “Kā kathā”ti ca avisesacodanāti yassā
tika-s0101t:1256_7: tassā sabbassāpi kathāya pariyosāpanaṃ paṭiññātañca hoti, tañca paresaṃ asabbaññūnaṃ
tika-s0101t:1256_8: avisayanti āha “pariyantaṃ netvā demīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresī”ti.
tika-s0101t:1258_0: 411. Sukāraṇanti sundaraṃ atthāvahaṃ hitāvahaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Nānātitthesu nānāladdhīsu
tika-s0101t:1258_1: niyuttāti nānātitthikā, te eva nānātitthiyā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. Kutūhalamettha
tika-s0101t:1258_2: atthīti kotūhalā, sā eva sālāti kotūhalasālā, tenāha “kotūhaluppattiṭṭhānato”ti.
tika-s0101t:1258_3: Saññānirodheti saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā, tasmā saññāsahagatā sabbepi dhammā saṅgayhanti,
tika-s0101t:1258_4: tattha pana cittaṃ padhānanti āha “cittanirodhe”ti. Accantanirodhassa pana tehi anadhippetattā,
tika-s0101t:1258_5: avisayattā ca “khaṇikanirodhe”ti āha. Kāmaṃ sopi tesaṃ avisayova, atthato pana nirodhakathā
tika-s0101t:1258_6: vuccamānā tattheva tiṭṭhatīti tathā vuttaṃ. Kittighosoti “aho buddhānubhāvo bhavantarapaṭicchannaṃ
tika-s0101t:1258_7: kāraṇaṃ evaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dasseti, sāvake ca edise saṃvarasamādāne
tika-s0101t:1258_8: patiṭṭhāpetī”ti thutighoso yāva bhavaggā pattharati. Paṭibhāgakiriyanti paḷāsavasena
tika-s0101t:1258_9: paṭibhāgabhūtaṃ payogaṃ karonto. Bhavantarasamayanti tatra tatra vuṭṭhanasamayaṃ
tika-s0101t:1258_10: abhūtaparikappitaṃ kiñci uppādiyaṃ vatthuṃ attano samayaṃ katvā. Kiñcideva sikkhāpadanti
tika-s0101t:1258_11: “elamūgena bhavitabbaṃ, ettakaṃ, velaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nisīditabba”nti evamādikaṃ
tika-s0101t:1258_12: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ sikkhākoṭṭhāsaṃ katvā paññapenti. Nirodhakathanti nirodhasamāpattikathaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1259_0: Tesūti kotūhalasālāyaṃ sannipatitesu titthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu. Ekacceti eke. Purimoti
tika-s0101t:1259_1: “ahetū appaccayā”ti evaṃvādī. Yvāyaṃ idha uppajjatīti yojanā. Samāpattinti asaññabhāvāvahaṃ
tika-s0101t:1259_2: samāpattiṃ. Nirodheti saññānirodhe. Hetuṃ apassantoti yena hetunā asaññabhave saññāya
tika-s0101t:1259_3: nirodho sabbaso anuppādo, yena ca tato cutassa idha pañcavokārabhave tassā uppādo,
tika-s0101t:1260_0: Nanti paṭhamavādiṃ. Nisedhetvāti “na kho nāmetaṃ bho evaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0101t:1260_2: hi “visaññī hutvā”ti. Vikkhambhanavasena kilesānaṃ santāpanena attantapo. Ghoratapoti
tika-s0101t:1260_3: dukkaratāya bhīmatapo. Parimāritindriyoti nibbisevanabhāvāpādanena sabbaso milāpitacakkhādindriyo.
tika-s0101t:1260_4: Bhaggoti bhañjitakusalajjhāsayo. Evamāhāti “evaṃ saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādiākārena
tika-s0101t:1260_5: saññānirodhamāha. Iminā nayena ito paresu dvīsu ṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0101t:1261_1: Āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvāti āthabbaṇavede āgataaggijuhanapubbakaṃ mantajappanaṃ payojetvā
tika-s0101t:1261_2: sīsacchinnatādidassanena saññānirodhamāha. Tassāti yassa sīsacchinnatādi dassitaṃ, tassa.
tika-s0101t:1262_0: Yakkhadāsīnanti devadāsīnaṃ, yā “devatābhatiyotipi” vuccanti. Madaniddanti surāmadanimittakaṃ
tika-s0101t:1262_1: supanaṃ devatūpahāranti naccanagāyanādinā devatānaṃ pūjaṃ. Surāpātinti pātipuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:1263_0: Elamūgakathā viyāti imesaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ kathā andhabālakathāsadisī. Cattāro nirodheti
tika-s0101t:1263_1: aññamaññavidhure cattāro nirodhe ete paññapenti. Na ca aññamaññaviruddhanānāsabhāvena
tika-s0101t:1263_2: tena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kho ekasabhāvena, tenāha “iminā cā”tiādi. Aññenevāti imehi
tika-s0101t:1263_3: vuttākārato aññākāreneva bhavitabbaṃ. “Ayaṃ nirodho, ayaṃ nirodho”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ
tika-s0101t:1263_4: satthā attano desanāvilāsena anekākāravokāraṃ nirodhaṃ vibhāvessatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:1263_5: kataṃ aho nūnāti ettha ahoti acchariye, nūnāti anussaraṇe nipāto. Tasmā aho nūna
tika-s0101t:1263_6: bhagavā anaññasādhāraṇadesanattā nirodhampi aho acchariyaṃ katvā katheyya maññeti
tika-s0101t:1263_7: adhippāyo. “Aho nūna sugato”ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Acchariyavibhāvanato eva cettha
tika-s0101t:1263_8: dvikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ, acchariyatthopi cettha aho-saddo. So yasmā anussaraṇamukheneva
tika-s0101t:1263_9: tena gahito, tasmā vuttaṃ “aho nūnāti anussaraṇatthe”ti. Kālapuggalādivibhāgena bahubhedattā
tika-s0101t:1263_10: imesaṃ nirodhadhammānanti bahuvacanaṃ, kusala-saddayogena sāmivacanaṃ bhummatthe
tika-s0101t:1263_11: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ciṇṇavasitāyāti nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ vasībhāvassa ciṇṇattā. Sabhāvaṃ jānātīti
tika-s0101t:1265_0: 412. Gharamajjheyeva pakkhalitāti gharato bahi gantukāmā purisā maggaṃ anotaritvā
tika-s0101t:1265_1: gharājirena samatale vivaṭaṅgaṇe eva pakkhalanaṃ pattā, evaṃ sampadamidanti attho.
tika-s0101t:1265_2: Asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādi vibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi saññāya
tika-s0101t:1266_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha “sahetū sappaccayā saññā uppajjanti,
tika-s0101t:1266_1: uppannā pana nirujjhantiyeva, na tiṭṭhantī”ti dassanatthaṃ “nirujjhantī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1266_2: na nirodhassa sahetusappaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Uppādo hi sahetuko, na nirodho.
tika-s0101t:1266_3: Yadi hi nirodhopi sahetuko siyā, tassa nirodhenāpi bhavitabbaṃ aṅkurādīnaṃ viya,
tika-s0101t:1266_4: na ca tassa nirodho atthi. Tasmā vuttanayeneva pāḷiyā attho veditabbo. Ayañca nayo
tika-s0101t:1266_5: khaṇanirodhavasena vutto. Yo pana yathāparicchinnakālavasena sabbasova anuppādanirodho,
tika-s0101t:1266_6: so “sahetuko”ti veditabbo tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā “sikkhā
tika-s0101t:1266_7: ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti. tato eva ca idhāpi vuttaṃ “saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetu”nti.
tika-s0101t:1267_0: Sikkhā ekāti ettha sikkhāti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, eka-saddo aññapariyāyo “ittheke
tika-s0101t:1267_1: abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassā”tiādīsu viya, na saṅkhyāvācīti āha “sikkhā ekā
tika-s0101t:1267_2: saññā uppajjantīti sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantī”ti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0101t:1268_1: āgatāti sabhāvato upakārato ca paññākkhandhe pariyāpannattā saṅgahitattā tatiyā adhipaññāsikkhā
tika-s0101t:1268_2: sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena āgatā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yā cāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0101t:1268_3: yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti kāmañcettha vuttanayena
tika-s0101t:1268_4: tissopi sikkhā āgatā eva, tathāpi adhicittasikkhāya eva abhisaññānirodho dassito,
tika-s0101t:1269_1: vattamānuppannatāvasena asamuppanno yo koci kāmacāro yā kāci lobhuppatti. Purimo
tika-s0101t:1269_2: visayavasena niyamitattā kāmaguṇārammaṇova lobho daṭṭhabbo, itaro pana jhānanikantibhavarāgādippabhedo
tika-s0101t:1269_3: sabbopi lobhacāro kāmanaṭṭhena kāmesu pavattanato. Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena
tika-s0101t:1270_1: pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi asamuppanno eva maggena samugghāṭīyati, tasmiṃ pana samugghāṭitepi
tika-s0101t:1270_2: na sabbo rāgo samugghāṭaṃ gacchati, tasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaggahaṇena na itarassa
tika-s0101t:1270_3: sabbassa rāgassa gahaṇaṃ hotīti ubhayasādhāraṇena pariyāyena ubhayaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0101t:1270_4: pāḷiyaṃ kāmasaññāggahaṇaṃ katanti tadubhayaṃ sarūpato visesato ca dassetvā sabbasaṅgāhikabhāvato
tika-s0101t:1271_0: Sadisattāti kāmasaññādibhāvena samānattā, etena pāḷiyaṃ “purimā”ti sadisakappanāvasena
tika-s0101t:1271_1: vuttanti dasseti. Anāgatā hi idha “nirujjhatī”ti vuttā anuppādassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0101t:1272_0: Nīvaraṇavivekato jātattā vivekajehi paṭhamajjhānapītisukhehi saha akkhātabbā, taṃkoṭṭhāsikā
tika-s0101t:1272_1: vāti vivekajaṃ pītisukhasaṅkhātā. Nānattasaññāpaṭighasaññāhi nipuṇatāya sukhumabhūtatāya
tika-s0101t:1272_2: sukhumasaññā bhūtā sukhumabhāvena, paramatthabhāvena aviparītasabhāvā. Jhānaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1273_0: Samāpajjanādhiṭṭhānāni viya vuṭṭhānaṃ jhāne pariyāpannampi hoti yathā taṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1273_2: adhiṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhahanto ca sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ, na “āvajjanto paccavekkhanto”ti.
tika-s0101t:1273_3: Tanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ. Tenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, tasmā paṭhamajjhānena hetubhūtenāti
tika-s0101t:1273_4: attho. Hetubhāvo cettha jhānassa yathāvuttasaññāya uppattiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo
tika-s0101t:1273_5: kāmasaññāya nirodhassa upanissayatāva, tañca kho suttantapariyāyena. Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1273_6: “tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato”ti. Etenupāyenāti yvāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānatappaṭipakkhasaññāvasena
tika-s0101t:1273_7: “sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti ettha attho vutto, etena
tika-s0101t:1274_0: 414. Yasmā panettha samāpattivasena taṃtaṃsaññānaṃ uppādanirodhe vuccamāne aṅgavasena
tika-s0101t:1274_1: so vuttoti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. “Aṅgato sammasana”nti anupadadhammavipassanāya
tika-s0101t:1274_2: lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Anupadadhammavipassanañhi karonto samāpattiṃ patvā aṅgato sammasanaṃ
tika-s0101t:1274_3: karoti, na ca saññā samāpattiyā kiñci aṅgaṃ hoti. Vuttañca “idañca saññā saññāti
tika-s0101t:1274_4: evaṃ aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭa”nti. Aṅgatoti vā avayavatoti attho, anupadadhammatoti
tika-s0101t:1275_0: Yato khoti paccatte nissakkavacananti āha “yo nāmā”ti yathā “ādimhī”ti etasmiṃ atthe
tika-s0101t:1275_1: “ādito”ti vuccati itaravibhattitopi to-saddassa labbhanato. Sakasmiṃ attanā adhigate
tika-s0101t:1275_2: saññā sakasaññā, sā etassa atthīti sakasaññī, tenāha “attano paṭhamajjhānasaññāya
tika-s0101t:1275_3: saññavā”ti. Sakasaññīti cettha upari vuccamānanirodhapādakatāya sātisayāya jhānasaññāya
tika-s0101t:1275_4: atthibhāvajotako ī-kāro daṭṭhabbo, tenevāha “anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusatī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1275_5: Tasmā tattha tattha sakasaññitāggahaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne sabbaso suciṇṇavasībhāvo
tika-s0101t:1276_0: Lokiyānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, sāmiatthe eva vā. Yadaggena hi taṃ tesu seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1276_1: tadaggena tesampi seṭṭhanti. “Lokiyāna”nti visesanaṃ lokuttarasamāpattīhi tassa aseṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:1276_3: Akiccakārakatā cassā paṭusaññākiccābhāvavacanato viññāyati. Yatheva hi tattha saññā,
tika-s0101t:1276_4: evaṃ phassādayo pīti. Yadaggena hi tattha saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā pakativipassakānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1276_5: sammasituṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena ṭhitā, tadaggena heṭṭhimasamāpattidhammā viya paṭukiccakaraṇasamatthāpi
tika-s0101t:1276_6: na hontīti. Svāyamattho paramatthamañjusāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ āruppakathāyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1276_7: savisesaṃ vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayena veditabbo. Keci pana “yathā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā
tika-s0101t:1276_8: samāpattiyo uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādhenti, na evaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti
tika-s0101t:1276_9: kassacipi adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādheti, tasmā sā akiccakārikā, itarā kiccakārikā vuttā”ti
tika-s0101t:1277_0: Pakappetīti saṃvidahati. Jhānaṃ samāpajjanto hi jhānasukhaṃ attani saṃvidahati nāma.
tika-s0101t:1277_1: Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati, sampiṇḍetīti attho. Sampiṇḍanattho hi samudayaṭṭho. Yasmā
tika-s0101t:1277_2: nikantivasena cetanākiccassa matthakappatti, tasmā phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ dassento
tika-s0101t:1277_3: “nikantiṃ kurumāno abhisaṅkharoti nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Imā idāni me labbhamānā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā
tika-s0101t:1277_5: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāhi aññā. Tato thūlatarabhāvato oḷārikā. Kā pana tāti āha “bhavaṅgasaññā”ti.
tika-s0101t:1277_6: Ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya eva hi uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇāni bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t:1277_7: vuṭṭhānañca bhavaṅgavasena hoti. Yāva ca upari jhānasamāpajjanaṃ, tāva antarantarā
tika-s0101t:1278_0: Cetentovāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjanto eva. Na
tika-s0101t:1278_1: ceteti tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1278_2: pakappento idha “cetetī”ti vutto. Yasmā “ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi
tika-s0101t:1278_3: samāpajjāmī”ti evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva hoti, na anālayassa, tasmā
tika-s0101t:1278_4: ekaṃ cittakkhaṇikampi jhānaṃ pavattento tattha appahīnanikantikatāya abhisaṅkharonto
tika-s0101t:1278_5: evāti attho. Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi,
tika-s0101t:1278_6: tasmā “na abhisaṅkharotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Imassa bhikkhuno”tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1279_0: Pacchābhāgeti pitugharassa pacchābhāge. Tato puttagharato. Laddhagharamevāti yato
tika-s0101t:1279_1: anena bhikkhā laddhā, tameva gharaṃ puttagehameva. Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti
tika-s0101t:1279_3: Pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvāti pavisitvā samatikkantampi pitugharaṃ na manasi katvā.
tika-s0101t:1279_4: Puttagharasseva ācikkhanaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-s0101t:1279_5: na manasi katvā parato nirodhasamāpattiatthāya eva manasikāro. Evaṃ amanasikārasāmaññena,
tika-s0101t:1279_6: manasikārasāmaññena ca upamupameyyatā veditabbā ācikkhanenapi manasikārasseva jotitattā.
tika-s0101t:1279_7: Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0101t:1280_0: Tā jhānasaññāti tā ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā. Nirujjhantīti
tika-s0101t:1280_1: padeseneva nirujjhanti, pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena pana upari anuppādo. Yathā ca jhānasaññānaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1280_2: evaṃ itarasaññānaṃ pīti āha “aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā nuppajjantī”ti, yathāparicchinnakālanti
tika-s0101t:1280_3: adhippāyo. So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhūti so evaṃ yathāvutte saññāgge ṭhito arahatte,
tika-s0101t:1280_4: anāgāmiphale vā patiṭṭhito bhikkhu dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo, tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1280_5: paṭippassaddhi, soḷasavidhā ñāṇacariyā, navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0101t:1280_6: paṭipanno. Phusatīti ettha phusanaṃ nāma vindanaṃ paṭiladdhīti āha “vindati paṭilabhatī”ti.
tika-s0101t:1280_7: Atthato pana yathāparicchinnakālaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ sabbaso appavatti eva.
tika-s0101t:1281_0: Abhīti upasaggamattaṃ niratthakaṃ, tasmā “saññā” icceva attho. Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ
tika-s0101t:1281_1: katvā samāpattipade vattabbe tesaṃ dvinnaṃ antare sampajānapadaṃ ṭhapitanti āha “nirodhapadena
tika-s0101t:1281_2: anantarikaṃ katvā vutta”nti, tenāha “anupaṭi…pe… attho”ti. Tatrāpīti tasmimpi tathā
tika-s0101t:1281_3: padānupubbiṭhapanepi ayaṃ visesatthoti yojanā. Sampajānantassāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ
tika-s0101t:1281_4: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha tattha saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena pajānantassa. Anteti
tika-s0101t:1281_5: yathāvuttāya nirodhapaṭipattiyā pariyosāne. Dutiyavikappe sampajānantassāti sampajānakārinoti
tika-s0101t:1281_6: attho, tena nirodhasamāpajjanakassa bhikkhuno ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihārikapaññāya
tika-s0101t:1281_7: saddhiṃ atthasādhikā paññā kiccato dassitā hoti, tenāha “paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno”ti.
tika-s0101t:1282_0: Sabbākārenāti “samāpattiyā sarūpaviseso, samāpajjanako, samāpajjanassa ṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1282_1: samāpajjanākāro”ti evamādi sabbappakārena. Tatthāti visuddhimagge. kathitatovāti
tika-s0101t:1282_2: kathitaṭṭhānato eva gahetabbā, na idha taṃ vadāma punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:1283: Evaṃ kho ahanti ettha ākārattho evaṃ-saddo uggahitākāradassananti katvā. Evaṃ poṭṭhapādāti ettha pana sampaṭicchanattho, tenāha “suuggahitaṃ tayāti anujānanto”ti.
tika-s0101t:1284_0: 415. Saññā aggā etthāti saññāggaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Aṭṭhasu samāpattīsupi saññāggaṃ
tika-s0101t:1284_1: atthi upalabbhatīti cintetvā. “Puthū”ti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsaṃ dassento āha “bahūnipī”ti.
tika-s0101t:1284_2: “Yathā”ti iminā pakāraviseso karaṇappakāro gahito, na pakārasāmaññanti āha “yena
tika-s0101t:1284_3: yena kasiṇenā”ti, pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtenā”ti ca. Jhānaṃ tāva yutto karaṇabhāvo
tika-s0101t:1284_4: saññānirodhaphusanassa sādhakatamabhāvato, kathaṃ kasiṇānanti? Tesampi so yutto eva.
tika-s0101t:1284_5: Yadaggena hi jhānānaṃ nirodhaphusanassa sādhakataṃ abhāvo, tadaggena kasiṇānampi
tika-s0101t:1284_6: tadavinābhāvato. Anekakaraṇāpi kiriyā hotiyeva yathā “assena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0101t:1285_0: Ekavāranti sakiṃ. Purimasaññānirodhanti kāmasaññādipurimasaññāya nirodhaṃ, na nirodhasamāpattisaññitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1285_1: saññānirodhaṃ. Ekaṃ saññāgganti ekaṃ saññābhūtaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhanti attho heṭṭhimasaññāya
tika-s0101t:1285_2: ukkaṭṭhabhāvato. Saññā ca sā aggañcāti saññāggaṃ, na saññāsu agganti. Dve vāreti
tika-s0101t:1285_3: dvikkhattuṃ. Sesakasiṇesūti kasiṇānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ nirodhakathāya adhikatattā. Tato
tika-s0101t:1285_4: eva cettha jhānaggahaṇena kasiṇajjhānāni eva gahitānīti veditabbaṃ. “Paṭhamajjhānena
tika-s0101t:1285_5: karaṇabhūtenā”ti ārammaṇaṃ anāmasitvā vadati yathā “yena yena kasiṇenā”ti ettha jhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1285_6: anāmasitvā vuttaṃ. “Itī”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgahetvā nigamanavasena vadati.
tika-s0101t:1285_7: Sabbampīti sabbaṃ ekavāraṃ samāpannajhānaṃ. Saṅgahetvāti sañjānanalakkhaṇena taṃsabhāvāvisesato
tika-s0101t:1286_0: 416. Jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa puggalassa vasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni
tika-s0101t:1286_1: paṭhamanaye. Dutiyanaye pana yasmā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggena ghaṭentassa maggañāṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:1286_2: uppajjati, tasmā vipassanāmaggavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni. Yasmā pana paṭhamanayo
tika-s0101t:1286_3: lokiyattā oḷāriko, dutiyanayo missako tasmā tadubhayaṃ asambhāvetvā accantasukhumaṃ
tika-s0101t:1286_4: subhaṃ thiraṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva dassetuṃ maggaphalavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni
tika-s0101t:1287_0: “Ayaṃ panettha sāro”ti vibhāvetuṃ tipiṭakamahāsivattheravādo ābhato. Nirodhaṃ pucchitvā
tika-s0101t:1287_1: tasmiṃ kathite tadanantaraṃ saññāñāṇuppattiṃ pucchanto atthato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1287_2: pucchati nāma, nirodhato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyā vā siyā anāgāmiphaluppattiyā
tika-s0101t:1287_3: vā, tattha saññā padhānā, tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento
tika-s0101t:1287_4: thero “kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī”tiādimāha. Tattha “kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī”ti tadā
tika-s0101t:1287_5: dīghanikāyatantiṃ parivattante imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yathāvuttena paṭipāṭiyā tayo naye
tika-s0101t:1288_0: Yassa yathā maggavīthiyaṃ maggaphalañāṇesu uppannesu niyamato maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni
tika-s0101t:1288_1: honti, evaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ phalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti āha “pacchā paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti.
tika-s0101t:1288_4: hi paccavekkhaṇā. Samādhisīsena cettha sabbaṃ arahattaphalaṃ gahitaṃ sahacaraṇañāyena,
tika-s0101t:1288_5: tasmiṃ asati paccavekkhaṇāya asambhavo evāti āha “idappaccayā”ti.
tika-s0101t:1290_1: viya, sukhumabhāvena tanulepanavilittaṃ viya, tilakkhaṇabbhāhatatāya kuṇḍalādialaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1290_2: viya ca hoti, tadanupasevato ñāṇassa ca tathābhāvo taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa tathābhāvāpatti,
tika-s0101t:1290_4: āropitopī”ti. Tatthāti tassaṃ nirodhakathāyaṃ. Sukhaṃ avindanto mandabuddhitāya alabhanto.
tika-s0101t:1290_5: Malavidūsitatāya gūthaṭṭhānasadisaṃ. Attano laddhiṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ. Anumatiṃ gahetvāti
tika-s0101t:1290_6: anuññaṃ gahetvā “ediso me attā”ti anujānāpetvā, attano laddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhapetvāti
tika-s0101t:1290_7: attho. Kaṃ panāti oḷāriko, manomayo, arūpīti tiṇṇaṃ attavādānaṃ vasena tividhesu
tika-s0101t:1290_8: katamanti attho. Pariharantoti viddhaṃsanato pariharanto, nigūhantoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:1290_9: Yasmā catusantatirūpappabandhaṃ ekattavasena gahetvā rūpībhāvato “oḷāriko attā”ti
tika-s0101t:1290_10: pacceti attavādī, annapānopadhānatañcassa parikappetvā “sassato”ti maññati, rūpībhāvato
tika-s0101t:1290_11: eva ca saññāya aññattaṃ ñāyāgatameva, yaṃ vedavādino “annamayo, pānamayo”ti ca dvidhā
tika-s0101t:1290_12: voharanti, tasmā paribbājako taṃ sandhāyā “oḷārikaṃ kho”ti āha.
tika-s0101t:1291_0: Tattha yadi attā rūpī, na saññī, saññāya arūpabhāvattā, rūpadhammānañca asañjānanasabhāvattā,
tika-s0101t:1291_1: rūpī ca samāno yadi tava matena nicco, saññā aparāparaṃ pavattanato tattha tattha
tika-s0101t:1291_2: bhijjatīti bhedasabbhāvato aniccā, evampi “aññā saññā, añño attā”ti saññāya abhāvato
tika-s0101t:1291_3: acetanoti na kammassa kārako, phalassa ca na upabhuñjakoti āpannameva, tenāha “oḷāriko
tika-s0101t:1291_4: ca hi te”tiādi. Paccāgacchatoti paccāgacchantassa, jānatoti attho. “Aññā ca saññā
tika-s0101t:1291_5: uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu uppādapubbako nirodho,
tika-s0101t:1291_6: na ca uppannaṃ anirujjhakaṃ nāma atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “catunnañca khandhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t:1292_0: 418-420. Manomayanti jhānamanaso vasena manomayaṃ. Yo hi bāhirapaccayanirapekkho,
tika-s0101t:1292_1: so manasāva nibbattoti manomayo. Rūpaloke nibbattasarīraṃ sandhāya vadati, yaṃ vedavādino
tika-s0101t:1292_2: ānandamayo, viññāṇamayoti ca dvidhā voharanti. Tatrāpīti “manomayo attā”ti imasmimpi
tika-s0101t:1292_3: pakkhe. Dose dinneti “aññāva saññā bhavissatī”tiādinā dose dinne. Idhāpi purimavāde
tika-s0101t:1292_4: vuttanayeneva dosadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yadi attā manomayo, sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī,
tika-s0101t:1292_5: ahīnindriyo ca bhaveyya, evaṃ sati “rūpaṃ attā siyā, na ca saññī”ti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1292_6: Tenāha – “manomayo ca hi te”tiādi. Kasmā panāyaṃ paribbājako paṭhamaṃ oḷārikaṃ attānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1292_7: paṭijānitvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetvā puna manomayaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānāti, tañca vissajjetvā
tika-s0101t:1292_8: arūpiṃ attānaṃ paṭijānātīti? Kāmañcettha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva, tathāpi ime titthiyā
tika-s0101t:1292_9: nāma anavaṭṭhitacittā thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya cañcalāti dassetuṃ “yathā
tika-s0101t:1292_10: nāma ummattako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saññāyāti pakatisaññāya. Uppādanirodhaṃ icchati
tika-s0101t:1292_11: aparāparaṃ pavattāya saññāya udayavayadassanato. Tathāpi “saññā saññā”ti pavattasamaññaṃ
tika-s0101t:1292_12: “attā”ti gahetvā tassa ca avicchedaṃ parikappento sassataṃ maññati, tenāha “attānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_0: Tathevāti yathā “rūpī attā”ti, “manomayo attā”ti ca vādadvaye saññāya attato aññatā,
tika-s0101t:1293_1: tathā cassa acetanatādidosappasaṅgo dunnivāro, tatheva imasmiṃ vāde doso. Tenāha
tika-s0101t:1293_3: Abhibhūtattāti anādikālabhāvitabhāvena ajjhotthaṭattā nivāritañāṇacārattā. Taṃ nānattaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_4: ajānantoti yena santatighanena, samūhaghanena ca vañcito bālo pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_5: dhammasamūhaṃ micchāgāhavasena “attā”ti, “nicco”ti ca abhinivissa voharati, taṃ ekattasaññitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_6: ghanaggahaṇaṃ vinibhujja yāthāvato jānanaṃ ghanavinibbhogo, sabbena sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_7: so natthīti ayampi paribbājako tādisassa ñāṇassa paripākassa abhāvato vuccamānampi
tika-s0101t:1293_8: nāññāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavatā vuccamānampi taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto”ti. Saññā nāmāyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_9: nānārammaṇā nānākkhaṇe uppajjati, veti cāti saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ
tika-s0101t:1293_10: saññābhūtaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā yathāvuttaghanavinibbhogābhāvato niccameva katvā
tika-s0101t:1293_11: maññati diṭṭhimaññanāya. Tathābhūtassa ca tassa saṇhasukhumaparamagambhīradhammatā
tika-s0101t:1294_0: Diṭṭhiādīsu “evameta”nti dassanaṃ abhinivisanaṃ diṭṭhi. Tassā eva pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ
tika-s0101t:1294_1: “evameta”nti nijjhānavasena khamanaṃ khanti. Tathā rocanaṃ ruci. “Aññathā”tiādi tesaṃ
tika-s0101t:1294_2: diṭṭhiādīnaṃ vibhajitvā dassanaṃ. Tattha aññathāti yathā ariyavinaye antadvayaṃ anupaggamma
tika-s0101t:1294_3: majjhimā paṭipadāvasena dassanaṃ hoti, tato aññathāyeva. Aññadevāti yaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0101t:1294_4: vijjati khandhāyatanādi, tassa ca aniccatādi, tato aññadeva paramatthato avijjamānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1294_5: attānaṃ sassatādi te khamati ceva ruccati ca. Āyuñjanaṃ anuyuñjanaṃ āyogo, tenāha
tika-s0101t:1294_7: dhammataṃ tvaṃ “ayaṃ paramattho, ayaṃ sammutī”ti imassa vibhāgassa dubbibhāgattā.
tika-s0101t:1294_8: “Yadi etaṃ dujjānaṃ, taṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, imaṃ panatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchissāmī”ti
tika-s0101t:1294_9: cintetvā yathā paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ “atha paribbājako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Añño vā saññatoti
tika-s0101t:1294_10: saññāsabhāvato añño sabhāvo vā attā hotūti attho. Assāti attano.
tika-s0101t:1295_0: Lokīyati dissati ettha puññapāpaṃ, tabbipāko cāti loko, attā. So hissa kārako, vedako
tika-s0101t:1295_1: cāti icchito. Diṭṭhigatanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādi nayappavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0101t:1295_2: Na hesa diṭṭhābhiniveso diṭṭhadhammikādiatthanissito tadasaṃvattanato. Yo hi tadāvaho,
tika-s0101t:1295_3: so taṃnissitoti vattabbataṃ labheyya yathā taṃ puññañāṇasambhāro. Eteneva tassa na
tika-s0101t:1295_4: dhammanissitatāpi saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā. Ādibrahmacariyassāti ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0101t:1295_7: tassa vaṭṭasambandhanato ca. Tathā abhiññāsambodhanibbānāsaṃvattanañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1295_9: sambodhanatthāyāti vadanti. Abhijānanāyāti abhiññāpaññāvasena jānanāya, taṃ pana
tika-s0101t:1296_0: Kāmaṃ taṇhāpi dukkhasabhāvā, tassā pana samudayabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā “taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti
tika-s0101t:1296_1: vuttaṃ. Pabhāvanato uppādanato. Dukkhaṃ pabhāventīpi taṇhā avijjādipaccayantarasahitā
tika-s0101t:1296_2: eva pabhāveti, na kevalāti āha “sappaccayā”ti. Ubhinnaṃ appavattīti ubhinnaṃ appavattinimittaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1296_3: nappavattanti ettha dukkhasamudayā etasmiṃ vā adhigateti appavatti. Dukkhanirodhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1296_4: nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ paṭipadā cāti dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadā.
tika-s0101t:1296_5: Maggapātubhāvoti aggamaggasamuppādo. Phalasacchikiriyāti asekkhaphalādhigamo. Ākāranti taṃ gamanaliṅgaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1297_0: 421. Samantato niggaṇhanavasena todanaṃ vijjhanaṃ sannitodakaṃ, vācāyāti ca paccatte
tika-s0101t:1297_1: karaṇavacananti āha “vacanapatodenā”ti. Sajjhabbharitanti samantato bhusaṃ aritaṃ
tika-s0101t:1297_2: akaṃsūti satamattehi tuttakehi viya tiṃsasatamattā paribbājakā vācāpatodanehi tudiṃsu
tika-s0101t:1297_3: sabhāvato vijjamānanti paramatthasabhāvato upalabbhamānaṃ, napakatiādi viya anupalabbhamānaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1297_4: Tacchanti saccaṃ. Tathanti aviparītaṃ lokuttaradhammesūti visaye bhummaṃ te dhamme
tika-s0101t:1297_5: visayaṃ katvā. Ṭhitasabhāvanti avaṭṭhitasabhāvaṃ, taduppādakanti attho. Lokuttaradhammaniyāmatanti
tika-s0101t:1299_0: 422. Sukhumesu atthantaresūti khandhāyatanādīsu sukhumañāṇagocaresu dhammesu. Kusaloti
tika-s0101t:1299_1: pubbe buddhasāsane kataparicayatāya cheko ahosi. Gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā
tika-s0101t:1299_2: sīlavantassa bhikkhuno tathā kathanena vibbhamane niyojitattā idāni sayampi sīlavā
tika-s0101t:1299_3: eva hutvā cha vāre vibbhami. Kammasarikkhakena hi phalena bhavitabbaṃ. Mahāsāvakassa
tika-s0101t:1300_1: abhāvena. Cakkhumāti ettha yādisena cakkhunā puriso “cakkhumā”ti vutto, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0101t:1300_2: “subhāsitā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekakoṭṭhāsāti ekantikā, nibbānāvahabhāvena nicchitāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:1300_3: Ṭhapitāti vavatthāpitā. Na ekakoṭṭhāsā na ekantikā, na nibbānāvahabhāvena nicchitā
tika-s0101t:1302_1: vissajjitaṃ. Sati hi phalasiddhiyaṃ hetusiddhoyeva hotīti. Paññāpitaniṭṭhāyāti paveditavimuttimaggassa,
tika-s0101t:1302_2: vaṭṭadukkhapariyosānaṃ gacchati etāyāti “niṭṭhā”ti vimutti vuttā. Niṭṭhāmaggo hi
tika-s0101t:1302_3: idha uttarapadalopena “niṭṭhā”ti vutto. Tassa hi aniyyānikatā, niyyānikatā ca vuccati,
tika-s0101t:1302_4: na niṭṭhāya. Niyyānaṃ vā niggamanaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhassa vupasamoti attho.
tika-s0101t:1302_5: Niyyānameva niyyānikaṃ, na niyyānikaṃ aniyyānikaṃ, so eva bhāvo aniyyānikabhāvo,
tika-s0101t:1302_7: gahetvā vadati, na pana paramatthato tesaṃ samaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanato,
tika-s0101t:1302_8: tena vuttaṃ “sā ca na niyyānikā”tiādi. Lokathūpikādivasenāti ettha ādi-saddena “añño
tika-s0101t:1302_9: puriso, aññā pakatī”ti pakatipurisantarāvabodho mokkho, buddhiādiguṇavinimuttassa
tika-s0101t:1302_10: attano sakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ mokkho, kāyapavattigatijātibandhānaṃ appamajjanavasena
tika-s0101t:1302_11: appavatto mokkho, yaññehi jutena parena purisena salokatā mokkho, samīpatā mokkho,
tika-s0101t:1302_12: sahayogo mokkhoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Yathāpaññattāti paññattappakārā hutvā
tika-s0101t:1302_13: na niyyāti, yenākārena “niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyatī”ti tehi paveditā, tenākārena tassā appattabbato
tika-s0101t:1302_14: na niyyāti. Paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittāti “nāyaṃ niṭṭhā paṭipadā vaṭṭassa anatikkamanato”ti
tika-s0101t:1302_15: buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā. Nivattatīti paṭikkhepassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0101t:1302_16: tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā na niyyāti, aññadatthu taṃsamaṅginaṃ puggalaṃ saṃsāre
tika-s0101t:1303_0: Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato jānanaṃ tassa pamāṇajeṭṭhabhāvato, itarassa saṃsayānubaddhattāti
tika-s0101t:1303_1: vuttaṃ “jānaṃ passa”nti. Tenettha dassanena jānanaṃ viseseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
tika-s0101t:1303_2: tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ atthīti. Jānanti vā tassa lokassa
tika-s0101t:1303_3: anumānavisayataṃ pucchati, passanti paccakkhato gocarataṃ. Ayañhettha attho – api
tika-s0101t:1303_4: tumhākaṃ loko paccakkhato ñāto, udāhu anumānatoti.
tika-s0101t:1304_0: Yasmā loke paccakkhabhūto attho indriyagocarabhāvena pākaṭo, tasmā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhapubbānī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1304_1: Diṭṭhapubbānīti diṭṭhavā, dassanabhūtena, tadanugatena ca ñāṇena gahitapubbānīti
tika-s0101t:1304_2: attho. Evañca katvā “sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnī”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Appāṭihīraka
tika-s0101t:1304_3: ta”nti anunāsikalopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “appāṭihīrakaṃ ta”nti “appāṭihīraṃ kata”nti
tika-s0101t:1304_4: evamettha vaṇṇenti. Paṭipakkhaharaṇato paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ, uttaravirahitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1304_5: vacanaṃ. Pāṭihāriyamevettha “pāṭihīraka”nti vā vuttaṃ. Na pāṭihīrakaṃ appāṭihīrakaṃ
tika-s0101t:1304_7: vacanaṃ tena uttarena paṭihārīyati ativiparivattīyati. Tato eva niyyānassa paṭiharaṇamaggassa
tika-s0101t:1305: 426. Vilāso līḷā. Ākappo kesabandhavatthaggahaṇaṃ ādiākāraviseso, vesasaṃvidhānaṃ vā. Ādi-saddena bhāvādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Bhāvo”ti ca cāturiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1307_0: 428. Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, attabhāvoti āha “attapaṭilābhoti attabhāvapaṭilābho”ti.
tika-s0101t:1307_1: Kāmabhavaṃ dasseti tassa itaradvayattabhāvato oḷārikattā. Rūpabhavaṃ dasseti jhānamanena
tika-s0101t:1307_2: nibbattaṃ hutvā rūpībhāvena upalabbhanato. Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā
tika-s0101t:1307_3: tadabhāve kassaci saṃkilesassāpi asambhavato. Vodāniyā dhammā nāma samathavipassanā
tika-s0101t:1308_0: 429. Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ asamucchede pana na kadācipi anavajjadhammānaṃ pāripūrī,
tika-s0101t:1308_1: vepullaṃ vā sambhavati, samucchede pana sati eva sambhavatīti maggapaññāphalapaññā-ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1308_2: Tā hi sakiṃ paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇā eva aparihānadhammattā. Taruṇapītīti uppannamattā
tika-s0101t:1308_3: aladdhāsevanā dubbalā pīti. Balavatuṭṭhīti punappunaṃ uppattiyā laddhāsevanā uparivisesādhigamassa
tika-s0101t:1308_4: paccayabhūtā thiratarā pīti. “Yaṃ avocumhā”tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yaṃ vohāraṃ
tika-s0101t:1308_6: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aparappaccayena ñāṇena paccakkhato sampādetvā viharissatī”ti
tika-s0101t:1308_7: kathayimha. Tattha tasmiṃ vihāre tassa mama ovādakarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ vuttappakārena
tika-s0101t:1308_8: viharaṇanimittaṃ pamodappabhāvitā pīti ca bhavissati, tassā ca paccayabhūtaṃ passaddhidvayaṃ
tika-s0101t:1308_9: sammadeva upaṭṭhitā sati ca ukkaṃsagataṃ ñāṇañca tathābhūto ca so vihāro. Santapaṇītatāya
tika-s0101t:1309_0: Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā, suvibhāvite
tika-s0101t:1309_1: pana tasmiṃ paguṇe sā paṇītā balavabhāvato paripuṇṇakiccā pītīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamajjhāne
tika-s0101t:1309_2: pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhantī”ti. “Sukho vihāro”ti iminā samādhi gahito. Sukhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1309_3: gahitanti apare, tesaṃ matena santasukhatāya upekkhā catutthajjhāne “sukha”nti icchitā,
tika-s0101t:1309_4: tenāha “tathā catutthe”tiādi. Pāmojjaṃ nivattatīti dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ pāmojjaṃ
tika-s0101t:1309_5: chasu dhammesu nivattati hāyati. Vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena dutiyajjhāne sabbadā
tika-s0101t:1309_6: pīti balavatī eva hoti, na paṭhamajjhāne viya kadāci dubbalā. Suddhavipassanā pādakajjhānamevāti
tika-s0101t:1309_7: upari maggaṃ akathetvā kevalaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Catūhi maggehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0101t:1309_8: vipassanā kathitāti vipassanāya pādakabhāvena jhānāni kathetvā tato paraṃ vipassanāpubbakā
tika-s0101t:1309_9: cattāropi maggā kathitāti attho. Catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitāti paṭhamajjhānikādikā
tika-s0101t:1309_10: phalasamāpattiyo akathetvā catutthajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti kathitā. Pītivevacanameva
tika-s0101t:1309_11: katvāti dvinnaṃ pītīnaṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anuppajjanato pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva
tika-s0101t:1309_12: katvā. Pītisukhānaṃ apariccattattā, “sukho ca vihāro”ti sātisayassa sukhavihārassa
tika-s0101t:1309_13: gahitattā ca dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpatti nāma kathitā. Kāmaṃ paṭhamajjhānepi pītisukhāni
tika-s0101t:1309_14: labbhanti, tāni pana vitakkavicārakkhobhena na santapaṇītāni, santapaṇītāni ca idhādhippetāni.
tika-s0101t:1310_0: 432-437. Vibhāvanatthoti pakāsanattho sarūpato nirūpanattho, tenāha “ayaṃ so”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1310_1: Nanti oḷārikaṃ attapaṭilābhaṃ. Sappaṭiharaṇanti parena coditavacanena saparihāraṃ
tika-s0101t:1310_2: sauttaraṃ. Tucchoti musā abhūto. Svevāti so eva attapaṭilābho. Tasmiṃ samaye hotīti
tika-s0101t:1310_3: tasmiṃ paccuppannasamaye vijjamāno hoti. Attapaṭilābhotveva niyyātesi, na naṃ sarūpato
tika-s0101t:1310_4: nīharitvā dassesi. Rūpādayo cettha dhammāti rūpavedanādayo eva ettha loke sabhāvadhammā.
tika-s0101t:1310_5: Attapaṭilābhoti pana te rūpādike pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññatti, tenāha “nāmamattameta”nti.
tika-s0101t:1311_0: 438. Evañca pana vatvāti “attapaṭilābhoti rūpādike upādāya paññattimatta”nti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:1311_1: “yasmiṃ citta samaye”tiādinā vatvā. Paṭipucchitvā vinayanatthanti yathā pare puccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t:1311_2: tenākārena kālavibhāgato paṭipadāni pucchitvā tassa atthassa ñāpanavasena vinayanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1311_3: Tasmiṃ samaye sacco ahosīti tasmiṃ atītasamaye upādānassa vijjamānatāya saccabhūto
tika-s0101t:1311_4: vijjamāno viya vattabbo ahosi, na pana anāgato idāni paccuppanno vā attapaṭilābho
tika-s0101t:1311_5: tadupādānassa tadā avijjamānattā. Ye te atītā dhammā atītasamaye atītattapaṭilābhassa
tika-s0101t:1311_6: upādānabhūtā rūpādayo. Te etarahi natthi niruddhattā. Tato eva ahesunti saṅkhyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1311_7: gatā. Tasmāti tasmiṃyeva samaye labbhanato. Sopi tadupādāno me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva
tika-s0101t:1311_8: atītasamaye sacco bhūto vijjamāno viya ahosi. Anāgatapaccuppannānanti anāgatānañceva
tika-s0101t:1311_9: paccuppannānañca rūpadhammānaṃ upādānabhūtānaṃ tadā tasmiṃ atītasamaye abhāvā tadupādāno
tika-s0101t:1311_10: anāgato paccuppanno ca attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ atītasamaye mogho tuccho musā natthīti
tika-s0101t:1311_11: attho. Nāmamattamevāti samaññāmattameva. Attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānāti paramatthato anupalabbhamānattā.
tika-s0101t:1312_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā ye te anāgatā dhammā, te etarahi natthi, “bhavissantī”ti pana
tika-s0101t:1312_1: saṅkhyaṃ gamissanti, tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco bhavissati.
tika-s0101t:1312_2: Atītapaccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho paccuppanno.
tika-s0101t:1312_3: Ye ime paccuppannā dhammā, te etarahi atthi, tasmā yoyaṃ me attapaṭilābho, so idāni
tika-s0101t:1312_4: sacco. Atītānāgatānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ idāni abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho
tika-s0101t:1312_5: anāgatoti evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānātīti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0101t:1313_0: 439-443. Saṃsanditunti samānetuṃ. Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hotīti yasmiṃ kāle bhūtupādāyasaññitaṃ
tika-s0101t:1313_1: upādānavisesaṃ upādāya khīrapaññatti hoti. Na tasmiṃ…pe… gacchati khīrapaññattiupādānassa
tika-s0101t:1313_2: dadhiādipaññattiyā anupādānato. Paṭiniyatavatthukā hi ekā lokasamaññā, tenāha “ye
tika-s0101t:1313_3: dhamme upādāyā”tiādi. Tattha saṅkhāyati etāyāti saṅkhā, paññatti. Niddhāretvā vacanti
tika-s0101t:1313_4: vadanti etāyāti nirutti. Namanti etenāti nāmaṃ. Voharanti etenāti vohāro, paññattiyeva.
tika-s0101t:1313_5: Esa nayo sabbatthāti “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā khīre vuttanayaṃ dadhiādīsu atidisati.
tika-s0101t:1314_0: Samanujānanamattakānīti “idaṃ khīraṃ, idaṃ dadhī”tiādinā tādise bhūtupādāyarūpavisese
tika-s0101t:1314_1: loke paramparābhataṃ paññattiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā samanujānanaṃ viya paccayavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1314_3: ca “arūpo attapaṭilābho”ti ca tathā tathā samanujānanamattakāni, na ca tabbinimutto
tika-s0101t:1314_4: upādānato añño koci attho atthīti attho. Niruttimattakānīti saddaniruttiyā gahaṇūpāyamattakāni.
tika-s0101t:1314_6: Vacanapathamattakānīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vohāramattakānīti tathā tathā vohāramattakāni.
tika-s0101t:1314_8: “attapaṭilābho”ti vā “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā sabbametaṃ vohāramattakaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0101t:1314_9: anupalabbhanato, tenāha “yasmā paramatthato satto nāma natthī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1315_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā taṃ buddhehipi vuccatīti āha “buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā”tiādi. Sammutiyā
tika-s0101t:1315_1: vohārassa kathanaṃ sammutikathā. Paramatthassa sabhāvadhammassa kathanaṃ paramatthakathā.
tika-s0101t:1315_3: Paramatthadhammo hi “anicco, dukkho, anattā”ti ca vuccati, na sammutidhammo. Kasmā
tika-s0101t:1315_4: panevaṃ duvidhā buddhānaṃ kathāpavattīti tattha kāraṇamāha “tattha yo”tiādinā. Yasmā
tika-s0101t:1315_5: paramatthakathāya saccasampaṭivedho, ariyasaccakathā ca sikhāppattā desanā, tasmā
tika-s0101t:1315_6: vineyyapuggalavasena sammutikathaṃ kathentopi bhagavā paramatthakathaṃyeva kathetīti
tika-s0101t:1315_7: āha “tassa bhagavā āditova…pe… kathetī”ti, tenāha “tathā”tiādi, tenassa katthaci
tika-s0101t:1315_8: sammutikathāpubbikā paramatthakathā hoti puggalajjhāsayavasena, katthaci paramatthakathāpubbikā
tika-s0101t:1315_9: sammutikathā. Iti vineyyadamanakusalassa satthu vineyyajjhāsayavasena tathā tathā
tika-s0101t:1315_10: desanāpavattīti dasseti. Sabbattha pana bhagavā dhammataṃ avijahanto eva sammutiṃ
tika-s0101t:1315_11: anuvattati, sammutiṃ apariccajantoyeva dhammataṃ vibhāveti, na tattha abhinivesātidhāvanāni.
tika-s0101t:1316_0: Paṭhamaṃ sammutiṃ katvā kathanaṃ pana veneyyavasena yebhuyyena buddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti
tika-s0101t:1316_1: taṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassento “pakatiyā panā”tiādimāha. Nanu ca sammuti nāma paramatthato
tika-s0101t:1316_2: avijjamānattā abhūtā, taṃ kathaṃ buddhā kathentīti āha “sammutikathaṃ kathentāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1316_3: Saccamevāti tathameva. Sabhāvamevāti sammutibhāvena taṃsabhāvameva, tenāha “amusāvā”ti.
tika-s0101t:1317_0: Imesaṃ pana sammutiparamatthānaṃ ko viseso? Yasmiṃ bhinne, buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge
tika-s0101t:1317_1: kate na taṃsaññā, so ghaṭapaṭādippabhedo sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na
tika-s0101t:1317_2: hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati. Evaṃ santepi vuttanayena sammutipi
tika-s0101t:1318_0: Idāni nesaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ kāraṇena dassento “saṅketavacanaṃ saccanti gāthamāha. Tattha
tika-s0101t:1318_2: Lokasiddhā hi sammuti saṅketavacanassa avisaṃvādanatāya kāraṇaṃ. Paramo uttamo attho
tika-s0101t:1318_3: paramattho, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo. Tassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ yāthāvato avisaṃvādanavasena
tika-s0101t:1318_4: ca pavattanato. Tattha kāraṇamāha “dhammānaṃ bhūtalakkhaṇa”nti, sabhāvadhammānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1318_5: yo bhūto aviparīto sabhāvo, tassa lakkhaṇaṃ aṅganaṃ ñāpananti katvā.
tika-s0101t:1319_0: Yadi tathāgato paramatthasaccaṃ sammadeva abhisambujjhitvā ṭhitopi lokasamaññaṃ gahetvāva
tika-s0101t:1319_1: vadati, ko ettha lokiyamahājanehi visesoti āha. “Yāhi tathāgato voharati aparāmāsa”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t:1319_2: Lokiyamahājano appahīnaparāmāsattā “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā parāmasanto voharati, tathāgato
tika-s0101t:1319_3: pana sabbaso pahīnaparāmāsattā aparāmasanto yasmā lokasamaññāhi vinā lokiyo attho
tika-s0101t:1319_4: loke kenaci duviññeyyo, tasmā tāhi taṃ voharati. Tathā voharanto eva ca attano desanāvilāsena
tika-s0101t:1319_5: veneyyasatte paramatthasacce patiṭṭhapeti. Desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvāti heṭṭhā pavattitakathāya
tika-s0101t:1319_7: niṭṭhāpesi. Yaṃ yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0101t:1325_1: dassitā, kālaparicchedo na dassitoti taṃ paricchedato dassetuṃ “parinibbānato uddhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1325_2: māsamatte kāle”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha matta-ggahaṇena kālassa asampuṇṇataṃ joteti. Tudisaññito
tika-s0101t:1325_3: gāmo nivāso etassāti todeyyo. Taṃ panesa yasmā soṇadaṇḍo viya campaṃ, kūṭadanto viya
tika-s0101t:1325_4: ca khāṇumataṃ ajjhāvasati, tasmā vuttaṃ “tassa adhipatittā”ti issarabhāvatoti attho.
tika-s0101t:1325_5: Samāhāranti sannicayaṃ. Paṇḍito gharamāvaseti yasmā appatarappatarepi vayamāne bhogā
tika-s0101t:1325_6: khiyanti, appatarappatarepi sañciyamāne vaḍḍhanti, tasmā viññujātiko kiñci vayaṃ
tika-s0101t:1325_7: akatvā āyameva uppādento gharāvāsaṃ anutiṭṭheyyāti lobhādesitaṃ paṭipattiṃ upadisati.
tika-s0101t:1326_0: Adānameva sikkhāpetvā lobhābhibhūtatāya tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatti.
tika-s0101t:1326_1: Lobhavasikassa hi duggati pāṭikaṅkhā. Ativiya piyāyati pubbaparicayena. Piṇḍāya pāvisi
tika-s0101t:1326_2: subhaṃ māṇavaṃ anuggaṇhitukāmo. Niraye nibbattissasi katokāsassa kammassa paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato.
tika-s0101t:1327_0: Brāhmaṇacārittassa bhāvitataṃ sandhāya, tathā pitaraṃ ukkaṃsento ca “brahmaloke nibbatto”ti
tika-s0101t:1327_1: āha. Taṃ pavattiṃ pucchīti sutametaṃ mayā “mayhaṃ pitā sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti
tika-s0101t:1327_2: tumhehi vuttaṃ, kimidaṃ saccanti pucchi. Tatheva vatvāti yathā pubbe sunakhassa vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1327_3: tatheva vatvā. Avisaṃvādanatthanti saccāpanatthaṃ “todeyyabrāhmaṇo sunakho hutvā
tika-s0101t:1327_4: nibbatto”ti attano vacanassa avisaṃvādanatthaṃ avisaṃvādabhāvassa dassanatthanti
tika-s0101t:1327_5: attho. Sabbaṃ dassesīti buddhānubhāvena so sunakho taṃ sabbaṃ netvā dassesi, na jātissaratāya.
tika-s0101t:1327_6: Bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkaraṇaṃ pana purimajātisiddhavāsanāvasena. Cuddasa pañhe pucchitvāti
tika-s0101t:1327_7: “dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā, dissanti dīghāyukā. Dissanti bavhābādhā,
tika-s0101t:1327_8: dissanti appābādhā. Dissanti dubbaṇṇā, dissanti vaṇṇavanto. Dissanti appesakkhā,
tika-s0101t:1327_9: dissanti mahesakkhā. Dissanti appabhogā, dissanti mahābhogā. Dissanti nīcakulīnā,
tika-s0101t:1327_10: dissanti uccākulīnā. Dissanti duppaññā, dissanti paññāvanto”ti. Ime cuddasa pañhe
tika-s0101t:1328_0: 445. “Ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthī”ti iminā upari pucchiyamānassa pañhassa pageva tena
tika-s0101t:1328_1: abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Visabhāgavedanāti dukkhavedanā. Sā hi kusalakammanibbatte
tika-s0101t:1328_3: hutvā bādhati pīḷetīti “ābādho”ti ca vuccati. Ekadese uppajjitvāti sarīrassa ekadese
tika-s0101t:1328_4: uṭṭhitāpi ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhāti aparivattabhāvakaraṇato, etena balavarogo
tika-s0101t:1328_5: ābādho nāmāti dasseti. Kicchajīvitakaroti asukhajīvitāvaho, etena dubbalo appamattako
tika-s0101t:1328_6: rogo ātaṅkoti dasseti. Uṭṭhānanti sayananisajjādito uṭṭhahanaṃ, tena yathā tathā
tika-s0101t:1328_7: aparāparaṃ sarīrassa parivattanaṃ vadati. Garukanti bhāriyaṃ kicchasiddhikaṃ. Kāye
tika-s0101t:1328_8: balaṃ na hotīti etthāpi “gilānassevā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Heṭṭhā catūhi
tika-s0101t:1328_9: padehi aphāsuvihārābhāvaṃ pucchitvā idāni phāsuvihārasabbhāvaṃ pucchati, tena saviseso
tika-s0101t:1328_10: phāsuvihāro pucchitoti daṭṭhabbo, asatipi atisayatthajotane sadde atisayatthassa
tika-s0101t:1329_0: 447. Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti. Ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapattakālo.
tika-s0101t:1329_1: Samayo nāma tasseva paccayasāmaggī, atthato tajjaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo
tika-s0101t:1329_2: ca. Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti dassetuṃ “kālañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1330_0: 448. Cetiyaraṭṭheti cetiraṭṭhe. Ya-kārena hi padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Cetiraṭṭhato
tika-s0101t:1330_1: aññaṃ visuṃyevekaṃ raṭṭhanti ca vadanti. Maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttanti maraṇaṃ nāma tādisānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1330_2: roga vaseneva hotīti yena rogena taṃ jātaṃ, tassa sarūpapucchā, kāraṇapucchā, maraṇahetukacittasantāpapucchā,
tika-s0101t:1330_3: tassa ca santāpassa sabbalokasādhāraṇatā, tathā maraṇassa ca appatikāratāti evaṃ
tika-s0101t:1330_4: ādinā maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti dassetuṃ “bho ānandā”tiādi
tika-s0101t:1330_5: vuttaṃ. Na randhagavesī māro viya, na vīmaṃsanādhippāyo uttaramāṇavo viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t:1330_6: Yesu dhammesūti vimokkhupāyesu niyyānadhammesu. Dharantīti tiṭṭhanti, pavattantīti attho.
tika-s0101t:1331_0: 449. Atthappayuttatāya saddapayogassa saddappabandhalakkhaṇāni tīṇi piṭakāni tadatthabhūtehi
tika-s0101t:1331_1: sīlādīhi dhammakkhandhehi saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā”ti.
tika-s0101t:1331_2: Saṅkhittena kathitanti “tiṇṇaṃ khandhāna”nti evaṃ gahaṇato sāmaññato cāti saṅkhepeneva
tika-s0101t:1331_3: kathitaṃ. “Katamesaṃ tiṇṇa”nti ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, na kathetukamyatā pucchāti
tika-s0101t:1331_4: vuttaṃ “vitthārato pucchissāmī ‘ti cintetvā ‘katamesaṃ tiṇṇa’nti āhā”ti. Kathetukamyatābhāve
tika-s0101t:1333_0: 450-453. Sīlakkhandhassāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena “ariyassa
tika-s0101t:1333_1: samādhikkhandhassa…pe… patiṭṭhāpesī”ti ayaṃ ettako pāṭho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ tenāha
tika-s0101t:1333_2: “tesu dassitesū”ti, uddesavasenāti adhippāyo. Bhagavatā vuttanayenevāti sāmaññaphaladesanādīsu
tika-s0101t:1333_3: bhagavatā desitanayeneva, tenassa suttassa satthubhāsitabhāvaṃ jinavacanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t:1333_4: Sāsane na sīlameva sāroti ariyamaggasāre bhagavato sāsane yathā dassitaṃ sīlaṃ sāro
tika-s0101t:1333_5: eva na hoti sāravato mahato rukkhassa papaṭikaṭṭhāniyattā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha gahitanti
tika-s0101t:1333_7: adhiṭṭhānamattaṃ tattha appatiṭṭhitassa tesaṃ asambhavato. Atha vā na sīlameva sāroti
tika-s0101t:1333_8: kāmañcettha sāsane “maggasīlaṃ, phalasīla”nti idaṃ lokuttarasīlampi sārameva, tathāpi
tika-s0101t:1333_9: na sīlakkhandho eva sāro atha kho samādhikkhandhopi paññākkhandhopi sāro evāti evamettha
tika-s0101t:1333_10: attho daṭṭhabbo. Purimo eva sāro, tenāha “ito uttarī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t:1335_0: 454. Kasmā panettha thero samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭho indriyasaṃvarādike vissajjesi,
tika-s0101t:1335_1: nanu evaṃ sante aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ byākaronto ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākaronto viya
tika-s0101t:1335_2: hotīti īdisī codanā idha anokāsāti dassento “kathañca māṇava bhikkhu…pe… samādhikkhandhaṃ
tika-s0101t:1335_3: dassetukāmo ārabhī”ti āha, tenettha indriyasaṃvarādayopi samādhiupakārataṃ upādāya
tika-s0101t:1335_4: samādhikkhandhapakkhikāni uddiṭṭhānīti dasseti rūpajjhānāneva āgatāni, na arūpajjhānāni
tika-s0101t:1335_6: hi saparibhaṇḍā chapi abhiññāyo. Lokiyā abhiññā pana sijjhamānā yasmā aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
tika-s0101t:1335_7: cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena vinā na ijjhanti, tasmā abhiññāsu desiyamānāsu arūpajjhānānipi
tika-s0101t:1335_8: desitāneva honti nānantariyabhāvato, tenāha “ānetvā pana dīpetabbānī”ti. Vuttanayena
tika-s0101t:1335_9: desitāneva katvā saṃvaṇṇakehi pakāsetabbānīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1335_10: upasampajja viharatī”ti imināva arūpajjhānampi saṅgahitanti dassetuṃ “catutthajjhānena
tika-s0101t:1335_11: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānañhi rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ “arūpajjhāna”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0101t:1336_0: 471-480. Na cittekaggatāmattakenevāti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t:1336_1: Lokiyassa samādhikkhandhassa adhippetattā “na citte…pe… atthī”ti vuttaṃ. Ariya-saddo
tika-s0101t:1336_2: cettha suddhapariyāyo, na lokuttarapariyāyo. Tathā heṭṭhāpi lokiyābhiññāpaṭisambhidāhi
tika-s0101t:1336_3: vināva arahatte adhigate nattheva uttariṃkaraṇīyanti sakkā vattuṃ yadatthaṃ bhagavati
tika-s0101t:1336_4: brahmacariyaṃ vussati, tassa siddhattā. Idha pana lokiyābhiññāpi āgatā eva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0101t:1342_0: 481. Pāvārikambavaneti pāvārikaseṭṭhino ambabahule upavane. Taṃ kira so seṭṭhī bhagavato
tika-s0101t:1342_2: sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakasampannaṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa
tika-s0101t:1342_3: niyyātesi, purimavohārena pana “pāvārikambavana”nti vuccati, tasmiṃ pāvārikambavane.
tika-s0101t:1342_4: Kevaṭṭoti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ kevaṭṭehi saṃrakkhitattā, tesaṃ vā santike saṃvaḍḍhitattāti
tika-s0101t:1342_5: keci. “Gahapatiputtassā”ti ettha kāmaṃ tadā so gahapatiṭṭhāne ṭhito, pitu panassa
tika-s0101t:1342_7: mahāsālo”ti. Mahāvibhavatāya mahāsāro, gahapatīti attho ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā
tika-s0101t:1342_8: “mahāsālo sukhumālo aha”ntiādīsu viya. Saddhāsampannoti pothujjanikāya saddhāya vasena saddhā samannāgato.
tika-s0101t:1343_0: Samiddhāti sammadeva iddhā, iddhiyā vibhavasampattiyā vepullappattāti attho. “Ehi
tika-s0101t:1343_1: tvaṃ bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ, anumāsaṃ, anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā manussānaṃ pasādāya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1343_2: karohī”ti ekassa bhikkhuno āṇāpanaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne tassa ṭhapanaṃ nāma hotīti āha “ṭhānantare
tika-s0101t:1343_3: ṭhapetū”ti. Uttarimanussānaṃ dhammatoti uttarimanussānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ adhigamadhammato.
tika-s0101t:1343_4: Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ nissakkaṃ. Iddhipāṭihāriyañhi tato niddhāreti. Manussadhammato uttarīti
tika-s0101t:1344: 482. Na dhaṃsemīti guṇasampattito na cāvemi, tenāha “sīlabheda”ntiādi. Vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavati attano vissatthabhāvaṃ brūhetvā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā.
tika-s0101t:1346_0: 483-4. Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Gandhārīti cūḷagandhārī, mahāgandhārīti dve gandhārīvijjā.
tika-s0101t:1346_1: Tattha cūḷagandhārī nāma tivassato oraṃ matānaṃ sattānaṃ upapannaṭṭhānajānanavijjā.
tika-s0101t:1346_2: Mahāgandhārī tampi jānāti tato uttaripi iddhividhañāṇakappaṃ yebhuyyena iddhividhakiccaṃ
tika-s0101t:1346_3: sādheti. Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā bahudhāpi
tika-s0101t:1346_4: attānaṃ dasseti, hatthiādīnipi dasseti, dassanīyopi hoti, aggithambhampi karoti,
tika-s0101t:1346_5: jalathambhampi karoti, ākāsepi attānaṃ dasseti. Sabbaṃ indajālasadisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1348_0: 485. Kāmaṃ “cetasika”nti padaṃ ye cetasi niyuttā cittena sampayuttā, tesaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-s0101t:1348_1: sādhāraṇe pana gahite cittaviseso gahitova hoti, sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0101t:1348_2: cetasikaggahaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto “somanassadomanassaṃ adhippeta”nti āha. Somanassaggahaṇena
tika-s0101t:1348_3: cettha tadekaṭṭhā rāgādayo, saddhādayo ca dassitā honti, domanassaggahaṇena dosādayo.
tika-s0101t:1348_4: Vitakkavicārā pana sarūpeneva dassitā. Evaṃ tava manoti iminā ākārena tava mano pavattoti
tika-s0101t:1348_5: attho. Kena pakārena pavattoti āha “somanassito vā”tiādi. “Evaṃ tava mano”ti idaṃ
tika-s0101t:1348_6: pana somanassitatādimattadassanaṃ, na pana yena yena somanassito vā domanassito vā,
tika-s0101t:1348_7: taṃ taṃ dassanaṃ. Dutiyanti “itthampi te mano”ti idaṃ. Itipīti ettha iti-saddo nidassanattho
tika-s0101t:1348_8: “atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto”tiādīsu viya, tenāha “imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamāna”nti
tika-s0101t:1348_9: pi-saddo vuttatthasampiṇḍanattho. Parassa cintaṃ manati jānāti etenāti cintāmaṇi.
tika-s0101t:1348_10: Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ
tika-s0101t:1348_11: jānitukāmo, tassa diṭṭhasutādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetīti
tika-s0101t:1348_12: keci. Apare “vācaṃ niccharāpetvā tattha akkharasallakkhaṇavasenā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0101t:1350_0: 486. Pavattentāti pavattanakā hutvā, pavattanavasenāti attho. “Eva”nti hi padaṃ yathānusiṭṭhāya
tika-s0101t:1350_1: anusāsaniyā vidhivasena, paṭisedhavasena ca pavattiākāraparāmasanaṃ, sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1350_2: micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati tattha ānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa
tika-s0101t:1350_3: ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. Aniccasaññameva na niccasaññanti attho. Paṭiyogīnivattanatthañhi
tika-s0101t:1350_4: eva-kāraggahaṇaṃ. Idhāpi evaṃ saddaggahaṇassa attho, payojanañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1350_5: Idaṃgahaṇepi eseva nayo. Pañcakāmaguṇikarāganti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tadaññarāgassa,
tika-s0101t:1350_6: dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā, tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepanassa upāyabhāvato
tika-s0101t:1350_7: tathā vuttaṃ duṭṭhalohitavimocanassa pubbaduṭṭhamaṃsakhepanūpāyatā viya. Lokuttaradhammamevāti
tika-s0101t:1350_9: tadaññesaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ nānantariyabhāvato. Iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti
tika-s0101t:1350_10: iddhidassanena parasantāne pasādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa haraṇato. Iminā nayena sesapadadvayepi
tika-s0101t:1350_11: attho veditabbo. Satataṃ dhammadesanāti sabbakālaṃ desetabbadhammadesanā.
tika-s0101t:1351_0: Iddhipāṭihāriyenāti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, iddhipāṭihāriyena saddhinti attho. Ādesanāpāṭihāriyenāti
tika-s0101t:1351_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Dhammasenāpatissa āciṇṇanti yojanā. “Cittācāraṃ ñatvā”ti iminā
tika-s0101t:1351_3: satataṃ dhammadesanā”ti anusāsanīpāṭihāriyassa tattha sātisayatāya vuttaṃ. Saupārambhāni
tika-s0101t:1351_4: patirūpena upārambhitabbato. Sadosāni dosasamucchindanassa anupāyabhāvato. Sadosattā
tika-s0101t:1351_5: eva addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti cirakālaṭṭhāyīni na honti. Addhānaṃ atiṭṭhanato na niyyantīti
tika-s0101t:1351_6: phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Aniyyānikatāya hi tāni anaddhaniyāni. Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1351_7: anupārambhaṃ visuddhippabhavato, visuddhinissayato ca. Tato eva niddosaṃ. Na hi tattha
tika-s0101t:1351_8: pubbāparavirodhādidosasambhavo. Niddosattā eva addhānaṃ tiṭṭhati paravādavātehi,
tika-s0101t:1351_9: kilesavātehi ca anupahantabbato. Tasmāti yathāvuttakāraṇato, tena saupārambhādiṃ,
tika-s0101t:1351_10: anupārambhādiṃ cāti ubhayaṃ ubhayattha yathākkamaṃ gārayhapāsaṃsabhāvānaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0101t:1353_0: 487. Aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthanti yasmā mahābhūtapariyesako bhikkhu purimesu dvīsu
tika-s0101t:1353_1: pāṭihāriyesu vasippatto kusalopi samāno mahābhūtānaṃ aparisesanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0101t:1353_2: nāvabujjhi, tasmā tāni niyyānāvahatābhāvato aniyyānikānīti tesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1353_3: Tatiyaṃ pana takkarassa ekantato niyyānāvahanti tasseva niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t:1354_0: Evametissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni anusaṅgikampi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi
tika-s0101t:1354_1: āraddhaṃ. Mahābhūte pariyesantoti aparisesaṃ nirujjhanavasena mahābhūte gavesanto,
tika-s0101t:1354_2: tesaṃ anavasesanirodhaṃ vīmaṃsantoti attho. Vicaritvāti dhammatāya codiyamāno vicaritvā.
tika-s0101t:1354_3: Dhammatāsiddhaṃ kiretaṃ, yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhuno tathā vicaraṇaṃ, yathā abhijātiyaṃ
tika-s0101t:1354_5: buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvassa mahānubhāvatāya dīpanatthaṃ. Idañca kāraṇanti sabbesampi
tika-s0101t:1354_6: buddhānaṃ sāsane īdiso eko bhikkhu tadānubhāvappakāsano hotīti idampi kāraṇaṃ dassento.
tika-s0101t:1355_0: Katthāti nimitte bhummaṃ, tasmā katthāti kismiṃ ṭhāne kāraṇabhūte. Kiṃ āgammāti kiṃ
tika-s0101t:1355_1: ārammaṇaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ adhigantvā, tenāha “kiṃ pattassā”ti. Teti mahābhūtā. Appavattivasenāti
tika-s0101t:1356_0: 488. Dibbanti ettha pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtā hutvā vicaranti, kīḷanti, jotanti
tika-s0101t:1356_1: cāti devo, devaloko. Taṃ yanti upagacchanti etenāti devayāniyo. Vasaṃ vattentoti
tika-s0101t:1356_2: ettha vasavattanaṃ nāma yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ. Cattāro mahārājāno etesaṃ issarāti
tika-s0101t:1356_3: cātumahārājikā yā devatā maggaphalalābhino tā tamatthaṃ ekadesena jāneyyuṃ buddhavisayo
tika-s0101t:1356_4: panāyaṃ pañhoti cintetvā “na jānāmā”ti āhaṃsu, tenāha “buddhavisaye”tiādi. Ajjhottharaṇaṃ
tika-s0101t:1356_5: nāmettha nippīḷananti āha “punappunaṃ pucchatī”ti. Abhikkantatarāti rūpasampattiyā
tika-s0101t:1356_6: ceva paññāpaṭibhānādiguṇehi ca amhe abhibhuyya paresaṃ kāmanīyatarā. Paṇītatarāti
tika-s0101t:1357_1: sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāma”nti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca tattha tattha
tika-s0101t:1358: 494. Āgamanapubbabhāge nimittanti brahmuno āgamanassa pubbabhāge uppajjananimittaṃ. Pāturahosīti āvi bhavi. Pākaṭo ahosīti pakāso ahosi.
tika-s0101t:1359_0: 497. Padesenāti ekadesena, upādinnakavasena, sattasantānapariyāpannenāti attho. Anupādinnakepīti
tika-s0101t:1359_1: anindriyabaddhepi. Nippadesato anavasesato. Pucchāmūḷhassāti pucchituṃ ajānantassa.
tika-s0101t:1359_2: Pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvāti tena katapucchāya pucchitākāre dosaṃ vibhāvetvā. Yasmā
tika-s0101t:1359_3: vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchānurūpaṃ pucchāsabhāgena vissajjetabbato, na ca tathāgatā virajjhitvā
tika-s0101t:1359_4: katapucchānurūpaṃ vissajjenti, atthasabhāgatāya ca vissajjanassa pucchakā tadatthaṃ
tika-s0101t:1359_5: anavabujjhantā sammuyhanti, tasmā pucchāya sikkhāpanaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ, tenāha “pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā”tiādi.
